quotes.text: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
quotes.author: Ausonius

quotes.text: Age is a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it don't matter.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.text: I know not age, nor weariness nor defeat.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.text: A birthday is just another day where you go to work and people give you love. Age is just a state of mind, and you are as old as you think you are. You have to count your blessings and be happy.
quotes.author: Abhishek Bachchan

quotes.text: Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese.
quotes.author: Luis Bunuel

quotes.text: Try to keep your soul young and quivering right up to old age.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.text: Our uniqueness makes us special, makes perception valuable - but it can also make us lonely. This loneliness is different from being 'alone': You can be lonely even surrounded by people. The feeling I'm talking about stems from the sense that we can never fully share the truth of who we are. I experienced this acutely at an early age.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.text: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.text: Being confident is the key to life. Don't be afraid to be you! I'm super different from a lot of kids my age with style and personality, and I'm OK with it. And if you are OK with it, everyone else will be, too. Just be yourself.
quotes.author: Leo Howard

quotes.text: In our age there is no such thing as 'keeping out of politics.' All issues are political issues, and politics itself is a mass of lies, evasions, folly, hatred and schizophrenia.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.text: Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Age appears to be best in four things; old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: Do not go gentle into that good night but rage, rage against the dying of the light.
quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

quotes.text: Those who improve with age embrace the power of personal growth and personal achievement and begin to replace youth with wisdom, innocence with understanding, and lack of purpose with self-actualization.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.text: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young. The greatest thing in life is to keep your mind young.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: The secret of genius is to carry the spirit of the child into old age, which means never losing your enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: There is a plan and a purpose, a value to every life, no matter what its location, age, gender or disability.
quotes.author: Sharron Angle

quotes.text: Every age has its storytelling form, and video gaming is a huge part of our culture. You can ignore or embrace video games and imbue them with the best artistic quality. People are enthralled with video games in the same way as other people love the cinema or theatre.
quotes.author: Andy Serkis

quotes.text: Youth has no age.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: You can't help getting older, but you don't have to get old.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.text: To me - old age is always ten years older than I am.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.text: There is a fountain of youth: it is your mind, your talents, the creativity you bring to your life and the lives of people you love. When you learn to tap this source, you will truly have defeated age.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.text: Men are like wine - some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.text: The age of a woman doesn't mean a thing. The best tunes are played on the oldest fiddles.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Marriage is not about age; it's about finding the right person.
quotes.author: Sophia Bush

quotes.text: Aging is not lost youth but a new stage of opportunity and strength.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.text: Love yourself. It is important to stay positive because beauty comes from the inside out.
quotes.author: Jenn Proske

quotes.text: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
quotes.author: John Ray

quotes.text: Peace is the beauty of life. It is sunshine. It is the smile of a child, the love of a mother, the joy of a father, the togetherness of a family. It is the advancement of man, the victory of a just cause, the triumph of truth.
quotes.author: Menachem Begin

quotes.text: The beauty of a woman must be seen from in her eyes, because that is the doorway to her heart, the place where love resides.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Beauty is when you can appreciate yourself. When you love yourself, that's when you're most beautiful.
quotes.author: Zoe Kravitz

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: My greatest beauty secret is being happy with myself. I don't use special creams or treatments - I'll use a little bit of everything. It's a mistake to think you are what you put on yourself. I believe that a lot of how you look is to do with how you feel about yourself and your life. Happiness is the greatest beauty secret.
quotes.author: Tina Turner

quotes.text: Life is full of beauty. Notice it. Notice the bumble bee, the small child, and the smiling faces. Smell the rain, and feel the wind. Live your life to the fullest potential, and fight for your dreams.
quotes.author: Ashley Smith

quotes.text: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: Beauty is how you feel inside, and it reflects in your eyes. It is not something physical.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.text: Beauty has so many forms, and I think the most beautiful thing is confidence and loving yourself.
quotes.author: Kiesza

quotes.text: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: When I admire the wonders of a sunset or the beauty of the moon, my soul expands in the worship of the creator.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Smiling is definitely one of the best beauty remedies. If you have a good sense of humor and a good approach to life, that's beautiful.
quotes.author: Rashida Jones

quotes.text: Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.text: The beauty of a woman is not in a facial mode but the true beauty in a woman is reflected in her soul. It is the caring that she lovingly gives the passion that she shows. The beauty of a woman grows with the passing years.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Never lose an opportunity of seeing anything beautiful, for beauty is God's handwriting.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Consider a tree for a moment. As beautiful as trees are to look at, we don't see what goes on underground - as they grow roots. Trees must develop deep roots in order to grow strong and produce their beauty. But we don't see the roots. We just see and enjoy the beauty. In much the same way, what goes on inside of us is like the roots of a tree.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.text: Makeup is not a mask that covers up your beauty; it's a weapon that helps you express who you are from the inside.
quotes.author: Michelle Phan

quotes.text: The more often we see the things around us - even the beautiful and wonderful things - the more they become invisible to us. That is why we often take for granted the beauty of this world: the flowers, the trees, the birds, the clouds - even those we love. Because we see things so often, we see them less and less.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.text: It is not the beauty of a building you should look at; its the construction of the foundation that will stand the test of time.
quotes.author: David Allan Coe

quotes.text: We live in a wonderful world that is full of beauty, charm and adventure. There is no end to the adventures that we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.text: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.text: Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Most of what we call management consists of making it difficult for people to get their work done.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but they whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves their conduct, will pursue their principles unto death.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: A satisfied customer is the best business strategy of all.
quotes.author: Michael LeBoeuf

quotes.text: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Happiness does not come from doing easy work but from the afterglow of satisfaction that comes after the achievement of a difficult task that demanded our best.
quotes.author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

quotes.text: If people like you, they'll listen to you, but if they trust you, they'll do business with you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Before you can become a millionaire, you must learn to think like one. You must learn how to motivate yourself to counter fear with courage. Making critical decisions about your career, business, investments and other resources conjures up fear, fear that is part of the process of becoming a financial success.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Stanley

quotes.text: An organization's ability to learn, and translate that learning into action rapidly, is the ultimate competitive advantage.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.text: A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Information technology and business are becoming inextricably interwoven. I don't think anybody can talk meaningfully about one without the talking about the other.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: A brand for a company is like a reputation for a person. You earn reputation by trying to do hard things well.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.text: A passionate belief in your business and personal objectives can make all the difference between success and failure. If you aren't proud of what you're doing, why should anybody else be?
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.text: Ideas pull the trigger, but instinct loads the gun.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.text: My philosophy is it's none of my business what people say of me and think of me. I am what I am, and I do what I do. I expect nothing and accept everything. And it makes life so much easier.
quotes.author: Anthony Hopkins

quotes.text: We're all working together; that's the secret.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.text: There is only one boss. The customer. And he can fire everybody in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money somewhere else.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.text: The first rule of any technology used in a business is that automation applied to an efficient operation will magnify the efficiency. The second is that automation applied to an inefficient operation will magnify the inefficiency.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Everyone is your best friend when you are successful. Make sure that the people that you surround yourself with are also the people that you are not afraid of failing with.
quotes.author: Paula Abdul

quotes.text: In the business world, the rearview mirror is always clearer than the windshield.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: The greatest ability in business is to get along with others and to influence their actions.
quotes.author: John Hancock

quotes.text: There is always space for improvement, no matter how long you've been in the business.
quotes.author: Oscar De La Hoya

quotes.text: Just because something doesn't do what you planned it to do doesn't mean it's useless.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.text: Good business leaders create a vision, articulate the vision, passionately own the vision, and relentlessly drive it to completion.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.text: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others; for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness; and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: I'm learning a lot about myself being alone, and doing what I'm doing.
quotes.author: Chantal Kreviazuk

quotes.text: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.text: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.text: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: Nothing in this world can take the place of persistence. Talent will not: nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not: the world is full of educated derelicts. Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.text: Laugh and the world laughs with you, snore and you sleep alone.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.text: Loneliness expresses the pain of being alone and solitude expresses the glory of being alone.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.text: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.text: I restore myself when I'm alone.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.text: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: Our uniqueness makes us special, makes perception valuable - but it can also make us lonely. This loneliness is different from being 'alone': You can be lonely even surrounded by people. The feeling I'm talking about stems from the sense that we can never fully share the truth of who we are. I experienced this acutely at an early age.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.text: As I get older I'm more and more comfortable being alone.
quotes.author: Sienna Miller

quotes.text: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.text: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend.
quotes.author: Conor Oberst

quotes.text: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.text: Being alone & actually sitting with our own thoughts can lead to such growth and realizations that are rare in our everyday busy lives.
quotes.author: Kourtney Kardashian

quotes.text: God writes the Gospel not in the Bible alone, but also on trees, and in the flowers and clouds and stars.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: To go out with the setting sun on an empty beach is to truly embrace your solitude.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.text: Sometimes, being different feels a lot like being alone. But with that being said, being true to that and being true to my standards and my way of doing things in my art and my music, everything that has made me feel very different... in the end, it has made me the happiest.
quotes.author: Lindsey Stirling

quotes.text: Loneliness is my least favorite thing about life. The thing that I'm most worried about is just being alone without anybody to care for or someone who will care for me.
quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

quotes.text: Unlike a drop of water which loses its identity when it joins the ocean, man does not lose his being in the society in which he lives. Man's life is independent. He is born not for the development of the society alone, but for the development of his self.
quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

quotes.text: The human soul is hungry for beauty; we seek it everywhere - in landscape, music, art, clothes, furniture, gardening, companionship, love, religion, and in ourselves. No one would desire not to be beautiful. When we experience the beautiful, there is a sense of homecoming.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.text: A weed is but an unloved flower.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.text: Flowers always make people better, happier, and more helpful; they are sunshine, food and medicine for the soul.
quotes.author: Luther Burbank

quotes.text: Flowers are restful to look at. They have neither emotions nor conflicts.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.text: If you have a garden and a library, you have everything you need.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: Weeds are flowers too, once you get to know them.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.text: By plucking her petals, you do not gather the beauty of the flower.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.text: To see a world in a grain of sand and heaven in a wild flower Hold infinity in the palm of your hand and eternity in an hour.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: Remember that children, marriages, and flower gardens reflect the kind of care they get.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: It is only the farmer who faithfully plants seeds in the Spring, who reaps a harvest in the Autumn.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.text: The flower that smells the sweetest is shy and lowly.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.text: Little things seem nothing, but they give peace, like those meadow flowers which individually seem odorless but all together perfume the air.
quotes.author: Georges Bernanos

quotes.text: A garden requires patient labor and attention. Plants do not grow merely to satisfy ambitions or to fulfill good intentions. They thrive because someone expended effort on them.
quotes.author: Liberty Hyde Bailey

quotes.text: When the flower blooms, the bees come uninvited.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna

quotes.text: It will never rain roses: when we want to have more roses we must plant more trees.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: You can cut all the flowers but you cannot keep spring from coming.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.text: The glory of gardening: hands in the dirt, head in the sun, heart with nature. To nurture a garden is to feed not just on the body, but the soul.
quotes.author: Alfred Austin

quotes.text: Trees and plants always look like the people they live with, somehow.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.text: Love is the flower of life, and blossoms unexpectedly and without law, and must be plucked where it is found, and enjoyed for the brief hour of its duration.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.text: A garden is a grand teacher. It teaches patience and careful watchfulness; it teaches industry and thrift; above all it teaches entire trust.
quotes.author: Gertrude Jekyll

quotes.text: The flower which is single need not envy the thorns that are numerous.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.text: Let us not forget that the cultivation of the earth is the most important labor of man. When tillage begins, other arts will follow. The farmers, therefore, are the founders of civilization.
quotes.author: Daniel Webster

quotes.text: I want it said of me by those who knew me best, that I always plucked a thistle and planted a flower where I thought a flower would grow.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: A flower falls, even though we love it; and a weed grows, even though we do not love it.
quotes.author: Dogen

quotes.text: Won't you come into the garden? I would like my roses to see you.
quotes.author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quotes.text: Gardens are not made by singing 'Oh, how beautiful,' and sitting in the shade.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.text: In the End, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Patriotism is supporting your country all the time, and your government when it deserves it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: My fellow Americans, ask not what your country can do for you, ask what you can do for your country.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Guard against the impostures of pretended patriotism.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.text: The willingness of America's veterans to sacrifice for our country has earned them our lasting gratitude.
quotes.author: Jeff Miller

quotes.text: I love America more than any other country in this world, and, exactly for this reason, I insist on the right to criticize her perpetually.
quotes.author: James A. Baldwin

quotes.text: I only regret that I have but one life to lose for my country.
quotes.author: Nathan Hale

quotes.text: A man's country is not a certain area of land, of mountains, rivers, and woods, but it is a principle and patriotism is loyalty to that principle.
quotes.author: George William Curtis

quotes.text: Memorial Day isn't just about honoring veterans, its honoring those who lost their lives. Veterans had the fortune of coming home. For us, that's a reminder of when we come home we still have a responsibility to serve. It's a continuation of service that honors our country and those who fell defending it.
quotes.author: Pete Hegseth

quotes.text: Who sows virtue reaps honor.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: I have long believed that sacrifice is the pinnacle of patriotism.
quotes.author: Bob Riley

quotes.text: Patriotism consists not in waving the flag, but in striving that our country shall be righteous as well as strong.
quotes.author: James Bryce

quotes.text: I would rather be remembered by a song than by a victory.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.text: True patriotism isn't cheap. It's about taking on a fair share of the burden of keeping America going.
quotes.author: Robert Reich

quotes.text: On Memorial Day, I don't want to only remember the combatants. There were also those who came out of the trenches as writers and poets, who started preaching peace, men and women who have made this world a kinder place to live.
quotes.author: Eric Burdon

quotes.text: There is nothing wrong with America that cannot be cured with what is right in America.
quotes.author: William J. Clinton

quotes.text: What I can do for my country, I am willing to do.
quotes.author: Christopher Gadsden

quotes.text: Memorial Day this year is especially important as we are reminded almost daily of the great sacrifices that the men and women of the Armed Services make to defend our way of life.
quotes.author: Robin Hayes

quotes.text: America is hope. It is compassion. It is excellence. It is valor.
quotes.author: Paul Tsongas

quotes.text: On what rests the hope of the republic? One country, one language, one flag!
quotes.author: Alexander Henry

quotes.text: Patriotism was a living fire of unquestioned belief and purpose.
quotes.author: Frank Knox

quotes.text: There are no points of the compass on the chart of true patriotism.
quotes.author: Robert Charles Winthrop

quotes.text: As America celebrates Memorial Day, we pay tribute to those who have given their lives in our nation's wars.
quotes.author: John M. McHugh

quotes.text: There's intense national feeling in America that could be called patriotism.
quotes.author: Michael Ignatieff

quotes.text: In remembering those who lost their lives in the London attacks and the September 11th attacks we continue our commitment to fighting for freedom, democracy and justice.
quotes.author: Doc Hastings

quotes.text: 137 years later, Memorial Day remains one of America's most cherished patriotic observances. The spirit of this day has not changed - it remains a day to honor those who died defending our freedom and democracy.
quotes.author: Doc Hastings

quotes.text: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.text: Love yourself. It is important to stay positive because beauty comes from the inside out.
quotes.author: Jenn Proske

quotes.text: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
quotes.author: Pele

quotes.text: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.text: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
quotes.author: Bradley Whitford

quotes.text: Love myself I do. Not everything, but I love the good as well as the bad. I love my crazy lifestyle, and I love my hard discipline. I love my freedom of speech and the way my eyes get dark when I'm tired. I love that I have learned to trust people with my heart, even if it will get broken. I am proud of everything that I am and will become.
quotes.author: Johnny Weir

quotes.text: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.text: Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving. It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.text: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: There is no love without forgiveness, and there is no forgiveness without love.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: We loved with a love that was more than love.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.text: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.text: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Peace is the beauty of life. It is sunshine. It is the smile of a child, the love of a mother, the joy of a father, the togetherness of a family. It is the advancement of man, the victory of a just cause, the triumph of truth.
quotes.author: Menachem Begin

quotes.text: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.text: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: The beauty of a woman must be seen from in her eyes, because that is the doorway to her heart, the place where love resides.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.text: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.text: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours; if they don't they never were.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: The science of today is the technology of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Edward Teller

quotes.text: Only two things are infinite, the universe and human stupidity, and I'm not sure about the former.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Science is a beautiful gift to humanity; we should not distort it.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.text: Science is a way of thinking much more than it is a body of knowledge.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.text: Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Success is a science; if you have the conditions, you get the result.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: The art and science of asking questions is the source of all knowledge.
quotes.author: Thomas Berger

quotes.text: Democracy is the art and science of running the circus from the monkey cage.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.text: If civilization is to survive, we must cultivate the science of human relationships - the ability of all peoples, of all kinds, to live together, in the same world at peace.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Computer science is no more about computers than astronomy is about telescopes.
quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

quotes.text: Science has not yet taught us if madness is or is not the sublimity of the intelligence.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.text: Engineering or technology is all about using the power of science to make life better for people, to reduce cost, to improve comfort, to improve productivity, etc.
quotes.author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

quotes.text: Science is about knowing; engineering is about doing.
quotes.author: Henry Petroski

quotes.text: Art is the tree of life. Science is the tree of death.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: We live in a society exquisitely dependent on science and technology, in which hardly anyone knows anything about science and technology.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.text: The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and science.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Modern science says: 'The sun is the past, the earth is the present, the moon is the future.' From an incandescent mass we have originated, and into a frozen mass we shall turn. Merciless is the law of nature, and rapidly and irresistibly we are drawn to our doom.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.text: Science knows no country, because knowledge belongs to humanity, and is the torch which illuminates the world.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.text: We will always have STEM with us. Some things will drop out of the public eye and will go away, but there will always be science, engineering, and technology. And there will always, always be mathematics.
quotes.author: Katherine Johnson

quotes.text: Science is fun. Science is curiosity. We all have natural curiosity. Science is a process of investigating. It's posing questions and coming up with a method. It's delving in.
quotes.author: Sally Ride

quotes.text: Science is beautiful when it makes simple explanations of phenomena or connections between different observations. Examples include the double helix in biology and the fundamental equations of physics.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: Once you have an innovation culture, even those who are not scientists or engineers - poets, actors, journalists - they, as communities, embrace the meaning of what it is to be scientifically literate. They embrace the concept of an innovation culture. They vote in ways that promote it. They don't fight science and they don't fight technology.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.text: Our scientific power has outrun our spiritual power. We have guided missiles and misguided men.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: To raise new questions, new possibilities, to regard old problems from a new angle, requires creative imagination and marks real advance in science.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Science means constantly walking a tightrope between blind faith and curiosity; between expertise and creativity; between bias and openness; between experience and epiphany; between ambition and passion; and between arrogance and conviction - in short, between an old today and a new tomorrow.
quotes.author: Heinrich Rohrer

quotes.text: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.text: Every day we have plenty of opportunities to get angry, stressed or offended. But what you're doing when you indulge these negative emotions is giving something outside yourself power over your happiness. You can choose to not let little things upset you.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: For every minute you remain angry, you give up sixty seconds of peace of mind.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Red is such an interesting color to correlate with emotion, because it's on both ends of the spectrum. On one end you have happiness, falling in love, infatuation with someone, passion, all that. On the other end, you've got obsession, jealousy, danger, fear, anger and frustration.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.text: Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.text: While seeking revenge, dig two graves - one for yourself.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.text: In times of great stress or adversity, it's always best to keep busy, to plow your anger and your energy into something positive.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.text: When anger rises, think of the consequences.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Anybody can become angry - that is easy, but to be angry with the right person and to the right degree and at the right time and for the right purpose, and in the right way - that is not within everybody's power and is not easy.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Anger is the enemy of non-violence and pride is a monster that swallows it up.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Anger is an acid that can do more harm to the vessel in which it is stored than to anything on which it is poured.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: I really believe that all of us have a lot of darkness in our souls. Anger, rage, fear, sadness. I don't think that's only reserved for people who have horrible upbringings. I think it really exists and is part of the human condition. I think in the course of your life you figure out ways to deal with that.
quotes.author: Kevin Bacon

quotes.text: Some days, 24 hours is too much to stay put in, so I take the day hour by hour, moment by moment. I break the task, the challenge, the fear into small, bite-size pieces. I can handle a piece of fear, depression, anger, pain, sadness, loneliness, illness. I actually put my hands up to my face, one next to each eye, like blinders on a horse.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.text: I don't usually lose my temper, but if I get angry, it's true - I'm scary.
quotes.author: Eva Mendes

quotes.text: Anger and intolerance are the enemies of correct understanding.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: People won't have time for you if you are always angry or complaining.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: Discussion is an exchange of knowledge; an argument an exchange of ignorance.
quotes.author: Robert Quillen

quotes.text: I realized that if my thoughts immediately affect my body, I should be careful about what I think. Now if I get angry, I ask myself why I feel that way. If I can find the source of my anger, I can turn that negative energy into something positive.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.text: To be angry is to revenge the faults of others on ourselves.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.text: Too much self-centered attitude, you see, brings, you see, isolation. Result: loneliness, fear, anger. The extreme self-centered attitude is the source of suffering.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems - not people; to focus your energies on answers - not excuses.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: Silence is one of the hardest arguments to refute.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: Censorship is the tool of those who have the need to hide actualities from themselves and from others. Their fear is only their inability to face what is real, and I can't vent any anger against them; I only feel this appalling sadness. Somewhere in their upbringing, they were shielded against the total facts of our existence.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.text: Boredom, anger, sadness, or fear are not 'yours,' not personal. They are conditions of the human mind. They come and go. Nothing that comes and goes is you.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others; for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness; and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: I'm learning a lot about myself being alone, and doing what I'm doing.
quotes.author: Chantal Kreviazuk

quotes.text: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.text: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.text: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: Nothing in this world can take the place of persistence. Talent will not: nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not: the world is full of educated derelicts. Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.text: Laugh and the world laughs with you, snore and you sleep alone.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.text: Loneliness expresses the pain of being alone and solitude expresses the glory of being alone.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.text: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.text: I restore myself when I'm alone.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.text: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: Our uniqueness makes us special, makes perception valuable - but it can also make us lonely. This loneliness is different from being 'alone': You can be lonely even surrounded by people. The feeling I'm talking about stems from the sense that we can never fully share the truth of who we are. I experienced this acutely at an early age.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.text: As I get older I'm more and more comfortable being alone.
quotes.author: Sienna Miller

quotes.text: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.text: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend.
quotes.author: Conor Oberst

quotes.text: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.text: Being alone & actually sitting with our own thoughts can lead to such growth and realizations that are rare in our everyday busy lives.
quotes.author: Kourtney Kardashian

quotes.text: God writes the Gospel not in the Bible alone, but also on trees, and in the flowers and clouds and stars.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: To go out with the setting sun on an empty beach is to truly embrace your solitude.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.text: Sometimes, being different feels a lot like being alone. But with that being said, being true to that and being true to my standards and my way of doing things in my art and my music, everything that has made me feel very different... in the end, it has made me the happiest.
quotes.author: Lindsey Stirling

quotes.text: Loneliness is my least favorite thing about life. The thing that I'm most worried about is just being alone without anybody to care for or someone who will care for me.
quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

quotes.text: Unlike a drop of water which loses its identity when it joins the ocean, man does not lose his being in the society in which he lives. Man's life is independent. He is born not for the development of the society alone, but for the development of his self.
quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

quotes.text: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.text: Every day we have plenty of opportunities to get angry, stressed or offended. But what you're doing when you indulge these negative emotions is giving something outside yourself power over your happiness. You can choose to not let little things upset you.

quotes.text: To be angry is to revenge the faults of others on ourselves.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.text: Too much self-centered attitude, you see, brings, you see, isolation. Result: loneliness, fear, anger. The extreme self-centered attitude is the source of suffering.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems - not people; to focus your energies on answers - not excuses.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: Silence is one of the hardest arguments to refute.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: Censorship is the tool of those who have the need to hide actualities from themselves and from others. Their fear is only their inability to face what is real, and I can't vent any anger against them; I only feel this appalling sadness. Somewhere in their upbringing, they were shielded against the total facts of our existence.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.text: Boredom, anger, sadness, or fear are not 'yours,' not personal. They are conditions of the human mind. They come and go. Nothing that comes and goes is you.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: The secret of a happy marriage is finding the right person. You know they're right if you love to be with them all the time.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.text: Love grows more tremendously full, swift, poignant, as the years multiply.
quotes.author: Zane Grey

quotes.text: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
quotes.author: Paul Sweeney

quotes.text: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: May you live as long as you wish and love as long as you live.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.text: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads, which sew people together through the years.
quotes.author: Simone Signoret

quotes.text: An anniversary is a reminder as to why you love and married this person.
quotes.author: Zoe Foster Blake

quotes.text: Some people ask the secret of our long marriage. We take time to go to a restaurant two times a week. A little candlelight, dinner, soft music and dancing. She goes Tuesdays, I go Fridays.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.text: You were made perfectly to be loved - and surely I have loved you, in the idea of you, my whole life long.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.text: Experts on romance say for a happy marriage there has to be more than a passionate love. For a lasting union, they insist, there must be a genuine liking for each other. Which, in my book, is a good definition for friendship.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: We invest less in our friendships and expect more of friends than any other relationship. We spend days working out where to book for a romantic dinner, weeks wondering how to celebrate a partner or parent's birthday, and seconds forgetting a friend's important anniversary.
quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

quotes.text: We are not the same persons this year as last; nor are those we love. It is a happy chance if we, changing, continue to love a changed person.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.text: Yes, it was love at first sight. I feel that after all these years, I have finally found my soul mate.
quotes.author: Barbara Hershey

quotes.text: I love being my husband's wife.
quotes.author: Julianna Margulies

quotes.text: Marriage is an alliance entered into by a man who can't sleep with the window shut, and a woman who can't sleep with the window open.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: One should believe in marriage as in the immortality of the soul.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: Mom and Dad were married 64 years. And if you wondered what their secret was, you could have asked the local florist - because every day Dad gave Mom a rose, which he put on her bedside table. That's how she found out what happened on the day my father died - she went looking for him because that morning, there was no rose.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: May you live all the days of your life.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.text: I believe the wedding vows are sacred and precious, and it's been one of my goals as a writer to portray the kind of marriages I've seen modeled in my family - my parents and grandparents, who all celebrated fifty-year anniversaries and well-beyond.
quotes.author: Deborah Raney

quotes.text: After about 20 years of marriage, I'm finally starting to scratch the surface of what women want. And I think the answer lies somewhere between conversation and chocolate.
quotes.author: Mel Gibson

quotes.text: In terms of my marriage, you know, falling in love with my husband was by far the best thing that's ever happened to me.
quotes.author: Caroline Kennedy

quotes.text: We concentrate so much on anniversaries and birthdays that you forget it's the Tuesday that's tough that really counts. Sometimes she just needs some flowers or even just that ear. It's the little things that count. It's the regular days of the year that you have to keep your attention on her.
quotes.author: BJ the Chicago Kid

quotes.text: I think long-lasting, healthy relationships are more important than the idea of marriage. At the root of every successful marriage is a strong partnership.
quotes.author: Carson Daly

quotes.text: I've been in love with the same woman for forty-one years. If my wife finds out, she'll kill me.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.text: Marriage is the most natural state of man, and... the state in which you will find solid happiness.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: I dated a lot, but I never really had anyone who was worthy of an anniversary. And most girlfriends never made it to a year, anyway.
quotes.author: Wale

quotes.text: I was given such a great gift. It's a miracle that never stops amazing me and reminding me to give thanks, every day. Having a wife and daughter gives me a lot more purpose. I was much more selfish before, but now I think about what kind of role model I'll be. I just want to be a better man.
quotes.author: Jake Owen

quotes.text: We don't even know how strong we are until we are forced to bring that hidden strength forward. In times of tragedy, of war, of necessity, people do amazing things. The human capacity for survival and renewal is awesome.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.text: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.text: When you have confidence, you can have a lot of fun. And when you have fun, you can do amazing things.
quotes.author: Joe Namath

quotes.text: God has blessed me with an amazing family, friends and work colleagues that have been my joy, my support, and my sanity. I don't know what I'd do without them.
quotes.author: Josie Loren

quotes.text: It's amazing. Life changes very quickly, in a very positive way, if you let it.
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.text: Christmas is the perfect time to celebrate the love of God and family and to create memories that will last forever. Jesus is God's perfect, indescribable gift. The amazing thing is that not only are we able to receive this gift, but we are able to share it with others on Christmas and every other day of the year.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: May your trails be crooked, winding, lonesome, dangerous, leading to the most amazing view. May your mountains rise into and above the clouds.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.text: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.text: It's amazing that the amount of news that happens in the world every day always just exactly fits the newspaper.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.text: I thank you God for this most amazing day, for the leaping greenly spirits of trees, and for the blue dream of sky and for everything which is natural, which is infinite, which is yes.
quotes.author: e. e. cummings

quotes.text: The connection to place, to the land, the wind, the sun, stars, the moon... it sounds romantic, but it's true - the visceral experience of motion, of moving through time on some amazing machine - a few cars touch on it, but not too many compared to motorcycles. I always felt that any motorcycle journey was special.
quotes.author: Antoine Predock

quotes.text: Outstanding leaders go out of their way to boost the self-esteem of their personnel. If people believe in themselves, it's amazing what they can accomplish.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.text: My dad was my best friend and greatest role model. He was an amazing dad, coach, mentor, soldier, husband and friend.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.text: Motherhood has most definitely changed me and my life. It's so crazy how drastic even the small details change - in such an amazing way. Even silly things, like the fact that all of my pictures on my cell phone used to be of me at photo shoots - conceited, I know! - but now every single picture on my phone is of Mason.
quotes.author: Kourtney Kardashian

quotes.text: Count your blessings. You are one of a kind. There's no one in the world like you. You are amazing.
quotes.author: Richard Simmons

quotes.text: What I've enjoyed most, though, is meeting people who have a real interest in food and sharing ideas with them. Good food is a global thing and I find that there is always something new and amazing to learn - I love it!
quotes.author: Jamie Oliver

quotes.text: What can a pencil do for all of us? Amazing things. It can write transcendent poetry, uplifting music, or life-changing equations; it can sketch the future, give life to untold beauty, and communicate the full-force of our love and aspirations.
quotes.author: Adam Braun

quotes.text: I'm not perfect. And who knows how many times I've fallen short. We all fall short. That's the amazing thing about the grace of God.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.text: Social media is an amazing tool, but it's really the face-to-face interaction that makes a long-term impact.
quotes.author: Felicia Day

quotes.text: The PC has improved the world in just about every area you can think of. Amazing developments in communications, collaboration and efficiencies. New kinds of entertainment and social media. Access to information and the ability to give a voice people who would never have been heard.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: I've prioritized taking care of my mind, having fun, and doing things that make me laugh. And eating well - as in, really good food, like steak or pasta or fresh vegetables or an amazing dessert. You know, 'treat yo'self.'
quotes.author: Phillipa Soo

quotes.text: If you tell people where to go, but not how to get there, you'll be amazed at the results.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.text: I have short goals - to get better every day, to help my teammates every day - but my only ultimate goal is to win an NBA championship. It's all that matters. I dream about it. I dream about it all the time, how it would look, how it would feel. It would be so amazing.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.text: I feel like I'm really blessed and lucky that I have a very good social life outside of the gym, and I have a really amazing family. My parents are so supportive. I have a younger brother and two younger sisters, and they're really awesome. So I feel like I get the best of both worlds.
quotes.author: Aly Raisman

quotes.text: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others; for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness; and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone.
