quotes.text: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.text: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: Our uniqueness makes us special, makes perception valuable - but it can also make us lonely. This loneliness is different from being 'alone': You can be lonely even surrounded by people. The feeling I'm talking about stems from the sense that we can never fully share the truth of who we are. I experienced this acutely at an early age.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.text: As I get older I'm more and more comfortable being alone.
quotes.author: Sienna Miller

quotes.text: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.text: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend.
quotes.author: Conor Oberst

quotes.text: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.text: Being alone & actually sitting with our own thoughts can lead to such growth and realizations that are rare in our everyday busy lives.
quotes.author: Kourtney Kardashian

quotes.text: God writes the Gospel not in the Bible alone, but also on trees, and in the flowers and clouds and stars.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: To go out with the setting sun on an empty beach is to truly embrace your solitude.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.text: Sometimes, being different feels a lot like being alone. But with that being said, being true to that and being true to my standards and my way of doing things in my art and my music, everything that has made me feel very different... in the end, it has made me the happiest.
quotes.author: Lindsey Stirling

quotes.text: Loneliness is my least favorite thing about life. The thing that I'm most worried about is just being alone without anybody to care for or someone who will care for me.
quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

quotes.text: Unlike a drop of water which loses its identity when it joins the ocean, man does not lose his being in the society in which he lives. Man's life is independent. He is born not for the development of the society alone, but for the development of his self.
quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

quotes.text: I was given such a great gift. It's a miracle that never stops amazing me and reminding me to give thanks, every day. Having a wife and daughter gives me a lot more purpose. I was much more selfish before, but now I think about what kind of role model I'll be. I just want to be a better man.
quotes.author: Jake Owen

quotes.text: We don't even know how strong we are until we are forced to bring that hidden strength forward. In times of tragedy, of war, of necessity, people do amazing things. The human capacity for survival and renewal is awesome.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.text: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.text: When you have confidence, you can have a lot of fun. And when you have fun, you can do amazing things.
quotes.author: Joe Namath

quotes.text: God has blessed me with an amazing family, friends and work colleagues that have been my joy, my support, and my sanity. I don't know what I'd do without them.
quotes.author: Josie Loren

quotes.text: It's amazing. Life changes very quickly, in a very positive way, if you let it.
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.text: Christmas is the perfect time to celebrate the love of God and family and to create memories that will last forever. Jesus is God's perfect, indescribable gift. The amazing thing is that not only are we able to receive this gift, but we are able to share it with others on Christmas and every other day of the year.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: May your trails be crooked, winding, lonesome, dangerous, leading to the most amazing view. May your mountains rise into and above the clouds.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.text: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.text: It's amazing that the amount of news that happens in the world every day always just exactly fits the newspaper.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.text: I thank you God for this most amazing day, for the leaping greenly spirits of trees, and for the blue dream of sky and for everything which is natural, which is infinite, which is yes.
quotes.author: e. e. cummings

quotes.text: The connection to place, to the land, the wind, the sun, stars, the moon... it sounds romantic, but it's true - the visceral experience of motion, of moving through time on some amazing machine - a few cars touch on it, but not too many compared to motorcycles. I always felt that any motorcycle journey was special.
quotes.author: Antoine Predock

quotes.text: Outstanding leaders go out of their way to boost the self-esteem of their personnel. If people believe in themselves, it's amazing what they can accomplish.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.text: My dad was my best friend and greatest role model. He was an amazing dad, coach, mentor, soldier, husband and friend.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.text: Motherhood has most definitely changed me and my life. It's so crazy how drastic even the small details change - in such an amazing way. Even silly things, like the fact that all of my pictures on my cell phone used to be of me at photo shoots - conceited, I know! - but now every single picture on my phone is of Mason.
quotes.author: Kourtney Kardashian

quotes.text: Count your blessings. You are one of a kind. There's no one in the world like you. You are amazing.
quotes.author: Richard Simmons

quotes.text: What I've enjoyed most, though, is meeting people who have a real interest in food and sharing ideas with them. Good food is a global thing and I find that there is always something new and amazing to learn - I love it!
quotes.author: Jamie Oliver

quotes.text: What can a pencil do for all of us? Amazing things. It can write transcendent poetry, uplifting music, or life-changing equations; it can sketch the future, give life to untold beauty, and communicate the full-force of our love and aspirations.
quotes.author: Adam Braun

quotes.text: I'm not perfect. And who knows how many times I've fallen short. We all fall short. That's the amazing thing about the grace of God.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.text: Social media is an amazing tool, but it's really the face-to-face interaction that makes a long-term impact.
quotes.author: Felicia Day

quotes.text: The PC has improved the world in just about every area you can think of. Amazing developments in communications, collaboration and efficiencies. New kinds of entertainment and social media. Access to information and the ability to give a voice people who would never have been heard.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: I've prioritized taking care of my mind, having fun, and doing things that make me laugh. And eating well - as in, really good food, like steak or pasta or fresh vegetables or an amazing dessert. You know, 'treat yo'self.'
quotes.author: Phillipa Soo

quotes.text: If you tell people where to go, but not how to get there, you'll be amazed at the results.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.text: I have short goals - to get better every day, to help my teammates every day - but my only ultimate goal is to win an NBA championship. It's all that matters. I dream about it. I dream about it all the time, how it would look, how it would feel. It would be so amazing.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.text: I feel like I'm really blessed and lucky that I have a very good social life outside of the gym, and I have a really amazing family. My parents are so supportive. I have a younger brother and two younger sisters, and they're really awesome. So I feel like I get the best of both worlds.
quotes.author: Aly Raisman

quotes.text: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: Style is a reflection of your attitude and your personality.
quotes.author: Shawn Ashmore

quotes.text: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Adopting the right attitude can convert a negative stress into a positive one.
quotes.author: Hans Selye

quotes.text: Being sexy is all about attitude, not body type. It's a state of mind.
quotes.author: Amisha Patel

quotes.text: Leadership is practiced not so much in words as in attitude and in actions.
quotes.author: Harold S. Geneen

quotes.text: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.text: Wearing the correct dress for any occasion is a matter of good manners.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.text: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me.
quotes.author: David Bailey

quotes.text: Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you, knowing that every step forward is a step toward achieving something bigger and better than your current situation.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.
quotes.author: Wade Boggs

quotes.text: I will keep smiling, be positive and never give up! I will give 100 percent each time I play. These are always my goals and my attitude.
quotes.author: Yani Tseng

quotes.text: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.text: Each day, I come in with a positive attitude, trying to get better.
quotes.author: Stefon Diggs

quotes.text: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.text: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: I believe that a trusting attitude and a patient attitude go hand in hand. You see, when you let go and learn to trust God, it releases joy in your life. And when you trust God, you're able to be more patient. Patience is not just about waiting for something... it's about how you wait, or your attitude while waiting.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.text: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.text: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.text: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
quotes.author: Scott Hamilton

quotes.text: Be sure what you want and be sure about yourself. Fashion is not just beauty, it's about good attitude. You have to believe in yourself and be strong.
quotes.author: Adriana Lima

quotes.text: There are two great days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.text: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
quotes.author: Ausonius

quotes.text: The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Today you are you! That is truer than true! There is no one alive who is you-er than you!
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Age is a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it don't matter.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.text: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: A birthday is just another day where you go to work and people give you love. Age is just a state of mind, and you are as old as you think you are. You have to count your blessings and be happy.
quotes.author: Abhishek Bachchan

quotes.text: Cakes are special. Every birthday, every celebration ends with something sweet, a cake, and people remember. It's all about the memories.
quotes.author: Buddy Valastro

quotes.text: It takes a long time to become young.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: You don't get older, you get better.
quotes.author: Shirley Bassey

quotes.text: The greatest gifts you can give your children are the roots of responsibility and the wings of independence.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: Every year on your birthday, you get a chance to start new.
quotes.author: Sammy Hagar

quotes.text: Don't just count your years, make your years count.
quotes.author: George Meredith

quotes.text: Every birthday is a gift. Every day is a gift.
quotes.author: Aretha Franklin

quotes.text: Let us celebrate the occasion with wine and sweet words.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.text: Any time women come together with a collective intention, it's a powerful thing. Whether it's sitting down making a quilt, in a kitchen preparing a meal, in a club reading the same book, or around the table playing cards, or planning a birthday party, when women come together with a collective intention, magic happens.
quotes.author: Phylicia Rashad

quotes.text: How old would you be if you didn't know how old you are?
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.text: Youth has no age.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: The great thing about getting older is that you don't lose all the other ages you've been.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.text: Most of us have fond memories of food from our childhood. Whether it was our mom's homemade lasagna or a memorable chocolate birthday cake, food has a way of transporting us back to the past.
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.text: To me - old age is always ten years older than I am.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.text: You know you're getting old when the candles cost more than the cake.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.text: The way I see it, you should live everyday like its your birthday.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.text: I enjoy the celebration of my birthday as much as anyone else does, but I always remember to start my day thanking my mom because she did most of the work the day I came into the world, not to mention all she has done throughout my life that has contributed so much to the woman I am today.
quotes.author: Christy Turlington

quotes.text: Your children need your presence more than your presents.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.text: The secret of a happy marriage is finding the right person. You know they're right if you love to be with them all the time.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.text: Love grows more tremendously full, swift, poignant, as the years multiply.
quotes.author: Zane Grey

quotes.text: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
quotes.author: Paul Sweeney

quotes.text: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: May you live as long as you wish and love as long as you live.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.text: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads, which sew people together through the years.
quotes.author: Simone Signoret

quotes.text: An anniversary is a reminder as to why you love and married this person.
quotes.author: Zoe Foster Blake

quotes.text: Some people ask the secret of our long marriage. We take time to go to a restaurant two times a week. A little candlelight, dinner, soft music and dancing. She goes Tuesdays, I go Fridays.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.text: You were made perfectly to be loved - and surely I have loved you, in the idea of you, my whole life long.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.text: Experts on romance say for a happy marriage there has to be more than a passionate love. For a lasting union, they insist, there must be a genuine liking for each other. Which, in my book, is a good definition for friendship.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: We invest less in our friendships and expect more of friends than any other relationship. We spend days working out where to book for a romantic dinner, weeks wondering how to celebrate a partner or parent's birthday, and seconds forgetting a friend's important anniversary.
quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

quotes.text: We are not the same persons this year as last; nor are those we love. It is a happy chance if we, changing, continue to love a changed person.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.text: Yes, it was love at first sight. I feel that after all these years, I have finally found my soul mate.
quotes.author: Barbara Hershey

quotes.text: I love being my husband's wife.
quotes.author: Julianna Margulies

quotes.text: Marriage is an alliance entered into by a man who can't sleep with the window shut, and a woman who can't sleep with the window open.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: One should believe in marriage as in the immortality of the soul.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: Mom and Dad were married 64 years. And if you wondered what their secret was, you could have asked the local florist - because every day Dad gave Mom a rose, which he put on her bedside table. That's how she found out what happened on the day my father died - she went looking for him because that morning, there was no rose.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: May you live all the days of your life.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.text: I believe the wedding vows are sacred and precious, and it's been one of my goals as a writer to portray the kind of marriages I've seen modeled in my family - my parents and grandparents, who all celebrated fifty-year anniversaries and well-beyond.
quotes.author: Deborah Raney

quotes.text: After about 20 years of marriage, I'm finally starting to scratch the surface of what women want. And I think the answer lies somewhere between conversation and chocolate.
quotes.author: Mel Gibson

quotes.text: In terms of my marriage, you know, falling in love with my husband was by far the best thing that's ever happened to me.
quotes.author: Caroline Kennedy

quotes.text: We concentrate so much on anniversaries and birthdays that you forget it's the Tuesday that's tough that really counts. Sometimes she just needs some flowers or even just that ear. It's the little things that count. It's the regular days of the year that you have to keep your attention on her.
quotes.author: BJ the Chicago Kid

quotes.text: I think long-lasting, healthy relationships are more important than the idea of marriage. At the root of every successful marriage is a strong partnership.
quotes.author: Carson Daly

quotes.text: I've been in love with the same woman for forty-one years. If my wife finds out, she'll kill me.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.text: Marriage is the most natural state of man, and... the state in which you will find solid happiness.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: I dated a lot, but I never really had anyone who was worthy of an anniversary. And most girlfriends never made it to a year, anyway.
quotes.author: Wale

quotes.text: All I ask is the chance to prove that money can't make me happy.
quotes.author: Spike Milligan

quotes.text: The biggest risk is not taking any risk... In a world that changing really quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.text: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.text: A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: To reminisce with my old friends, a chance to share some memories, and play our songs again.
quotes.author: Ricky Nelson

quotes.text: Growth is never by mere chance; it is the result of forces working together.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.text: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and diligence.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.text: Every year on your birthday, you get a chance to start new.
quotes.author: Sammy Hagar

quotes.text: Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: Tea time is a chance to slow down, pull back and appreciate our surroundings.
quotes.author: Letitia Baldrige

quotes.text: Being brave means to know something is scary, difficult, and dangerous, and doing it anyway, because the possibility of winning the fight is worth the chance of losing it.
quotes.author: Emilie Autumn

quotes.text: Forgiveness says you are given another chance to make a new beginning.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.text: You have to take risks. We will only understand the miracle of life fully when we allow the unexpected to happen.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: I don't want to miss out on the chance of having a good time.
quotes.author: Victor Webster

quotes.text: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: There are risks and costs to action. But they are far less than the long range risks of comfortable inaction.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: The art of war teaches us to rely not on the likelihood of the enemy's not coming, but on our own readiness to receive him; not on the chance of his not attacking, but rather on the fact that we have made our position unassailable.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.text: Our greatest happiness does not depend on the condition of life in which chance has placed us, but is always the result of a good conscience, good health, occupation, and freedom in all just pursuits.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: America is the land of the second chance - and when the gates of the prison open, the path ahead should lead to a better life.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.text: People do make mistakes and I think they should be punished. But they should be forgiven and given the opportunity for a second chance. We are human beings.
quotes.author: David Millar

quotes.text: The world is so unpredictable. Things happen suddenly, unexpectedly. We want to feel we are in control of our own existence. In some ways we are, in some ways we're not. We are ruled by the forces of chance and coincidence.
quotes.author: Paul Auster

quotes.text: If you go around being afraid, you're never going to enjoy life. You have only one chance, so you've got to have fun.
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.text: Freedom is nothing but a chance to be better.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: The risk of a wrong decision is preferable to the terror of indecision.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.text: We are not the same persons this year as last; nor are those we love. It is a happy chance if we, changing, continue to love a changed person.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.text: I was given such a great gift. It's a miracle that never stops amazing me and reminding me to give thanks, every day. Having a wife and daughter gives me a lot more purpose. I was much more selfish before, but now I think about what kind of role model I'll be. I just want to be a better man.

quotes.text: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.

quotes.text: When you have confidence, you can have a lot of fun. And when you have fun, you can do amazing things.
quotes.author: Joe Namath

quotes.text: God has blessed me with an amazing family, friends and work colleagues that have been my joy, my support, and my sanity. I don't know what I'd do without them.

quotes.author: Aly Raisman

quotes.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.text: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Nobody can predict the future. You just have to give your all to the relationship you're in and do your best to take care of your partner, communicate and give them every last drop of love you have. I think one of the most important things in a relationship is caring for your significant other through good times and bad.
quotes.author: Nick Cannon

quotes.text: My life motto is 'Do my best, so that I can't blame myself for anything.'
quotes.author: Magdalena Neuner

quotes.text: Ultimately, leadership is not about glorious crowning acts. It's about keeping your team focused on a goal and motivated to do their best to achieve it, especially when the stakes are high and the consequences really matter. It is about laying the groundwork for others' success, and then standing back and letting them shine.
quotes.author: Chris Hadfield

quotes.text: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.text: She's always there for me when I need her; She's my best friend; she's just my everything.
quotes.author: Ashley Olsen

quotes.text: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
quotes.author: George Allen, Sr.

quotes.text: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: At the end of the day, life is about being happy being who you are, and I feel like we are so blessed to have the support system and the best family to really just support each other no matter what we're going through.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.text: Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.text: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.text: It's not that diamonds are a girl's best friend, but it's your best friends who are your diamonds. It's your best friends who are supremely resilient, made under pressure and of astonishing value. They're everlasting; they can cut glass if they need to.
quotes.author: Gina Barreca

quotes.text: I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: My dream is of a place and a time where America will once again be seen as the last best hope of earth.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: Technology can be our best friend, and technology can also be the biggest party pooper of our lives. It interrupts our own story, interrupts our ability to have a thought or a daydream, to imagine something wonderful, because we're too busy bridging the walk from the cafeteria back to the office on the cell phone.
quotes.author: Steven Spielberg

quotes.text: The actions of men are the best interpreters of their thoughts.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.text: I was given such a great gift. It's a miracle that never stops amazing me and reminding me to give thanks, every day. Having a wife and daughter gives me a lot more purpose. I was much more selfish before, but now I think about what kind of role model I'll be. I just want to be a better man.
quotes.author: Jake Owen

quotes.text: We don't even know how strong we are until we are forced to bring that hidden strength forward. In times of tragedy, of war, of necessity, people do amazing things. The human capacity for survival and renewal is awesome.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.text: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.text: When you have confidence, you can have a lot of fun. And when you have fun, you can do amazing things.
quotes.author: Joe Namath

quotes.text: God has blessed me with an amazing family, friends and work colleagues that have been my joy, my support, and my sanity. I don't know what I'd do without them.
quotes.author: Josie Loren

quotes.text: It's amazing. Life changes very quickly, in a very positive way, if you let it.
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.text: Christmas is the perfect time to celebrate the love of God and family and to create memories that will last forever. Jesus is God's perfect, indescribable gift. The amazing thing is that not only are we able to receive this gift, but we are able to share it with others on Christmas and every other day of the year.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: May your trails be crooked, winding, lonesome, dangerous, leading to the most amazing view. May your mountains rise into and above the clouds.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.text: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.text: It's amazing that the amount of news that happens in the world every day always just exactly fits the newspaper.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.text: I thank you God for this most amazing day, for the leaping greenly spirits of trees, and for the blue dream of sky and for everything which is natural, which is infinite, which is yes.
quotes.author: e. e. cummings

quotes.text: The connection to place, to the land, the wind, the sun, stars, the moon... it sounds romantic, but it's true - the visceral experience of motion, of moving through time on some amazing machine - a few cars touch on it, but not too many compared to motorcycles. I always felt that any motorcycle journey was special.
quotes.author: Antoine Predock

quotes.text: Outstanding leaders go out of their way to boost the self-esteem of their personnel. If people believe in themselves, it's amazing what they can accomplish.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.text: My dad was my best friend and greatest role model. He was an amazing dad, coach, mentor, soldier, husband and friend.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.text: Motherhood has most definitely changed me and my life. It's so crazy how drastic even the small details change - in such an amazing way. Even silly things, like the fact that all of my pictures on my cell phone used to be of me at photo shoots - conceited, I know! - but now every single picture on my phone is of Mason.
quotes.author: Kourtney Kardashian

quotes.text: Count your blessings. You are one of a kind. There's no one in the world like you. You are amazing.
quotes.author: Richard Simmons

quotes.text: What I've enjoyed most, though, is meeting people who have a real interest in food and sharing ideas with them. Good food is a global thing and I find that there is always something new and amazing to learn - I love it!
quotes.author: Jamie Oliver

quotes.text: What can a pencil do for all of us? Amazing things. It can write transcendent poetry, uplifting music, or life-changing equations; it can sketch the future, give life to untold beauty, and communicate the full-force of our love and aspirations.
quotes.author: Adam Braun

quotes.text: I'm not perfect. And who knows how many times I've fallen short. We all fall short. That's the amazing thing about the grace of God.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.text: Social media is an amazing tool, but it's really the face-to-face interaction that makes a long-term impact.
quotes.author: Felicia Day

quotes.text: The PC has improved the world in just about every area you can think of. Amazing developments in communications, collaboration and efficiencies. New kinds of entertainment and social media. Access to information and the ability to give a voice people who would never have been heard.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: I've prioritized taking care of my mind, having fun, and doing things that make me laugh. And eating well - as in, really good food, like steak or pasta or fresh vegetables or an amazing dessert. You know, 'treat yo'self.'
quotes.author: Phillipa Soo

quotes.text: If you tell people where to go, but not how to get there, you'll be amazed at the results.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.text: I have short goals - to get better every day, to help my teammates every day - but my only ultimate goal is to win an NBA championship. It's all that matters. I dream about it. I dream about it all the time, how it would look, how it would feel. It would be so amazing.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.text: I feel like I'm really blessed and lucky that I have a very good social life outside of the gym, and I have a really amazing family. My parents are so supportive. I have a younger brother and two younger sisters, and they're really awesome. So I feel like I get the best of both worlds.
quotes.author: Aly Raisman

quotes.text: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.text: Every day we have plenty of opportunities to get angry, stressed or offended. But what you're doing when you indulge these negative emotions is giving something outside yourself power over your happiness. You can choose to not let little things upset you.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: For every minute you remain angry, you give up sixty seconds of peace of mind.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Red is such an interesting color to correlate with emotion, because it's on both ends of the spectrum. On one end you have happiness, falling in love, infatuation with someone, passion, all that. On the other end, you've got obsession, jealousy, danger, fear, anger and frustration.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.text: Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.text: While seeking revenge, dig two graves - one for yourself.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.text: In times of great stress or adversity, it's always best to keep busy, to plow your anger and your energy into something positive.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.text: When anger rises, think of the consequences.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Anybody can become angry - that is easy, but to be angry with the right person and to the right degree and at the right time and for the right purpose, and in the right way - that is not within everybody's power and is not easy.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Anger is the enemy of non-violence and pride is a monster that swallows it up.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Anger is an acid that can do more harm to the vessel in which it is stored than to anything on which it is poured.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: I really believe that all of us have a lot of darkness in our souls. Anger, rage, fear, sadness. I don't think that's only reserved for people who have horrible upbringings. I think it really exists and is part of the human condition. I think in the course of your life you figure out ways to deal with that.
quotes.author: Kevin Bacon

quotes.text: Some days, 24 hours is too much to stay put in, so I take the day hour by hour, moment by moment. I break the task, the challenge, the fear into small, bite-size pieces. I can handle a piece of fear, depression, anger, pain, sadness, loneliness, illness. I actually put my hands up to my face, one next to each eye, like blinders on a horse.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.text: I don't usually lose my temper, but if I get angry, it's true - I'm scary.
quotes.author: Eva Mendes

quotes.text: Anger and intolerance are the enemies of correct understanding.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: People won't have time for you if you are always angry or complaining.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: Discussion is an exchange of knowledge; an argument an exchange of ignorance.
quotes.author: Robert Quillen

quotes.text: I realized that if my thoughts immediately affect my body, I should be careful about what I think. Now if I get angry, I ask myself why I feel that way. If I can find the source of my anger, I can turn that negative energy into something positive.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.text: To be angry is to revenge the faults of others on ourselves.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.text: Too much self-centered attitude, you see, brings, you see, isolation. Result: loneliness, fear, anger. The extreme self-centered attitude is the source of suffering.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems - not people; to focus your energies on answers - not excuses.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: Silence is one of the hardest arguments to refute.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: Censorship is the tool of those who have the need to hide actualities from themselves and from others. Their fear is only their inability to face what is real, and I can't vent any anger against them; I only feel this appalling sadness. Somewhere in their upbringing, they were shielded against the total facts of our existence.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.text: Boredom, anger, sadness, or fear are not 'yours,' not personal. They are conditions of the human mind. They come and go. Nothing that comes and goes is you.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: Style is a reflection of your attitude and your personality.
quotes.author: Shawn Ashmore

quotes.text: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Adopting the right attitude can convert a negative stress into a positive one.
quotes.author: Hans Selye

quotes.text: Being sexy is all about attitude, not body type. It's a state of mind.
quotes.author: Amisha Patel

quotes.text: Leadership is practiced not so much in words as in attitude and in actions.
quotes.author: Harold S. Geneen

quotes.text: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.text: Wearing the correct dress for any occasion is a matter of good manners.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.text: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me.
quotes.author: David Bailey

quotes.text: Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you, knowing that every step forward is a step toward achieving something bigger and better than your current situation.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.
quotes.author: Wade Boggs

quotes.text: I will keep smiling, be positive and never give up! I will give 100 percent each time I play. These are always my goals and my attitude.
quotes.author: Yani Tseng

quotes.text: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.text: Each day, I come in with a positive attitude, trying to get better.
quotes.author: Stefon Diggs

quotes.text: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.text: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: I believe that a trusting attitude and a patient attitude go hand in hand. You see, when you let go and learn to trust God, it releases joy in your life. And when you trust God, you're able to be more patient. Patience is not just about waiting for something... it's about how you wait, or your attitude while waiting.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.text: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.text: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.text: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
quotes.author: Scott Hamilton

quotes.text: Be sure what you want and be sure about yourself. Fashion is not just beauty, it's about good attitude. You have to believe in yourself and be strong.
quotes.author: Adriana Lima

quotes.text: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.text: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.text: There is nothing permanent except change.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.text: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.text: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Gratitude can transform common days into thanksgivings, turn routine jobs into joy, and change ordinary opportunities into blessings.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Just when I think I have learned the way to live, life changes.
quotes.author: Hugh Prather

quotes.text: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Art, freedom and creativity will change society faster than politics.
quotes.author: Victor Pinchuk

quotes.text: If there is no struggle, there is no progress.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.text: When you forgive, you in no way change the past - but you sure do change the future.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.text: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: Every human has four endowments - self awareness, conscience, independent will and creative imagination. These give us the ultimate human freedom... The power to choose, to respond, to change.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: I can't change my personality. I'll always smile, but I'll be more focused.
quotes.author: Katarina Johnson-Thompson

quotes.text: Saving our planet, lifting people out of poverty, advancing economic growth... these are one and the same fight. We must connect the dots between climate change, water scarcity, energy shortages, global health, food security and women's empowerment. Solutions to one problem must be solutions for all.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.text: My theory on life is that life is beautiful. Life doesn't change. You have a day, and a night, and a month, and a year. We people change - we can be miserable or we can be happy. It's what you make of your life.
quotes.author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum

quotes.text: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: Change before you have to.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.text: Change is the end result of all true learning.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.text: All I ask is the chance to prove that money can't make me happy.
quotes.author: Spike Milligan

quotes.text: The biggest risk is not taking any risk... In a world that changing really quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.text: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.text: A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: To reminisce with my old friends, a chance to share some memories, and play our songs again.
quotes.author: Ricky Nelson

quotes.text: Growth is never by mere chance; it is the result of forces working together.
quotes.author: James Cash Penney

quotes.text: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and diligence.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.text: Every year on your birthday, you get a chance to start new.
quotes.author: Sammy Hagar

quotes.text: Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: Tea time is a chance to slow down, pull back and appreciate our surroundings.
quotes.author: Letitia Baldrige

quotes.text: Being brave means to know something is scary, difficult, and dangerous, and doing it anyway, because the possibility of winning the fight is worth the chance of losing it.
quotes.author: Emilie Autumn

quotes.text: Forgiveness says you are given another chance to make a new beginning.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.text: You have to take risks. We will only understand the miracle of life fully when we allow the unexpected to happen.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: I don't want to miss out on the chance of having a good time.
quotes.author: Victor Webster

quotes.text: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: There are risks and costs to action. But they are far less than the long range risks of comfortable inaction.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: The art of war teaches us to rely not on the likelihood of the enemy's not coming, but on our own readiness to receive him; not on the chance of his not attacking, but rather on the fact that we have made our position unassailable.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.text: Our greatest happiness does not depend on the condition of life in which chance has placed us, but is always the result of a good conscience, good health, occupation, and freedom in all just pursuits.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: America is the land of the second chance - and when the gates of the prison open, the path ahead should lead to a better life.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.text: People do make mistakes and I think they should be punished. But they should be forgiven and given the opportunity for a second chance. We are human beings.
quotes.author: David Millar

quotes.text: The world is so unpredictable. Things happen suddenly, unexpectedly. We want to feel we are in control of our own existence. In some ways we are, in some ways we're not. We are ruled by the forces of chance and coincidence.
quotes.author: Paul Auster

quotes.text: If you go around being afraid, you're never going to enjoy life. You have only one chance, so you've got to have fun.
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.text: Freedom is nothing but a chance to be better.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: The risk of a wrong decision is preferable to the terror of indecision.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.text: We are not the same persons this year as last; nor are those we love. It is a happy chance if we, changing, continue to love a changed person.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.text: The secret of a happy marriage is finding the right person. You know they're right if you love to be with them all the time.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.text: Love grows more tremendously full, swift, poignant, as the years multiply.
quotes.author: Zane Grey

quotes.text: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
quotes.author: Paul Sweeney

quotes.text: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: May you live as long as you wish and love as long as you live.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.text: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads, which sew people together through the years.
quotes.author: Simone Signoret

quotes.text: An anniversary is a reminder as to why you love and married this person.
quotes.author: Zoe Foster Blake

quotes.text: Some people ask the secret of our long marriage. We take time to go to a restaurant two times a week. A little candlelight, dinner, soft music and dancing. She goes Tuesdays, I go Fridays.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.text: You were made perfectly to be loved - and surely I have loved you, in the idea of you, my whole life long.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quotes.text: Experts on romance say for a happy marriage there has to be more than a passionate love. For a lasting union, they insist, there must be a genuine liking for each other. Which, in my book, is a good definition for friendship.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: We invest less in our friendships and expect more of friends than any other relationship. We spend days working out where to book for a romantic dinner, weeks wondering how to celebrate a partner or parent's birthday, and seconds forgetting a friend's important anniversary.
quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

quotes.text: We are not the same persons this year as last; nor are those we love. It is a happy chance if we, changing, continue to love a changed person.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.text: Yes, it was love at first sight. I feel that after all these years, I have finally found my soul mate.
quotes.author: Barbara Hershey

quotes.text: I love being my husband's wife.
quotes.author: Julianna Margulies

quotes.text: Marriage is an alliance entered into by a man who can't sleep with the window shut, and a woman who can't sleep with the window open.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: One should believe in marriage as in the immortality of the soul.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: Mom and Dad were married 64 years. And if you wondered what their secret was, you could have asked the local florist - because every day Dad gave Mom a rose, which he put on her bedside table. That's how she found out what happened on the day my father died - she went looking for him because that morning, there was no rose.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.text: May you live all the days of your life.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.text: I believe the wedding vows are sacred and precious, and it's been one of my goals as a writer to portray the kind of marriages I've seen modeled in my family - my parents and grandparents, who all celebrated fifty-year anniversaries and well-beyond.
quotes.author: Deborah Raney

quotes.text: After about 20 years of marriage, I'm finally starting to scratch the surface of what women want. And I think the answer lies somewhere between conversation and chocolate.
quotes.author: Mel Gibson

quotes.text: In terms of my marriage, you know, falling in love with my husband was by far the best thing that's ever happened to me.
quotes.author: Caroline Kennedy

quotes.text: We concentrate so much on anniversaries and birthdays that you forget it's the Tuesday that's tough that really counts. Sometimes she just needs some flowers or even just that ear. It's the little things that count. It's the regular days of the year that you have to keep your attention on her.
quotes.author: BJ the Chicago Kid

quotes.text: I think long-lasting, healthy relationships are more important than the idea of marriage. At the root of every successful marriage is a strong partnership.
quotes.author: Carson Daly

quotes.text: I've been in love with the same woman for forty-one years. If my wife finds out, she'll kill me.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.text: Marriage is the most natural state of man, and... the state in which you will find solid happiness.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: I dated a lot, but I never really had anyone who was worthy of an anniversary. And most girlfriends never made it to a year, anyway.
quotes.author: Wale

quotes.text: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.text: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.text: There is nothing permanent except change.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.text: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.text: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Gratitude can transform common days into thanksgivings, turn routine jobs into joy, and change ordinary opportunities into blessings.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.text: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Just when I think I have learned the way to live, life changes.
quotes.author: Hugh Prather

quotes.text: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Art, freedom and creativity will change society faster than politics.
quotes.author: Victor Pinchuk

quotes.text: If there is no struggle, there is no progress.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.text: When you forgive, you in no way change the past - but you sure do change the future.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.text: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: Every human has four endowments - self awareness, conscience, independent will and creative imagination. These give us the ultimate human freedom... The power to choose, to respond, to change.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: I can't change my personality. I'll always smile, but I'll be more focused.
quotes.author: Katarina Johnson-Thompson

quotes.text: Saving our planet, lifting people out of poverty, advancing economic growth... these are one and the same fight. We must connect the dots between climate change, water scarcity, energy shortages, global health, food security and women's empowerment. Solutions to one problem must be solutions for all.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.text: My theory on life is that life is beautiful. Life doesn't change. You have a day, and a night, and a month, and a year. We people change - we can be miserable or we can be happy. It's what you make of your life.
quotes.author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum

quotes.text: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: Change before you have to.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.text: Change is the end result of all true learning.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.text: When a man opens a car door for his wife, it's either a new car or a new wife.
quotes.author: Prince Philip

quotes.text: There's three things men always talk about - women, sports, and cars.
quotes.author: Mario Lopez

quotes.text: I couldn't find the sports car of my dreams, so I built it myself.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Porsche

quotes.text: The cars we drive say a lot about us.
quotes.author: Alexandra Paul

quotes.text: See, when you drive home today, you've got a big windshield on the front of your car. And you've got a little bitty rearview mirror. And the reason the windshield is so large and the rearview mirror is so small is because what's happened in your past is not near as important as what's in your future.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
quotes.author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.text: It's a never ending battle of making your cars better and also trying to be better yourself.
quotes.author: Dale Earnhardt

quotes.text: The fact is I don't drive just to get from A to B. I enjoy feeling the car's reactions, becoming part of it.
quotes.author: Enzo Ferrari

quotes.text: Maybe the bike is more dangerous, but the passion for the car for me is second to the bike.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: Just as your car runs more smoothly and requires less energy to go faster and farther when the wheels are in perfect alignment, you perform better when your thoughts, feelings, emotions, goals, and values are in balance.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Cars are the sculptures of our everyday lives.
quotes.author: Chris Bangle

quotes.text: I've always been asked, 'What is my favorite car?' and I've always said 'The next one.'
quotes.author: Carroll Shelby

quotes.text: The connection to place, to the land, the wind, the sun, stars, the moon... it sounds romantic, but it's true - the visceral experience of motion, of moving through time on some amazing machine - a few cars touch on it, but not too many compared to motorcycles. I always felt that any motorcycle journey was special.
quotes.author: Antoine Predock

quotes.text: I am thankful the most important key in history was invented. It's not the key to your house, your car, your boat, your safety deposit box, your bike lock or your private community. It's the key to order, sanity, and peace of mind. The key is 'Delete.'
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.text: Giving money and power to government is like giving whiskey and car keys to teenage boys.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.text: It's like driving a car at night. You never see further than your headlights, but you can make the whole trip that way.
quotes.author: E. L. Doctorow

quotes.text: Everything in life is somewhere else, and you get there in a car.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.text: I race to win. If I am on the bike or in a car it will always be the same.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: Shoes make an outfit; they're like rims for a car.
quotes.author: Omari Hardwick

quotes.text: Television, radio, social media. The 24/7 news cycle plows forward mercilessly on our desks, in our cars and in our pockets. Thousands and thousands of messages and voices bombard us from the moment we wake, fighting for our attention. All we see and hear, all day long, is news. And most of it is bad.
quotes.author: Joseph Prince

quotes.text: Never have more children than you have car windows.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.text: We don't need bigger cars or fancier clothes. We need self-respect, identity, community, love, variety, beauty, challenge and a purpose in living that is greater than material accumulation.
quotes.author: Donella Meadows

quotes.text: My mother is a big believer in being responsible for your own happiness. She always talked about finding joy in small moments and insisted that we stop and take in the beauty of an ordinary day. When I stop the car to make my kids really see a sunset, I hear my mother's voice and smile.
quotes.author: Jennifer Garner

quotes.text: The best car safety device is a rear-view mirror with a cop in it.
quotes.author: Dudley Moore

quotes.text: A racing car is an animal with a thousand adjustments.
quotes.author: Mario Andretti

quotes.text: My very best friend died in a car accident when I was 16 years old. That was the hardest blow emotionally that I have ever had to endure. Suddenly, you realize tomorrow might not come. Now I live by the motto, 'Today is what I have.'
quotes.author: Amber Heard

quotes.text: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.text: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace.
quotes.author: Christie Brinkley

quotes.text: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
quotes.author: John Ray

quotes.text: Lighten up, just enjoy life, smile more, laugh more, and don't get so worked up about things.
quotes.author: Kenneth Branagh

quotes.text: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.text: Peace is the beauty of life. It is sunshine. It is the smile of a child, the love of a mother, the joy of a father, the togetherness of a family. It is the advancement of man, the victory of a just cause, the triumph of truth.
quotes.author: Menachem Begin

quotes.text: Nothing you wear is more important than your smile.
quotes.author: Connie Stevens

quotes.text: Smile, it is the key that fits the lock of everybody's heart.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.text: The greatest self is a peaceful smile, that always sees the world smiling back.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.text: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.text: Peace begins with a smile.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Your smile will give you a positive countenance that will make people feel comfortable around you.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: A warm smile is the universal language of kindness.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.text: My children are the reason I laugh, smile and want to get up every morning.
quotes.author: Gena Lee Nolin

quotes.text: We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but they whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves their conduct, will pursue their principles unto death.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: I never get tired of smiling. I'm just the kind of guy who likes to smile.
quotes.author: Jason Ritter

quotes.text: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: A smile is happiness you'll find right under your nose.
quotes.author: Tom Wilson

quotes.text: Smiling is definitely one of the best beauty remedies. If you have a good sense of humor and a good approach to life, that's beautiful.
quotes.author: Rashida Jones

quotes.text: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.text: I can't change my personality. I'll always smile, but I'll be more focused.
quotes.author: Katarina Johnson-Thompson

quotes.text: Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.text: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: My best friend is the one who brings out the best in me.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Nobody can predict the future. You just have to give your all to the relationship you're in and do your best to take care of your partner, communicate and give them every last drop of love you have. I think one of the most important things in a relationship is caring for your significant other through good times and bad.
quotes.author: Nick Cannon

quotes.text: My life motto is 'Do my best, so that I can't blame myself for anything.'
quotes.author: Magdalena Neuner

quotes.text: Ultimately, leadership is not about glorious crowning acts. It's about keeping your team focused on a goal and motivated to do their best to achieve it, especially when the stakes are high and the consequences really matter. It is about laying the groundwork for others' success, and then standing back and letting them shine.
quotes.author: Chris Hadfield

quotes.text: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.text: She's always there for me when I need her; She's my best friend; she's just my everything.
quotes.author: Ashley Olsen

quotes.text: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
quotes.author: George Allen, Sr.

quotes.text: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: At the end of the day, life is about being happy being who you are, and I feel like we are so blessed to have the support system and the best family to really just support each other no matter what we're going through.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.text: Things are never quite as scary when you've got a best friend.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.text: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.text: It's not that diamonds are a girl's best friend, but it's your best friends who are your diamonds. It's your best friends who are supremely resilient, made under pressure and of astonishing value. They're everlasting; they can cut glass if they need to.
quotes.author: Gina Barreca

quotes.text: I believe in pink. I believe that laughing is the best calorie burner. I believe in kissing, kissing a lot. I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: My dream is of a place and a time where America will once again be seen as the last best hope of earth.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: Technology can be our best friend, and technology can also be the biggest party pooper of our lives. It interrupts our own story, interrupts our ability to have a thought or a daydream, to imagine something wonderful, because we're too busy bridging the walk from the cafeteria back to the office on the cell phone.
quotes.author: Steven Spielberg

quotes.text: The actions of men are the best interpreters of their thoughts.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.text: You build on failure. You use it as a stepping stone. Close the door on the past. You don't try to forget the mistakes, but you don't dwell on it. You don't let it have any of your energy, or any of your time, or any of your space.
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.text: Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.text: The Universe is under no obligation to make sense to you.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.text: I believe in Liberty for all men: the space to stretch their arms and their souls, the right to breathe and the right to vote, the freedom to choose their friends, enjoy the sunshine, and ride on the railroads, uncursed by color; thinking, dreaming, working as they will in a kingdom of beauty and love.
quotes.author: W. E. B. Du Bois

quotes.text: The real lover is the man who can thrill you just by touching your head or smiling into your eyes - or just by staring into space.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: If your ego starts out, 'I am important, I am big, I am special,' you're in for some disappointments when you look around at what we've discovered about the universe. No, you're not big. No, you're not. You're small in time and in space. And you have this frail vessel called the human body that's limited on Earth.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.text: There is always space for improvement, no matter how long you've been in the business.
quotes.author: Oscar De La Hoya

quotes.text: I would like to die on Mars. Just not on impact.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: We need to give each other the space to grow, to be ourselves, to exercise our diversity. We need to give each other space so that we may both give and receive such beautiful things as ideas, openness, dignity, joy, healing, and inclusion.
quotes.author: Max de Pree

quotes.text: Modern science says: 'The sun is the past, the earth is the present, the moon is the future.' From an incandescent mass we have originated, and into a frozen mass we shall turn. Merciless is the law of nature, and rapidly and irresistibly we are drawn to our doom.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.text: That's one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.text: Who are we? We find that we live on an insignificant planet of a humdrum star lost in a galaxy tucked away in some forgotten corner of a universe in which there are far more galaxies than people.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.text: Between stimulus and response there is a space. In that space is our power to choose our response. In our response lies our growth and our freedom.
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.text: Architecture is the thoughtful making of space.
quotes.author: Louis Kahn

quotes.text: Make an empty space in any corner of your mind, and creativity will instantly fill it.
quotes.author: Dee Hock

quotes.text: When we contemplate the whole globe as one great dewdrop, striped and dotted with continents and islands, flying through space with other stars all singing and shining together as one, the whole universe appears as an infinite storm of beauty.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.text: There may be aliens in our Milky Way galaxy, and there are billions of other galaxies. The probability is almost certain that there is life somewhere in space.
quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

quotes.text: In almost every profession - whether it's law or journalism, finance or medicine or academia or running a small business - people rely on confidential communications to do their jobs. We count on the space of trust that confidentiality provides. When someone breaches that trust, we are all worse off for it.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.text: Although the life of a person is in a land full of thorns and weeds, there is always a space in which the good seed can grow. You have to trust God.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.text: Your sacred space is where you can find yourself again and again.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: For the wise man looks into space and he knows there is no limited dimensions.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: The original idea of the web was that it should be a collaborative space where you can communicate through sharing information.
quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.text: Many a trip continues long after movement in time and space have ceased.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.text: The moon is a friend for the lonesome to talk to.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.text: Do you realize that if you fall into a black hole, you will see the entire future of the Universe unfold in front of you in a matter of moments and you will emerge into another space-time created by the singularity of the black hole you just fell into?
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.text: When all else is lost, the future still remains.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.text: All wish to possess knowledge, but few, comparatively speaking, are willing to pay the price.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.text: Insanity: doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The actions of men are the best interpreters of their thoughts.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.text: I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: It is better to keep your mouth closed and let people think you are a fool than to open it and remove all doubt.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
