quotes.text: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Autumn is a second spring when every leaf is a flower.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: Just living is not enough... one must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.text: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: I have seen many storms in my life. Most storms have caught me by surprise, so I had to learn very quickly to look further and understand that I am not capable of controlling the weather, to exercise the art of patience and to respect the fury of nature.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.text: The woods are lovely, dark and deep. But I have promises to keep, and miles to go before I sleep.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.text: Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.text: The family is one of nature's masterpieces.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.text: We still do not know one thousandth of one percent of what nature has revealed to us.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: We need to find God, and he cannot be found in noise and restlessness. God is the friend of silence. See how nature - trees, flowers, grass- grows in silence; see the stars, the moon and the sun, how they move in silence... We need silence to be able to touch souls.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Every flower is a soul blossoming in nature.
quotes.author: Gerard De Nerval

quotes.text: Keep close to Nature's heart... and break clear away, once in awhile, and climb a mountain or spend a week in the woods. Wash your spirit clean.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.text: So many times, people told me I can't do this or can't do that. My nature is that I don't listen very well. I'm very determined, and I believe in myself. My parents brought me up that way. Thank God for that. I don't let anything stand in my way.
quotes.author: Chantal Sutherland

quotes.text: Miracles do not, in fact, break the laws of nature.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: Delicious autumn! My very soul is wedded to it, and if I were a bird I would fly about the earth seeking the successive autumns.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: Nature is the art of God.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.text: Sunset is still my favorite color, and rainbow is second.
quotes.author: Mattie Stepanek

quotes.text: Joy in looking and comprehending is nature's most beautiful gift.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Over every mountain there is a path, although it may not be seen from the valley.
quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

quotes.text: Green is the prime color of the world, and that from which its loveliness arises.
quotes.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quotes.text: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.text: Nature... is nothing but the inner voice of self-interest.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.text: The sky broke like an egg into full sunset and the water caught fire.
quotes.author: Pamela Hansford Johnson

quotes.text: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: Style is a reflection of your attitude and your personality.
quotes.author: Shawn Ashmore

quotes.text: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Adopting the right attitude can convert a negative stress into a positive one.
quotes.author: Hans Selye

quotes.text: Being sexy is all about attitude, not body type. It's a state of mind.
quotes.author: Amisha Patel

quotes.text: Leadership is practiced not so much in words as in attitude and in actions.
quotes.author: Harold S. Geneen

quotes.text: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.text: Wearing the correct dress for any occasion is a matter of good manners.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.text: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me.
quotes.author: David Bailey

quotes.text: Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you, knowing that every step forward is a step toward achieving something bigger and better than your current situation.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.
quotes.author: Wade Boggs

quotes.text: I will keep smiling, be positive and never give up! I will give 100 percent each time I play. These are always my goals and my attitude.
quotes.author: Yani Tseng

quotes.text: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.text: Each day, I come in with a positive attitude, trying to get better.
quotes.author: Stefon Diggs

quotes.text: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.text: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: I believe that a trusting attitude and a patient attitude go hand in hand. You see, when you let go and learn to trust God, it releases joy in your life. And when you trust God, you're able to be more patient. Patience is not just about waiting for something... it's about how you wait, or your attitude while waiting.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.text: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.text: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.text: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
quotes.author: Scott Hamilton

quotes.text: Be sure what you want and be sure about yourself. Fashion is not just beauty, it's about good attitude. You have to believe in yourself and be strong.
quotes.author: Adriana Lima

quotes.text: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically. Intelligence plus character - that is the goal of true education.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence wins championships.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Continuous effort - not strength or intelligence - is the key to unlocking our potential.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Joy in looking and comprehending is nature's most beautiful gift.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: There is no great genius without some touch of madness.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Talent hits a target no one else can hit; Genius hits a target no one else can see.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.text: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: A smart man makes a mistake, learns from it, and never makes that mistake again. But a wise man finds a smart man and learns from him how to avoid the mistake altogether.
quotes.author: Roy H. Williams

quotes.text: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.text: I know that I am intelligent, because I know that I know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Promise me you'll always remember: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.text: Character is higher than intellect. A great soul will be strong to live as well as think.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: An intelligent man is sometimes forced to be drunk to spend time with his fools.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: Science has not yet taught us if madness is or is not the sublimity of the intelligence.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.text: Being busy does not always mean real work. The object of all work is production or accomplishment and to either of these ends there must be forethought, system, planning, intelligence, and honest purpose, as well as perspiration. Seeming to do is not doing.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.text: Your intellect may be confused, but your emotions will never lie to you.
quotes.author: Roger Ebert

quotes.text: I believe alien life is quite common in the universe, although intelligent life is less so. Some say it has yet to appear on planet Earth.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: Be as smart as you can, but remember that it is always better to be wise than to be smart.
quotes.author: Alan Alda

quotes.text: Thinking is the hardest work there is, which is probably the reason why so few engage in it.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: I thank God that I'm a product of my parents. That they infected me with their intelligence and energy for life, with their thirst for knowledge and their love. I'm grateful that I know where I come from.
quotes.author: Shakira

quotes.text: To expect the unexpected shows a thoroughly modern intellect.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Intelligence, knowledge or experience are important and might get you a job, but strong communication skills are what will get you promoted.
quotes.author: Mireille Guiliano

quotes.text: If everyone is thinking alike, then somebody isn't thinking.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.text: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.text: Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Teaching is a very noble profession that shapes the character, caliber, and future of an individual. If the people remember me as a good teacher, that will be the biggest honour for me.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: Education is the key to success in life, and teachers make a lasting impact in the lives of their students.
quotes.author: Solomon Ortiz

quotes.text: If a country is to be corruption free and become a nation of beautiful minds, I strongly feel there are three key societal members who can make a difference. They are the father, the mother and the teacher.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.text: My father was my teacher. But most importantly he was a great dad.
quotes.author: Beau Bridges

quotes.text: Heroes represent the best of ourselves, respecting that we are human beings. A hero can be anyone from Gandhi to your classroom teacher, anyone who can show courage when faced with a problem. A hero is someone who is willing to help others in his or her best capacity.
quotes.author: Ricky Martin

quotes.text: Good teachers know how to bring out the best in students.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.text: Technology is just a tool. In terms of getting the kids working together and motivating them, the teacher is the most important.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: The task of the modern educator is not to cut down jungles, but to irrigate deserts.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: I am a teacher. It's how I define myself. A good teacher isn't someone who gives the answers out to their kids but is understanding of needs and challenges and gives tools to help other people succeed. That's the way I see myself, so whatever it is that I will do eventually after politics, it'll have to do a lot with teaching.
quotes.author: Justin Trudeau

quotes.text: Everyone who remembers his own education remembers teachers, not methods and techniques. The teacher is the heart of the educational system.
quotes.author: Sidney Hook

quotes.text: Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble.
quotes.author: Shah Rukh Khan

quotes.text: The mediocre teacher tells. The good teacher explains. The superior teacher demonstrates. The great teacher inspires.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: Experience is the teacher of all things.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.text: A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stops.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.text: I have learned silence from the talkative, toleration from the intolerant, and kindness from the unkind; yet, strange, I am ungrateful to those teachers.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: Of all the hard jobs around, one of the hardest is being a good teacher.
quotes.author: Maggie Gallagher

quotes.text: One looks back with appreciation to the brilliant teachers, but with gratitude to those who touched our human feelings. The curriculum is so much necessary raw material, but warmth is the vital element for the growing plant and for the soul of the child.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: Research shows that there is only half as much variation in student achievement between schools as there is among classrooms in the same school. If you want your child to get the best education possible, it is actually more important to get him assigned to a great teacher than to a great school.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: There's no question that a great teacher can make a huge difference in a student's achievement, and we need to recruit, train and reward more such teachers. But here's what some new studies are also showing: We need better parents. Parents more focused on their children's education can also make a huge difference in a student's achievement.
quotes.author: Thomas Friedman

quotes.text: The one exclusive sign of thorough knowledge is the power of teaching.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: A word of encouragement from a teacher to a child can change a life. A word of encouragement from a spouse can save a marriage. A word of encouragement from a leader can inspire a person to reach her potential.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.text: When a man opens a car door for his wife, it's either a new car or a new wife.
quotes.author: Prince Philip

quotes.text: There's three things men always talk about - women, sports, and cars.
quotes.author: Mario Lopez

quotes.text: I couldn't find the sports car of my dreams, so I built it myself.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Porsche

quotes.text: The cars we drive say a lot about us.
quotes.author: Alexandra Paul

quotes.text: See, when you drive home today, you've got a big windshield on the front of your car. And you've got a little bitty rearview mirror. And the reason the windshield is so large and the rearview mirror is so small is because what's happened in your past is not near as important as what's in your future.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
quotes.author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.text: It's a never ending battle of making your cars better and also trying to be better yourself.
quotes.author: Dale Earnhardt

quotes.text: The fact is I don't drive just to get from A to B. I enjoy feeling the car's reactions, becoming part of it.
quotes.author: Enzo Ferrari

quotes.text: Maybe the bike is more dangerous, but the passion for the car for me is second to the bike.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: Just as your car runs more smoothly and requires less energy to go faster and farther when the wheels are in perfect alignment, you perform better when your thoughts, feelings, emotions, goals, and values are in balance.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Cars are the sculptures of our everyday lives.
quotes.author: Chris Bangle

quotes.text: I've always been asked, 'What is my favorite car?' and I've always said 'The next one.'
quotes.author: Carroll Shelby

quotes.text: The connection to place, to the land, the wind, the sun, stars, the moon... it sounds romantic, but it's true - the visceral experience of motion, of moving through time on some amazing machine - a few cars touch on it, but not too many compared to motorcycles. I always felt that any motorcycle journey was special.
quotes.author: Antoine Predock

quotes.text: I am thankful the most important key in history was invented. It's not the key to your house, your car, your boat, your safety deposit box, your bike lock or your private community. It's the key to order, sanity, and peace of mind. The key is 'Delete.'
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.text: Giving money and power to government is like giving whiskey and car keys to teenage boys.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.text: It's like driving a car at night. You never see further than your headlights, but you can make the whole trip that way.
quotes.author: E. L. Doctorow

quotes.text: Everything in life is somewhere else, and you get there in a car.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.text: I race to win. If I am on the bike or in a car it will always be the same.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: Shoes make an outfit; they're like rims for a car.
quotes.author: Omari Hardwick

quotes.text: Television, radio, social media. The 24/7 news cycle plows forward mercilessly on our desks, in our cars and in our pockets. Thousands and thousands of messages and voices bombard us from the moment we wake, fighting for our attention. All we see and hear, all day long, is news. And most of it is bad.
quotes.author: Joseph Prince

quotes.text: Never have more children than you have car windows.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.text: We don't need bigger cars or fancier clothes. We need self-respect, identity, community, love, variety, beauty, challenge and a purpose in living that is greater than material accumulation.
quotes.author: Donella Meadows

quotes.text: My mother is a big believer in being responsible for your own happiness. She always talked about finding joy in small moments and insisted that we stop and take in the beauty of an ordinary day. When I stop the car to make my kids really see a sunset, I hear my mother's voice and smile.
quotes.author: Jennifer Garner

quotes.text: The best car safety device is a rear-view mirror with a cop in it.
quotes.author: Dudley Moore

quotes.text: A racing car is an animal with a thousand adjustments.
quotes.author: Mario Andretti

quotes.text: My very best friend died in a car accident when I was 16 years old. That was the hardest blow emotionally that I have ever had to endure. Suddenly, you realize tomorrow might not come. Now I live by the motto, 'Today is what I have.'
quotes.author: Amber Heard

quotes.text: I like to go out if there's a party or go to the movies, but I just like hanging out with my buddies and having a good time.
quotes.author: Jean-Luc Bilodeau

quotes.text: If you want a happy ending, that depends, of course, on where you stop your story.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.text: Movies can and do have tremendous influence in shaping young lives in the realm of entertainment towards the ideals and objectives of normal adulthood.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Pick up a camera. Shoot something. No matter how small, no matter how cheesy, no matter whether your friends and your sister star in it. Put your name on it as director. Now you're a director. Everything after that you're just negotiating your budget and your fee.
quotes.author: James Cameron

quotes.text: A film is never really good unless the camera is an eye in the head of a poet.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.text: A wide screen just makes a bad film twice as bad.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.text: It is painful to watch children trying to show off for parents who are engrossed in their cell phones. Children are nostalgic for the 'good old days' when parents used to read to them without the cell phone by their side or watch football games or Disney movies without having the BlackBerry handy.
quotes.author: Sherry Turkle

quotes.text: The most honest form of filmmaking is to make a film for yourself.
quotes.author: Peter Jackson

quotes.text: Acting is not about being famous, it's about exploring the human soul.
quotes.author: Annette Bening

quotes.text: The most amazing thing for me is that every single person who sees a movie, not necessarily one of my movies, brings a whole set of unique experiences. Now, through careful manipulation and good storytelling, you can get everybody to clap at the same time, to hopefully laugh at the same time, and to be afraid at the same time.
quotes.author: Steven Spielberg

quotes.text: Filmmaking is a chance to live many lifetimes.
quotes.author: Robert Altman

quotes.text: Everybody has something that chews them up and, for me, that thing was always loneliness. The cinema has the power to make you not feel lonely, even when you are.
quotes.author: Tom Hanks

quotes.text: When people ask me if I went to film school I tell them, 'no, I went to films.'
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.text: Cinema is a matter of what's in the frame and what's out.
quotes.author: Martin Scorsese

quotes.text: My dream role would probably be a psycho killer, because the whole thing I love about movies is that you get to do things you could never do in real life, and that would be my way of vicariously experiencing being a psycho killer. Also, it's incredibly romantic.
quotes.author: Christina Ricci

quotes.text: Life is more than sunglasses and hit movies. Reality - that's the main event.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.text: Filmmaking is a completely imperfect art form that takes years and, over those years, the movie tells you what it is. Mistakes happen, accidents happen and true great films are the results of those mistakes and the decisions that those directors make during those moments.
quotes.author: Jason Reitman

quotes.text: Cinema is the most beautiful fraud in the world.
quotes.author: Jean-Luc Godard

quotes.text: A film is - or should be - more like music than like fiction. It should be a progression of moods and feelings. The theme, what's behind the emotion, the meaning, all that comes later.
quotes.author: Stanley Kubrick

quotes.text: 'The Princess Bride' is one of my favorite movies of all time.
quotes.author: Ivana Milicevic

quotes.text: I secretly enjoy being alone - hiking alone, skiing alone, walking along the beach alone, going to movies alone. Do not get me wrong, I like sharing my life with other people, but sometimes I really enjoy being as alone as possible.
quotes.author: Josh Zuckerman

quotes.text: Cinema should make you forget you are sitting in a theater.
quotes.author: Roman Polanski

quotes.text: To me, movies and music go hand in hand. When I'm writing a script, one of the first things I do is find the music I'm going to play for the opening sequence.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.text: One of the reasons I love devils so much is not based in my faith, but because as a kid, I grew up loving heavy metal and horror movies, and the devil is such a huge presence in both.
quotes.author: Victor LaValle

quotes.text: Always make the audience suffer as much as possible.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.text: Some people ask why people would go into a dark room to be scared. I say they are already scared, and they need to have that fear manipulated and massaged. I think of horror movies as the disturbed dreams of a society.
quotes.author: Wes Craven

quotes.text: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
quotes.author: Ausonius

quotes.text: Age is a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it don't matter.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.text: I know not age, nor weariness nor defeat.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.text: A birthday is just another day where you go to work and people give you love. Age is just a state of mind, and you are as old as you think you are. You have to count your blessings and be happy.
quotes.author: Abhishek Bachchan

quotes.text: Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese.
quotes.author: Luis Bunuel

quotes.text: Try to keep your soul young and quivering right up to old age.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.text: Our uniqueness makes us special, makes perception valuable - but it can also make us lonely. This loneliness is different from being 'alone': You can be lonely even surrounded by people. The feeling I'm talking about stems from the sense that we can never fully share the truth of who we are. I experienced this acutely at an early age.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.text: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.text: Being confident is the key to life. Don't be afraid to be you! I'm super different from a lot of kids my age with style and personality, and I'm OK with it. And if you are OK with it, everyone else will be, too. Just be yourself.
quotes.author: Leo Howard

quotes.text: In our age there is no such thing as 'keeping out of politics.' All issues are political issues, and politics itself is a mass of lies, evasions, folly, hatred and schizophrenia.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.text: Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Age appears to be best in four things; old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: Do not go gentle into that good night but rage, rage against the dying of the light.
quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

quotes.text: Those who improve with age embrace the power of personal growth and personal achievement and begin to replace youth with wisdom, innocence with understanding, and lack of purpose with self-actualization.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.text: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young. The greatest thing in life is to keep your mind young.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: The secret of genius is to carry the spirit of the child into old age, which means never losing your enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: There is a plan and a purpose, a value to every life, no matter what its location, age, gender or disability.
quotes.author: Sharron Angle

quotes.text: Every age has its storytelling form, and video gaming is a huge part of our culture. You can ignore or embrace video games and imbue them with the best artistic quality. People are enthralled with video games in the same way as other people love the cinema or theatre.
quotes.author: Andy Serkis

quotes.text: Youth has no age.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: You can't help getting older, but you don't have to get old.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.text: To me - old age is always ten years older than I am.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.text: There is a fountain of youth: it is your mind, your talents, the creativity you bring to your life and the lives of people you love. When you learn to tap this source, you will truly have defeated age.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.text: Men are like wine - some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.text: The age of a woman doesn't mean a thing. The best tunes are played on the oldest fiddles.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Marriage is not about age; it's about finding the right person.
quotes.author: Sophia Bush

quotes.text: Aging is not lost youth but a new stage of opportunity and strength.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.text: Love yourself. It is important to stay positive because beauty comes from the inside out.
quotes.author: Jenn Proske

quotes.text: Stay positive and happy. Work hard and don't give up hope. Be open to criticism and keep learning. Surround yourself with happy, warm and genuine people.
quotes.author: Tena Desae

quotes.text: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
quotes.author: Shiv Khera

quotes.text: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.text: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.text: Work hard for what you want because it won't come to you without a fight. You have to be strong and courageous and know that you can do anything you put your mind to. If somebody puts you down or criticizes you, just keep on believing in yourself and turn it into something positive.
quotes.author: Leah LaBelle

quotes.text: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.
quotes.author: Matt Cameron

quotes.text: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Adopting the right attitude can convert a negative stress into a positive one.
quotes.author: Hans Selye

quotes.text: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.text: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.text: I truly believe that everything that we do and everyone that we meet is put in our path for a purpose. There are no accidents; we're all teachers - if we're willing to pay attention to the lessons we learn, trust our positive instincts and not be afraid to take risks or wait for some miracle to come knocking at our door.
quotes.author: Marla Gibbs

quotes.text: Your smile will give you a positive countenance that will make people feel comfortable around you.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
quotes.author: George Allen, Sr.

quotes.text: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: Successful people maintain a positive focus in life no matter what is going on around them. They stay focused on their past successes rather than their past failures, and on the next action steps they need to take to get them closer to the fulfillment of their goals rather than all the other distractions that life presents to them.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.text: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me.
quotes.author: David Bailey

quotes.text: No matter what you're going through, there's a light at the end of the tunnel and it may seem hard to get to it but you can do it and just keep working towards it and you'll find the positive side of things.
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.text: You're going to go through tough times - that's life. But I say, 'Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.' See the positive in negative events.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.
quotes.author: Wade Boggs

quotes.text: I will keep smiling, be positive and never give up! I will give 100 percent each time I play. These are always my goals and my attitude.
quotes.author: Yani Tseng

quotes.text: In every day, there are 1,440 minutes. That means we have 1,440 daily opportunities to make a positive impact.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: When you think positive, good things happen.
quotes.author: Matt Kemp

quotes.text: There is a certain enthusiasm in liberty, that makes human nature rise above itself, in acts of bravery and heroism.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.text: The veterans of our military services have put their lives on the line to protect the freedoms that we enjoy. They have dedicated their lives to their country and deserve to be recognized for their commitment.
quotes.author: Judd Gregg

quotes.text: The soldier above all others prays for peace, for it is the soldier who must suffer and bear the deepest wounds and scars of war.
quotes.author: Douglas MacArthur

quotes.text: True heroism is remarkably sober, very undramatic. It is not the urge to surpass all others at whatever cost, but the urge to serve others at whatever cost.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.text: It is foolish and wrong to mourn the men who died. Rather we should thank God that such men lived.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.text: It takes a hero to be one of those men who goes into battle.
quotes.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

quotes.text: While only one day of the year is dedicated solely to honoring our veterans, Americans must never forget the sacrifices that many of our fellow countrymen have made to defend our country and protect our freedoms.
quotes.author: Randy Neugebauer

quotes.text: Regard your soldiers as your children, and they will follow you into the deepest valleys; look on them as your own beloved sons, and they will stand by you even unto death.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.text: Honoring the sacrifices many have made for our country in the name of freedom and democracy is the very foundation of Veterans Day.
quotes.author: Charles B. Rangel

quotes.text: Brave men rejoice in adversity, just as brave soldiers triumph in war.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.text: We owe our World War II veterans - and all our veterans - a debt we can never fully repay.
quotes.author: Doc Hastings

quotes.text: Duty, Honor, Country. Those three hallowed words reverently dictate what you ought to be, what you can be, what you will be.
quotes.author: Douglas MacArthur

quotes.text: When the will defies fear, when duty throws the gauntlet down to fate, when honor scorns to compromise with death - that is heroism.
quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.text: On this Veterans Day, let us remember the service of our veterans, and let us renew our national promise to fulfill our sacred obligations to our veterans and their families who have sacrificed so much so that we can live free.
quotes.author: Dan Lipinski

quotes.text: The Lord gets his best soldiers out of the highlands of affliction.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Soldiers, when committed to a task, can't compromise. It's unrelenting devotion to the standards of duty and courage, absolute loyalty to others, not letting the task go until it's been done.
quotes.author: John Keegan

quotes.text: Every soldier must know, before he goes into battle, how the little battle he is to fight fits into the larger picture, and how the success of his fighting will influence the battle as a whole.
quotes.author: Bernard Law Montgomery

quotes.text: Our soldiers have nobly fought to protect freedom since our country's birth, and have fought to protect those that could not protect themselves, even in foreign lands when called upon.
quotes.author: John Linder

quotes.text: Because all of us believe and understand in the fabric of the common bond of why we call ourselves American is to care for the men and women who wear the uniform; and when they take off the uniform, we care for them when they are veterans.
quotes.author: Steve Buyer

quotes.text: The only thing that makes battle psychologically tolerable is the brotherhood among soldiers. You need each other to get by.
quotes.author: Sebastian Junger

quotes.text: I am not a hero but the brave men who died deserved this honor.
quotes.author: Ira Hayes

quotes.text: America's Veterans have served their country with the belief that democracy and freedom are ideals to be upheld around the world.
quotes.author: John Doolittle

quotes.text: The valor and courage of our young women and men in the armed services are a shining example to all of the world, and we owe them and their families our deepest respect.
quotes.author: Bill Frist

quotes.text: Tragically, the effort to make America and the world safer and to defend freedom around the world is not without an enormous cost to this Nation in terms primarily of lost lives and those who bear the scars and the wounds of war, and their families who must bear these losses.
quotes.author: John Warner

quotes.text: Gentlemen, when the enemy is committed to a mistake we must not interrupt him too soon.
quotes.author: Horatio Nelson

quotes.text: Spending time with America's soldiers is always inspiring.
quotes.author: John Boehner

quotes.text: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: Style is a reflection of your attitude and your personality.
quotes.author: Shawn Ashmore

quotes.text: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Adopting the right attitude can convert a negative stress into a positive one.
quotes.author: Hans Selye

quotes.text: Being sexy is all about attitude, not body type. It's a state of mind.
quotes.author: Amisha Patel

quotes.text: Leadership is practiced not so much in words as in attitude and in actions.
quotes.author: Harold S. Geneen

quotes.text: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.text: Wearing the correct dress for any occasion is a matter of good manners.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.text: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me.
quotes.author: David Bailey

quotes.text: Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you, knowing that every step forward is a step toward achieving something bigger and better than your current situation.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.
quotes.author: Wade Boggs

quotes.text: I will keep smiling, be positive and never give up! I will give 100 percent each time I play. These are always my goals and my attitude.
quotes.author: Yani Tseng

quotes.text: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.text: Each day, I come in with a positive attitude, trying to get better.
quotes.author: Stefon Diggs

quotes.text: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.text: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
quotes.author: Allen Klein

quotes.text: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: I believe that a trusting attitude and a patient attitude go hand in hand. You see, when you let go and learn to trust God, it releases joy in your life. And when you trust God, you're able to be more patient. Patience is not just about waiting for something... it's about how you wait, or your attitude while waiting.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
quotes.author: Pat Riley

quotes.text: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.text: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.text: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
quotes.author: Scott Hamilton

quotes.text: Be sure what you want and be sure about yourself. Fashion is not just beauty, it's about good attitude. You have to believe in yourself and be strong.
quotes.author: Adriana Lima

quotes.text: There are two great days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.text: It's sad to know I'm done. But looking back, I've got a lot of great memories.
quotes.author: Bonnie Blair

quotes.text: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.text: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: I am blessed to have so many great things in my life - family, friends and God. All will be in my thoughts daily.
quotes.author: Lil' Kim

quotes.text: Never stop fighting until you arrive at your destined place - that is, the unique you. Have an aim in life, continuously acquire knowledge, work hard, and have perseverance to realise the great life.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.text: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: I've learned that fear limits you and your vision. It serves as blinders to what may be just a few steps down the road for you. The journey is valuable, but believing in your talents, your abilities, and your self-worth can empower you to walk down an even brighter path. Transforming fear into freedom - how great is that?
quotes.author: Soledad O'Brien

quotes.text: One of the best ways to make yourself happy in the present is to recall happy times from the past. Photos are a great memory-prompt, and because we tend to take photos of happy occasions, they weight our memories to the good.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.text: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.text: I was given such a great gift. It's a miracle that never stops amazing me and reminding me to give thanks, every day. Having a wife and daughter gives me a lot more purpose. I was much more selfish before, but now I think about what kind of role model I'll be. I just want to be a better man.
quotes.author: Jake Owen

quotes.text: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.text: I'm proud of my hard work. Working hard won't always lead to the exact things we desire. There are many things I've wanted that I haven't always gotten. But, I have a great satisfaction in the blessings from my mother and father, who instilled a great work ethic in me both personally and professionally.
quotes.author: Tamron Hall

quotes.text: I love a man with a great sense of humor and who is intelligent - a man who has a great smile. He has to make me laugh. I like a man who is very ambitious and driven and who has a good heart and makes me feel safe. I like a man who is very strong and independent and confident - that is very sexy - but at the same time, he's very kind to people.
quotes.author: Nicole Scherzinger

quotes.text: No dream is too big. No challenge is too great. Nothing we want for our future is beyond our reach.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.text: Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some have greatness thrust upon them.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: My father was my teacher. But most importantly he was a great dad.
quotes.author: Beau Bridges

quotes.text: First, accept sadness. Realize that without losing, winning isn't so great.
quotes.author: Alyssa Milano

quotes.text: A little thought and a little kindness are often worth more than a great deal of money.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.text: There is no great genius without some touch of madness.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Only great minds can afford a simple style.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: I was given such a great gift. It's a miracle that never stops amazing me and reminding me to give thanks, every day. Having a wife and daughter gives me a lot more purpose. I was much more selfish before, but now I think about what kind of role model I'll be. I just want to be a better man.
quotes.author: Jake Owen

quotes.text: We don't even know how strong we are until we are forced to bring that hidden strength forward. In times of tragedy, of war, of necessity, people do amazing things. The human capacity for survival and renewal is awesome.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.text: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.text: When you have confidence, you can have a lot of fun. And when you have fun, you can do amazing things.
quotes.author: Joe Namath

quotes.text: God has blessed me with an amazing family, friends and work colleagues that have been my joy, my support, and my sanity. I don't know what I'd do without them.
quotes.author: Josie Loren

quotes.text: It's amazing. Life changes very quickly, in a very positive way, if you let it.
quotes.author: Lindsey Vonn

quotes.text: Christmas is the perfect time to celebrate the love of God and family and to create memories that will last forever. Jesus is God's perfect, indescribable gift. The amazing thing is that not only are we able to receive this gift, but we are able to share it with others on Christmas and every other day of the year.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: May your trails be crooked, winding, lonesome, dangerous, leading to the most amazing view. May your mountains rise into and above the clouds.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.text: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.text: It's amazing that the amount of news that happens in the world every day always just exactly fits the newspaper.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.text: I thank you God for this most amazing day, for the leaping greenly spirits of trees, and for the blue dream of sky and for everything which is natural, which is infinite, which is yes.
quotes.author: e. e. cummings

quotes.text: The connection to place, to the land, the wind, the sun, stars, the moon... it sounds romantic, but it's true - the visceral experience of motion, of moving through time on some amazing machine - a few cars touch on it, but not too many compared to motorcycles. I always felt that any motorcycle journey was special.
quotes.author: Antoine Predock

quotes.text: Outstanding leaders go out of their way to boost the self-esteem of their personnel. If people believe in themselves, it's amazing what they can accomplish.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.text: My dad was my best friend and greatest role model. He was an amazing dad, coach, mentor, soldier, husband and friend.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.text: Motherhood has most definitely changed me and my life. It's so crazy how drastic even the small details change - in such an amazing way. Even silly things, like the fact that all of my pictures on my cell phone used to be of me at photo shoots - conceited, I know! - but now every single picture on my phone is of Mason.
quotes.author: Kourtney Kardashian

quotes.text: Count your blessings. You are one of a kind. There's no one in the world like you. You are amazing.
quotes.author: Richard Simmons

quotes.text: What I've enjoyed most, though, is meeting people who have a real interest in food and sharing ideas with them. Good food is a global thing and I find that there is always something new and amazing to learn - I love it!
quotes.author: Jamie Oliver

quotes.text: What can a pencil do for all of us? Amazing things. It can write transcendent poetry, uplifting music, or life-changing equations; it can sketch the future, give life to untold beauty, and communicate the full-force of our love and aspirations.
quotes.author: Adam Braun

quotes.text: I'm not perfect. And who knows how many times I've fallen short. We all fall short. That's the amazing thing about the grace of God.
quotes.author: Tim Tebow

quotes.text: Social media is an amazing tool, but it's really the face-to-face interaction that makes a long-term impact.
quotes.author: Felicia Day

quotes.text: The PC has improved the world in just about every area you can think of. Amazing developments in communications, collaboration and efficiencies. New kinds of entertainment and social media. Access to information and the ability to give a voice people who would never have been heard.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: I've prioritized taking care of my mind, having fun, and doing things that make me laugh. And eating well - as in, really good food, like steak or pasta or fresh vegetables or an amazing dessert. You know, 'treat yo'self.'
quotes.author: Phillipa Soo

quotes.text: If you tell people where to go, but not how to get there, you'll be amazed at the results.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.text: I have short goals - to get better every day, to help my teammates every day - but my only ultimate goal is to win an NBA championship. It's all that matters. I dream about it. I dream about it all the time, how it would look, how it would feel. It would be so amazing.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.text: I feel like I'm really blessed and lucky that I have a very good social life outside of the gym, and I have a really amazing family. My parents are so supportive. I have a younger brother and two younger sisters, and they're really awesome. So I feel like I get the best of both worlds.
quotes.author: Aly Raisman

quotes.text: Being cool is being your own self, not doing something that someone else is telling you to do.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.text: Keep a cool head and maintain a low profile. Never take the lead - but aim to do something big.
quotes.author: Deng Xiaoping

quotes.text: My key to dealing with stress is simple: just stay cool and stay focused.
quotes.author: Ashton Eaton

quotes.text: My sister is my little star, and I'm excited for her and proud of her. With her, I'm protective, but also I don't want to be that sister who's really pushy and thinks they know everything and making her feel like she doesn't know what she's doing. I'm trying to be that cool older sister and not the mom, but it's hard.
quotes.author: Gigi Hadid

quotes.text: It's cool to be different and just be who you are and shock people in a good way.
quotes.author: Brendon Urie

quotes.text: Nothing is cooler and more attractive than a big comeback, and that'll be me.
quotes.author: Steven Adler

quotes.text: I'm a mirror. If you're cool with me, I'm cool with you, and the exchange starts. What you see is what you reflect. If you don't like what you see, then you've done something. If I'm standoffish, that's because you are.
quotes.author: Jay-Z

quotes.text: I'm not the kind of person who tries to be cool or trendy, I'm definitely an individual.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quotes.text: I think it's cool to be smart, and I think it's sexy to be smart.
quotes.author: Stacey Farber

quotes.text: I don't want to be just known for the way I dress. I want to be known for how I play, how I treat people, and how I am as a role model. I don't just want to be, 'He dresses cool' or 'He dresses crazy.' You're going to have lovers and haters. I want my golf game to be the main thing.
quotes.author: Rickie Fowler

quotes.text: Keep a cool head and a warm heart.
quotes.author: Mike Love

quotes.text: Let your soul stand cool and composed before a million universes.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.text: Picking a best friend who stands up for what she believes in, is true to herself and allows you to be yourself without judgement of how 'cool' you are? Well, now you're picking a friend for life.
quotes.author: Renee Olstead

quotes.text: Like a welcome summer rain, humor may suddenly cleanse and cool the earth, the air and you.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.text: It's so important to realize that every time you get upset, it drains your emotional energy. Losing your cool makes you tired. Getting angry a lot messes with your health.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: What people don't understand is joining a gang ain't bad, it's cool, it's fine. When you in the hood, joining a gang it's cool because all your friends are in the gang, all your family's in the gang. We're not just killing people every night, we're just hanging out, having a good time.
quotes.author: Snoop Dogg

quotes.text: My mom is just someone who's easy to talk to and hang with. My sister, it's always cool to be able to help her out with things. My brother is fun when we're just joking and messing around. And my dad is someone who's helpful with my music and easy to talk to about that stuff because he understands me in that sense.
quotes.author: David Archuleta

quotes.text: I think I'm cool. That's all that matters.
quotes.author: Tyler, The Creator

quotes.text: I think fashion is a lot of fun. I love clothes. More than fashion or brand labels, I love design. I love the thought that people put into clothes. I love when clothes make cultural statements and I think personal style is really cool. I also freely recognize that fashion should be a hobby.
quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

quotes.text: I don't think of myself as hot or cool or anything, just a dork.
quotes.author: Ashley Olsen

quotes.text: I want to be a vampire. They're the coolest monsters.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.text: Cell phones, mobile e-mail, and all the other cool and slick gadgets can cause massive losses in our creative output and overall productivity.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.text: Jazz is smooth and cool. Jazz is rage. Jazz flows like water. Jazz never seems to begin or end. Jazz isn't methodical, but jazz isn't messy either. Jazz is a conversation, a give and take. Jazz is the connection and communication between musicians. Jazz is abandon.
quotes.author: Nat Wolff

quotes.text: Good words cool more than cold water.
quotes.author: John Ray

quotes.text: To create well I have to be in a good mood, happy and cool.
quotes.author: Marc Newson

quotes.text: I'm cute - and God I hate that. Because that's not cool. I'm like your niece, and nobody wants to date their niece. It's the chubby cheeks. The whole reason people voted for me on American Idol is because I'm an everyday, normal girl.
quotes.author: Kelly Clarkson

quotes.text: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others; for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness; and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: I'm learning a lot about myself being alone, and doing what I'm doing.
quotes.author: Chantal Kreviazuk

quotes.text: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.text: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.text: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: Nothing in this world can take the place of persistence. Talent will not: nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not: the world is full of educated derelicts. Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.text: Laugh and the world laughs with you, snore and you sleep alone.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.text: Loneliness expresses the pain of being alone and solitude expresses the glory of being alone.
quotes.author: Paul Tillich

quotes.text: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.text: I restore myself when I'm alone.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.text: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: Our uniqueness makes us special, makes perception valuable - but it can also make us lonely. This loneliness is different from being 'alone': You can be lonely even surrounded by people. The feeling I'm talking about stems from the sense that we can never fully share the truth of who we are. I experienced this acutely at an early age.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.text: As I get older I'm more and more comfortable being alone.
quotes.author: Sienna Miller

quotes.text: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

quotes.text: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend.
quotes.author: Conor Oberst

quotes.text: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.text: Being alone & actually sitting with our own thoughts can lead to such growth and realizations that are rare in our everyday busy lives.
quotes.author: Kourtney Kardashian

quotes.text: God writes the Gospel not in the Bible alone, but also on trees, and in the flowers and clouds and stars.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: To go out with the setting sun on an empty beach is to truly embrace your solitude.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.text: Sometimes, being different feels a lot like being alone. But with that being said, being true to that and being true to my standards and my way of doing things in my art and my music, everything that has made me feel very different... in the end, it has made me the happiest.
quotes.author: Lindsey Stirling

quotes.text: Loneliness is my least favorite thing about life. The thing that I'm most worried about is just being alone without anybody to care for or someone who will care for me.
quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

quotes.text: Unlike a drop of water which loses its identity when it joins the ocean, man does not lose his being in the society in which he lives. Man's life is independent. He is born not for the development of the society alone, but for the development of his self.
quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

quotes.text: A people without the knowledge of their past history, origin and culture is like a tree without roots.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.text: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: I believe that imagination is stronger than knowledge. That myth is more potent than history. That dreams are more powerful than facts. That hope always triumphs over experience. That laughter is the only cure for grief. And I believe that love is stronger than death.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.text: We are not makers of history. We are made by history.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Men make history and not the other way around. In periods where there is no leadership, society stands still. Progress occurs when courageous, skillful leaders seize the opportunity to change things for the better.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.text: You may not always have a comfortable life and you will not always be able to solve all of the world's problems at once but don't ever underestimate the importance you can have because history has shown us that courage can be contagious and hope can take on a life of its own.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Our flag honors those who have fought to protect it, and is a reminder of the sacrifice of our nation's founders and heroes. As the ultimate icon of America's storied history, the Stars and Stripes represents the very best of this nation.
quotes.author: Joe Barton

quotes.text: History repeats itself, first as tragedy, second as farce.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.text: Observe good faith and justice toward all nations. Cultivate peace and harmony with all.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.text: Following the light of the sun, we left the Old World.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.text: History teaches us that unity is strength, and cautions us to submerge and overcome our differences in the quest for common goals, to strive, with all our combined strength, for the path to true African brotherhood and unity.
quotes.author: Haile Selassie

quotes.text: More than ever before in human history, we share a common destiny. We can master it only if we face it together. And that, my friends, is why we have the United Nations.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.text: Those who do not remember the past are condemned to repeat it.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.text: Throughout history, it has been the inaction of those who could have acted; the indifference of those who should have known better; the silence of the voice of justice when it mattered most; that has made it possible for evil to triumph.
quotes.author: Haile Selassie

quotes.text: I believe our flag is more than just cloth and ink. It is a universally recognized symbol that stands for liberty, and freedom. It is the history of our nation, and it's marked by the blood of those who died defending it.
quotes.author: John Thune

quotes.text: I came, I saw, I conquered.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.text: If you are neutral in situations of injustice, you have chosen the side of the oppressor. If an elephant has its foot on the tail of a mouse and you say that you are neutral, the mouse will not appreciate your neutrality.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.text: The point in history at which we stand is full of promise and danger. The world will either move forward toward unity and widely shared prosperity - or it will move apart.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: History never really says goodbye. History says, 'See you later.'
quotes.author: Eduardo Galeano

quotes.text: History will be kind to me for I intend to write it.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: You may write me down in history with your bitter, twisted lines. You may trod me in the very dirt, but still, like dust, I'll rise.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: The history of all previous societies has been the history of class struggles.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.text: I am thankful the most important key in history was invented. It's not the key to your house, your car, your boat, your safety deposit box, your bike lock or your private community. It's the key to order, sanity, and peace of mind. The key is 'Delete.'
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.text: No event in American history is more misunderstood than the Vietnam War. It was misreported then, and it is misremembered now.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.text: It takes an endless amount of history to make even a little tradition.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.text: There is no love without forgiveness, and there is no forgiveness without love.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.text: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours; if they don't they never were.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: Nobody can predict the future. You just have to give your all to the relationship you're in and do your best to take care of your partner, communicate and give them every last drop of love you have. I think one of the most important things in a relationship is caring for your significant other through good times and bad.
quotes.author: Nick Cannon

quotes.text: Truth is everybody is going to hurt you: you just gotta find the ones worth suffering for.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.text: You can never control who you fall in love with, even when you're in the most sad, confused time of your life. You don't fall in love with people because they're fun. It just happens.
quotes.author: Kirsten Dunst

quotes.text: Sister is probably the most competitive relationship within the family, but once the sisters are grown, it becomes the strongest relationship.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: I'm lucky in having found the perfect partner to spend my life with.
quotes.author: Sara Paretsky

quotes.text: We don't develop courage by being happy every day. We develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.text: When someone shows you who they are, believe them the first time.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: In finding love, I think it's important to be patient. In being in a relationship, I think it's important to be honest, to communicate, to respect and trust, and to strive to give more than you take.
quotes.author: Kina Grannis

quotes.text: How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: I have a wonderful shelter, which is my family. I have a wonderful relationship with my brother and sister; this makes me feel that I know always where I belong.
quotes.author: Jose Carreras

quotes.text: When a woman is talking to you, listen to what she says with her eyes.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.text: We are afraid to care too much, for fear that the other person does not care at all.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: The relationship between husband and wife should be one of closest friends.
quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

quotes.text: I believe that two people are connected at the heart, and it doesn't matter what you do, or who you are or where you live; there are no boundaries or barriers if two people are destined to be together.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.text: Never above you. Never below you. Always beside you.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.text: The most important thing is to have a good relationship with the bike... you have to understand what she wants. I think of a motorcycle as a woman, and I know that sounds silly, but it's true.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.text: You can discover more about a person in an hour of play than in a year of conversation.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Find joy in everything you choose to do. Every job, relationship, home... it's your responsibility to love it, or change it.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.text: I think it's important to have closure in any relationship that ends - from a romantic relationship to a friendship. You should always have a sense of clarity at the end and know why it began and why it ended. You need that in your life to move cleanly into your next phase.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.text: I love you, and because I love you, I would sooner have you hate me for telling you the truth than adore me for telling you lies.
quotes.author: Pietro Aretino

quotes.text: But let there be spaces in your togetherness and let the winds of the heavens dance between you. Love one another but make not a bond of love: let it rather be a moving sea between the shores of your souls.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.text: Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.
quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

quotes.text: Some people dream of success, while other people get up every morning and make it happen.
quotes.author: Wayne Huizenga

quotes.text: I may be drunk, Miss, but in the morning I will be sober and you will still be ugly.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
quotes.author: Bernard Williams

quotes.text: Opportunities are like sunrises. If you wait too long, you miss them.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: When you rise in the morning, give thanks for the light, for your life, for your strength. Give thanks for your food and for the joy of living. If you see no reason to give thanks, the fault lies in yourself.
quotes.author: Tecumseh

quotes.text: Wherever my story takes me, however dark and difficult the theme, there is always some hope and redemption, not because readers like happy endings, but because I am an optimist at heart. I know the sun will rise in the morning, that there is a light at the end of every tunnel.
quotes.author: Michael Morpurgo

quotes.text: My children are the reason I laugh, smile and want to get up every morning.
quotes.author: Gena Lee Nolin

quotes.text: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: When I wake up every morning, I thank God for the new day.
quotes.author: F. Sionil Jose

quotes.text: Old friends pass away, new friends appear. It is just like the days. An old day passes, a new day arrives. The important thing is to make it meaningful: a meaningful friend - or a meaningful day.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter, and sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: Morning without you is a dwindled dawn.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.text: Think in the morning. Act in the noon. Eat in the evening. Sleep in the night.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: Every day I feel is a blessing from God. And I consider it a new beginning. Yeah, everything is beautiful.
quotes.author: Prince

quotes.text: Nothing is more beautiful than the loveliness of the woods before sunrise.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.text: If you're going to do something tonight that you'll be sorry for tomorrow morning, sleep late.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.text: Everyone has highs and lows that they have to learn from, but every morning I start off with a good head on my shoulders, saying to myself, 'It's going to be a good day!'.
quotes.author: Lindsay Lohan

quotes.text: God's mercy is fresh and new every morning.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: An early-morning walk is a blessing for the whole day.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: A good wife is one who serves her husband in the morning like a mother does, loves him in the day like a sister does and pleases him like a prostitute in the night.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.text: I wake up every morning literally with a smile on my face, grateful for another day I never thought I'd see.
quotes.author: Dick Cheney

quotes.text: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
quotes.author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.text: I have always been delighted at the prospect of a new day, a fresh try, one more start, with perhaps a bit of magic waiting somewhere behind the morning.
quotes.author: J. B. Priestley

quotes.text: There is no love without forgiveness, and there is no forgiveness without love.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.text: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Many times, the decisions we make affect and hurt your closest friends and family the most. I have a lot of regrets in that regard. But God has forgiven me, which I am very thankful for. It has enabled me to forgive myself and move forward one day at a time.
quotes.author: Lex Luger

quotes.text: The heart of a mother is a deep abyss at the bottom of which you will always find forgiveness.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: When you forgive, you in no way change the past - but you sure do change the future.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.text: We must develop and maintain the capacity to forgive. He who is devoid of the power to forgive is devoid of the power to love. There is some good in the worst of us and some evil in the best of us. When we discover this, we are less prone to hate our enemies.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: It's one of the greatest gifts you can give yourself, to forgive. Forgive everybody.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Forgiveness is not always easy. At times, it feels more painful than the wound we suffered, to forgive the one that inflicted it. And yet, there is no peace without forgiveness.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.text: Love is an act of endless forgiveness, a tender look which becomes a habit.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.text: I can have peace of mind only when I forgive rather than judge.
quotes.author: Gerald Jampolsky

quotes.text: There would be no need for love if perfection were possible. Love arises from our imperfection, from our being different and always in need of the forgiveness, encouragement and that missing half of ourselves that we are searching for, as the Greek myth tells us, in order to complete ourselves.
quotes.author: Eugene Kennedy

quotes.text: To err is human; to forgive, divine.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.text: Never forget the three powerful resources you always have available to you: love, prayer, and forgiveness.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Prejudice is sinful. All blood flows red. And the most harmful and foolish kind of prejudice is prejudice against yourself. Every woman is your sister, and every woman needs her sisters. So try to give other women the courtesy of your compassion, respect, and forgiveness. Love yourself despite - and because of - your flaws.
quotes.author: Jewell Parker Rhodes

quotes.text: Forgiveness says you are given another chance to make a new beginning.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.text: Thank you, God, for this good life and forgive us if we do not love it enough.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.text: Forgive yourself for your faults and your mistakes and move on.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.
quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.text: Always forgive your enemies - nothing annoys them so much.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
