quotes.text: Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now. Don't wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future. Think how really precious is the time you have to spend, whether it's at work or with your family. Every minute should be enjoyed and savored.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.text: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.text: There are two great days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.text: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
quotes.author: Bradley Whitford

quotes.text: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.
quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

quotes.text: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.text: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Lighten up, just enjoy life, smile more, laugh more, and don't get so worked up about things.
quotes.author: Kenneth Branagh

quotes.text: It's all about quality of life and finding a happy balance between work and friends and family.
quotes.author: Philip Green

quotes.text: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Peace is the beauty of life. It is sunshine. It is the smile of a child, the love of a mother, the joy of a father, the togetherness of a family. It is the advancement of man, the victory of a just cause, the triumph of truth.
quotes.author: Menachem Begin

quotes.text: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.
quotes.author: Matt Cameron

quotes.text: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.text: Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Most of what we call management consists of making it difficult for people to get their work done.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but they whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves their conduct, will pursue their principles unto death.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: A satisfied customer is the best business strategy of all.
quotes.author: Michael LeBoeuf

quotes.text: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Happiness does not come from doing easy work but from the afterglow of satisfaction that comes after the achievement of a difficult task that demanded our best.
quotes.author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

quotes.text: If people like you, they'll listen to you, but if they trust you, they'll do business with you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Before you can become a millionaire, you must learn to think like one. You must learn how to motivate yourself to counter fear with courage. Making critical decisions about your career, business, investments and other resources conjures up fear, fear that is part of the process of becoming a financial success.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Stanley

quotes.text: An organization's ability to learn, and translate that learning into action rapidly, is the ultimate competitive advantage.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.text: A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: Information technology and business are becoming inextricably interwoven. I don't think anybody can talk meaningfully about one without the talking about the other.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: A brand for a company is like a reputation for a person. You earn reputation by trying to do hard things well.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.text: A passionate belief in your business and personal objectives can make all the difference between success and failure. If you aren't proud of what you're doing, why should anybody else be?
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.text: Ideas pull the trigger, but instinct loads the gun.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.text: My philosophy is it's none of my business what people say of me and think of me. I am what I am, and I do what I do. I expect nothing and accept everything. And it makes life so much easier.
quotes.author: Anthony Hopkins

quotes.text: We're all working together; that's the secret.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.text: There is only one boss. The customer. And he can fire everybody in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money somewhere else.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.text: The first rule of any technology used in a business is that automation applied to an efficient operation will magnify the efficiency. The second is that automation applied to an inefficient operation will magnify the inefficiency.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Everyone is your best friend when you are successful. Make sure that the people that you surround yourself with are also the people that you are not afraid of failing with.
quotes.author: Paula Abdul

quotes.text: In the business world, the rearview mirror is always clearer than the windshield.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: The greatest ability in business is to get along with others and to influence their actions.
quotes.author: John Hancock

quotes.text: There is always space for improvement, no matter how long you've been in the business.
quotes.author: Oscar De La Hoya

quotes.text: Just because something doesn't do what you planned it to do doesn't mean it's useless.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.text: Good business leaders create a vision, articulate the vision, passionately own the vision, and relentlessly drive it to completion.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.text: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
quotes.author: Gene Tunney

quotes.text: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: The purpose of training is to tighten up the slack, toughen the body, and polish the spirit.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.text: I'm not in the best shape, but I want to prove to myself I can do something that seems insurmountable and inspire others by showing them no matter where they are in their fitness goals, they can do it, too.
quotes.author: Ruben Studdard

quotes.text: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.text: Fitness is not about being better than someone else... It's about being better than you used to be.
quotes.author: Khloe Kardashian

quotes.text: For me, fitness is not just about hitting the gym; it is also about an inner happiness and an overall well-being.
quotes.author: Rakul Preet Singh

quotes.text: Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: True enjoyment comes from activity of the mind and exercise of the body; the two are ever united.
quotes.author: Wilhelm von Humboldt

quotes.text: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
quotes.author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.text: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.text: People talk about physical fitness, but mental health is equally important. I see people suffering, and their families feel a sense of shame about it, which doesn't help. One needs support and understanding. I am now working on an initiative to create awareness about anxiety and depression and help people.
quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

quotes.text: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very far.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: The reason I exercise is for the quality of life I enjoy.
quotes.author: Kenneth H. Cooper

quotes.text: The mind is the most important part of achieving any fitness goal. Mental change always comes before physical change.
quotes.author: Matt McGorry

quotes.text: In fitness, there are no short cuts. It involves immense discipline and hard work.
quotes.author: Mahesh Babu

quotes.text: You need to put what you learn into practice and do it over and over again until it's a habit. I always say, 'Seeing is not believing. Doing is believing.' There is a lot to learn about fitness, nutrition and emotions, but once you do, you can master them instead of them mastering you.
quotes.author: Brett Hoebel

quotes.text: Exercise to stimulate, not to annihilate. The world wasn't formed in a day, and neither were we. Set small goals and build upon them.
quotes.author: Lee Haney

quotes.text: If I don't feel confident about my body, I'm not going to sit at home and feel sorry for myself and not do something about it. It's all about taking action and not being lazy. So you do the work, whether it's fitness or whatever. It's about getting up, motivating yourself and just doing it.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.text: Swimming is normal for me. I'm relaxed. I'm comfortable, and I know my surroundings. It's my home.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.text: Bodybuilding is much like any other sport. To be successful, you must dedicate yourself 100% to your training, diet and mental approach.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: If we could give every individual the right amount of nourishment and exercise, not too little and not too much, we would have found the safest way to health.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.text: Health is the thing that makes you feel that now is the best time of the year.
quotes.author: Franklin Pierce Adams

quotes.text: Exercise is amazing, from the inside out. I feel so alive and have more energy.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.text: Exercise should be regarded as tribute to the heart.
quotes.author: Gene Tunney

quotes.text: Writing, to me, is simply thinking through my fingers.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.text: Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: The art of communication is the language of leadership.
quotes.author: James Humes

quotes.text: Words are singularly the most powerful force available to humanity. We can choose to use this force constructively with words of encouragement, or destructively using words of despair. Words have energy and power with the ability to help, to heal, to hinder, to hurt, to harm, to humiliate and to humble.
quotes.author: Yehuda Berg

quotes.text: Communication - the human connection - is the key to personal and career success.
quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.text: The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Trust is the glue of life. It's the most essential ingredient in effective communication. It's the foundational principle that holds all relationships.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: In my deepest, darkest moments, what really got me through was a prayer. Sometimes my prayer was 'Help me.' Sometimes a prayer was 'Thank you.' What I've discovered is that intimate connection and communication with my creator will always get me through because I know my support, my help, is just a prayer away.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.text: The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn't said.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Music is the greatest communication in the world. Even if people don't understand the language that you're singing in, they still know good music when they hear it.
quotes.author: Lou Rawls

quotes.text: To effectively communicate, we must realize that we are all different in the way we perceive the world and use this understanding as a guide to our communication with others.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: I think it's very important to have a feedback loop, where you're constantly thinking about what you've done and how you could be doing it better. I think that's the single best piece of advice: constantly think about how you could be doing things better and questioning yourself.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: Social media websites are no longer performing an envisaged function of creating a positive communication link among friends, family and professionals. It is a veritable battleground, where insults fly from the human quiver, damaging lives, destroying self-esteem and a person's sense of self-worth.
quotes.author: Anthony Carmona

quotes.text: Communication leads to community, that is, to understanding, intimacy and mutual valuing.
quotes.author: Rollo May

quotes.text: We have two ears and one mouth so that we can listen twice as much as we speak.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: I do not agree with what you have to say, but I'll defend to the death your right to say it.
quotes.author: Evelyn Beatrice Hall

quotes.text: Take advantage of every opportunity to practice your communication skills so that when important occasions arise, you will have the gift, the style, the sharpness, the clarity, and the emotions to affect other people.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: I think for any relationship to be successful, there needs to be loving communication, appreciation, and understanding.
quotes.author: Miranda Kerr

quotes.text: Honest communication is built on truth and integrity and upon respect of the one for the other.
quotes.author: Benjamin E. Mays

quotes.text: It's about communication. It's about honesty. It's about treating people in the organization as deserving to know the facts. You don't try to give them half the story. You don't try to hide the story. You treat them as - as true equals, and you communicate and you communicate and communicate.
quotes.author: Louis V. Gerstner, Jr.

quotes.text: A man's character may be learned from the adjectives which he habitually uses in conversation.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Intelligence, knowledge or experience are important and might get you a job, but strong communication skills are what will get you promoted.
quotes.author: Mireille Guiliano

quotes.text: Words, once they are printed, have a life of their own.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.text: The two words 'information' and 'communication' are often used interchangeably, but they signify quite different things. Information is giving out; communication is getting through.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.text: Genius is the ability to put into effect what is on your mind.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.text: Communication is a skill that you can learn. It's like riding a bicycle or typing. If you're willing to work at it, you can rapidly improve the quality of evry part of your life.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, 'I lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.'
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.text: The secret to happiness is freedom... And the secret to freedom is courage.
quotes.author: Thucydides

quotes.text: Goodness is about character - integrity, honesty, kindness, generosity, moral courage, and the like. More than anything else, it is about how we treat other people.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.text: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: We don't develop courage by being happy every day. We develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.text: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.text: A grateful heart is a beginning of greatness. It is an expression of humility. It is a foundation for the development of such virtues as prayer, faith, courage, contentment, happiness, love, and well-being.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.text: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Courage, sacrifice, determination, commitment, toughness, heart, talent, guts. That's what little girls are made of.
quotes.author: Bethany Hamilton

quotes.text: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.text: Heroes represent the best of ourselves, respecting that we are human beings. A hero can be anyone from Gandhi to your classroom teacher, anyone who can show courage when faced with a problem. A hero is someone who is willing to help others in his or her best capacity.
quotes.author: Ricky Martin

quotes.text: Men make history and not the other way around. In periods where there is no leadership, society stands still. Progress occurs when courageous, skillful leaders seize the opportunity to change things for the better.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.text: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: America was not built on fear. America was built on courage, on imagination and an unbeatable determination to do the job at hand.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.text: God grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change, the courage to change the things I can, and the wisdom to know the difference.
quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quotes.text: You may not always have a comfortable life and you will not always be able to solve all of the world's problems at once but don't ever underestimate the importance you can have because history has shown us that courage can be contagious and hope can take on a life of its own.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: Before you can become a millionaire, you must learn to think like one. You must learn how to motivate yourself to counter fear with courage. Making critical decisions about your career, business, investments and other resources conjures up fear, fear that is part of the process of becoming a financial success.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Stanley

quotes.text: Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.text: Computer science is no more about computers than astronomy is about telescopes.
quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

quotes.text: Using social media to hurt and destroy is callous, acted out by cowards hiding behind computers. My advice is to ignore negativity. Focus on the love around.
quotes.author: Martin Garrix

quotes.text: Man is still the most extraordinary computer of all.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: I am thankful the most important key in history was invented. It's not the key to your house, your car, your boat, your safety deposit box, your bike lock or your private community. It's the key to order, sanity, and peace of mind. The key is 'Delete.'
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.text: Computers themselves, and software yet to be developed, will revolutionize the way we learn.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Globalization, as defined by rich people like us, is a very nice thing... you are talking about the Internet, you are talking about cell phones, you are talking about computers. This doesn't affect two-thirds of the people of the world.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.text: What is Apple, after all? Apple is about people who think 'outside the box,' people who want to use computers to help them change the world, to help them create things that make a difference, and not just to get a job done.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Computers are like Old Testament gods; lots of rules and no mercy.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: A computer once beat me at chess, but it was no match for me at kick boxing.
quotes.author: Emo Philips

quotes.text: Computers are useless. They can only give you answers.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: I think it's fair to say that personal computers have become the most empowering tool we've ever created. They're tools of communication, they're tools of creativity, and they can be shaped by their user.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: When people think about computer science, they imagine people with pocket protectors and thick glasses who code all night.
quotes.author: Marissa Mayer

quotes.text: Computers are magnificent tools for the realization of our dreams, but no machine can replace the human spark of spirit, compassion, love, and understanding.
quotes.author: Louis V. Gerstner, Jr.

quotes.text: The new information technology... Internet and e-mail... have practically eliminated the physical costs of communications.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: I do not fear computers. I fear the lack of them.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.text: Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window.
quotes.author: Steve Wozniak

quotes.text: I have always believed that technology should do the hard work - discovery, organization, communication - so users can do what makes them happiest: living and loving, not messing with annoying computers! That means making our products work together seamlessly.
quotes.author: Larry Page

quotes.text: The Internet is not just one thing, it's a collection of things - of numerous communications networks that all speak the same digital language.
quotes.author: Jim Clark

quotes.text: The digital revolution is far more significant than the invention of writing or even of printing.
quotes.author: Douglas Engelbart

quotes.text: Software comes from heaven when you have good hardware.
quotes.author: Ken Olsen

quotes.text: Computers don't create computer animation any more than a pencil creates pencil animation. What creates computer animation is the artist.
quotes.author: John Lasseter

quotes.text: To err is human, but to really foul things up you need a computer.
quotes.author: Paul R. Ehrlich

quotes.text: Anyway, all these computers and digital gadgets are no good. They just fill your head with numbers and that can't be good for you.
quotes.author: Prince

quotes.text: In Hollywood, they think drawn animation doesn't work anymore, computers are the way. They forget that the reason computers are the way is that Pixar makes good movies. So everybody tries to copy Pixar. They're relying too much on the technology and not enough on the artists.
quotes.author: Tim Burton

quotes.text: In fact, technology has been the story of human progress from as long back as we know. In 100 years people will look back on now and say, 'That was the Internet Age.' And computers will be seen as a mere ingredient to the Internet Age.
quotes.author: Reed Hastings

quotes.text: The spread of computers and the Internet will put jobs in two categories. People who tell computers what to do, and people who are told by computers what to do.
quotes.author: Marc Andreessen

quotes.text: Ethics is knowing the difference between what you have a right to do and what is right to do.
quotes.author: Potter Stewart

quotes.text: The safety of the people shall be the highest law.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: It is not wisdom but Authority that makes a law.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.text: It is better to risk saving a guilty man than to condemn an innocent one.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: If you must break the law, do it to seize power: in all other cases observe it.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.text: If we desire respect for the law, we must first make the law respectable.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.text: It is legal because I wish it.
quotes.author: Louis XIV

quotes.text: I submit that an individual who breaks a law that conscience tells him is unjust, and who willingly accepts the penalty of imprisonment in order to arouse the conscience of the community over its injustice, is in reality expressing the highest respect for law.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Make crime pay. Become a lawyer.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: Punishment is justice for the unjust.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.text: Never forget that everything Hitler did in Germany was legal.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: We must fix our broken immigration system. That means stopping illegal immigration. And it means welcoming properly vetted legal immigrants, regardless of their race or religion. Just like we have for centuries.
quotes.author: Nikki Haley

quotes.text: Unfortunately, corruption is widespread in government agencies and public enterprises. Our political system promotes nepotism and wasting money. This has undermined our legal system and confidence in the functioning of the state. One of the consequences is that many citizens don't pay their taxes.
quotes.author: George Papandreou

quotes.text: If taxes are laid upon us in any shape without our having a legal representation where they are laid, are we not reduced from the character of free subjects to the miserable state of tributary slaves? We claim British rights not by charter only! We are born to them.
quotes.author: Samuel Adams

quotes.text: We need to remain a nation that doesn't just welcome but that celebrates legal immigrants who come here seeking to pursue the American Dream.
quotes.author: Ted Cruz

quotes.text: The best way to get a bad law repealed is to enforce it strictly.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Gambling is legal and betting is legal, for what I bet.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: Justice delayed is justice denied.
quotes.author: William E. Gladstone

quotes.text: You cannot have maternal health without reproductive health. And reproductive health includes contraception and family planning and access to legal, safe abortion.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.text: Well, when I think of steroids I think of an image. You have the advantage over someone, which is a form of cheating. I guess it wouldn't be right unless it was legal for everybody. Reason it's not legal for everybody is because it can hurt people seriously.
quotes.author: Evander Holyfield

quotes.text: We educated, privileged lawyers have a professional and moral duty to represent the underrepresented in our society, to ensure that justice exists for all, both legal and economic justice.
quotes.author: Sonia Sotomayor

quotes.text: I busted a mirror and got seven years bad luck, but my lawyer thinks he can get me five.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: Laws made by common consent must not be trampled on by individuals.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.text: Fairness is what justice really is.
quotes.author: Potter Stewart

quotes.text: As Congress continues to debate ways to address illegal immigration, we must remember the many hard-working legal immigrants that contribute so much to our nation's economy and culture.
quotes.author: Bob Filner

quotes.text: There should not be a question of legal or illegal immigration. People came and immigrated to this country from the time of the Indians. No one's illegal. They should just be able to come.
quotes.author: Linda Ronstadt

quotes.text: There are two great days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.text: It's sad to know I'm done. But looking back, I've got a lot of great memories.
quotes.author: Bonnie Blair

quotes.text: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.text: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: I am blessed to have so many great things in my life - family, friends and God. All will be in my thoughts daily.
quotes.author: Lil' Kim

quotes.text: Never stop fighting until you arrive at your destined place - that is, the unique you. Have an aim in life, continuously acquire knowledge, work hard, and have perseverance to realise the great life.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: People who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.text: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: I've learned that fear limits you and your vision. It serves as blinders to what may be just a few steps down the road for you. The journey is valuable, but believing in your talents, your abilities, and your self-worth can empower you to walk down an even brighter path. Transforming fear into freedom - how great is that?
quotes.author: Soledad O'Brien

quotes.text: One of the best ways to make yourself happy in the present is to recall happy times from the past. Photos are a great memory-prompt, and because we tend to take photos of happy occasions, they weight our memories to the good.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.text: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.text: I was given such a great gift. It's a miracle that never stops amazing me and reminding me to give thanks, every day. Having a wife and daughter gives me a lot more purpose. I was much more selfish before, but now I think about what kind of role model I'll be. I just want to be a better man.
quotes.author: Jake Owen

quotes.text: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.text: I'm proud of my hard work. Working hard won't always lead to the exact things we desire. There are many things I've wanted that I haven't always gotten. But, I have a great satisfaction in the blessings from my mother and father, who instilled a great work ethic in me both personally and professionally.
quotes.author: Tamron Hall

quotes.text: I love a man with a great sense of humor and who is intelligent - a man who has a great smile. He has to make me laugh. I like a man who is very ambitious and driven and who has a good heart and makes me feel safe. I like a man who is very strong and independent and confident - that is very sexy - but at the same time, he's very kind to people.
quotes.author: Nicole Scherzinger

quotes.text: No dream is too big. No challenge is too great. Nothing we want for our future is beyond our reach.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.text: Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some have greatness thrust upon them.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: My father was my teacher. But most importantly he was a great dad.
quotes.author: Beau Bridges

quotes.text: First, accept sadness. Realize that without losing, winning isn't so great.
quotes.author: Alyssa Milano

quotes.text: A little thought and a little kindness are often worth more than a great deal of money.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.text: There is no great genius without some touch of madness.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Only great minds can afford a simple style.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.text: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.text: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

quotes.text: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: Out of difficulties grow miracles.
quotes.author: Jean de la Bruyere

quotes.text: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.text: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.
quotes.author: Kevyn Aucoin

quotes.text: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.text: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.text: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.text: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: If the world seems cold to you, kindle fires to warm it.
quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

quotes.text: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: What we think, we become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.text: I don't make jokes. I just watch the government and report the facts.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: Art, freedom and creativity will change society faster than politics.
quotes.author: Victor Pinchuk

quotes.text: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

quotes.text: We need to reject any politics that targets people because of race or religion. This isn't a matter of political correctness. It's a matter of understanding what makes us strong. The world respects us not just for our arsenal; it respects us for our diversity and our openness and the way we respect every faith.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: I am a teacher. It's how I define myself. A good teacher isn't someone who gives the answers out to their kids but is understanding of needs and challenges and gives tools to help other people succeed. That's the way I see myself, so whatever it is that I will do eventually after politics, it'll have to do a lot with teaching.
quotes.author: Justin Trudeau

quotes.text: In our age there is no such thing as 'keeping out of politics.' All issues are political issues, and politics itself is a mass of lies, evasions, folly, hatred and schizophrenia.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.text: I must study politics and war that my sons may have liberty to study mathematics and philosophy.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.text: Politics have no relation to morals.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.text: Let us not seek the Republican answer or the Democratic answer, but the right answer. Let us not seek to fix the blame for the past. Let us accept our own responsibility for the future.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: One of the key problems today is that politics is such a disgrace, good people don't go into government.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.text: One of the penalties for refusing to participate in politics is that you end up being governed by your inferiors.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: When you get together in a group, it becomes like a family, with the different personalities and the politics that comes with being in a band. It's different than bringing something in by yourself.
quotes.author: Albert Hammond, Jr.

quotes.text: Politics is war without bloodshed while war is politics with bloodshed.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.text: The ballot is stronger than the bullet.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Suppose you were an idiot, and suppose you were a member of Congress; but I repeat myself.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: We have to be bold in our national ambitions. First, we must win the fight against poverty within the next decade. Second, we must improve moral standards in government and society to provide a strong foundation for good governance. Third, we must change the character of our politics to promote fertile ground for reforms.
quotes.author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

quotes.text: Politics is the art of looking for trouble, finding it everywhere, diagnosing it incorrectly and applying the wrong remedies.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: I never considered a difference of opinion in politics, in religion, in philosophy, as cause for withdrawing from a friend.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: In politics stupidity is not a handicap.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.text: Man is by nature a political animal.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Democracy is when the indigent, and not the men of property, are the rulers.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: If we don't believe in freedom of expression for people we despise, we don't believe in it at all.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.text: Life without liberty is like a body without spirit.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: I like to see myself as a bridge builder, that is me building bridges between people, between races, between cultures, between politics, trying to find common ground.
quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

quotes.text: These things will destroy the human race: politics without principle, progress without compassion, wealth without work, learning without silence, religion without fearlessness and worship without awareness.
quotes.author: Anthony de Mello

quotes.text: The hottest place in Hell is reserved for those who remain neutral in times of great moral conflict.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.
quotes.author: Bobby Unser

quotes.text: Football is football and talent is talent. But the mindset of your team makes all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Griffin III

quotes.text: Every day is a new opportunity. You can build on yesterday's success or put its failures behind and start over again. That's the way life is, with a new game every day, and that's the way baseball is.
quotes.author: Bob Feller

quotes.text: Just play. Have fun. Enjoy the game.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: Winners never quit and quitters never win.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Sports teaches you character, it teaches you to play by the rules, it teaches you to know what it feels like to win and lose-it teaches you about life.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.text: You can't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.text: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.text: Many men go fishing all of their lives without knowing that it is not fish they are after.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: There's three things men always talk about - women, sports, and cars.
quotes.author: Mario Lopez

quotes.text: I couldn't find the sports car of my dreams, so I built it myself.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Porsche

quotes.text: Sports do not build character. They reveal it.
quotes.author: Heywood Broun

quotes.text: You can't win unless you learn how to lose.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.text: The game of basketball has been everything to me. My place of refuge, place I've always gone where I needed comfort and peace. It's been the site of intense pain and the most intense feelings of joy and satisfaction. It's a relationship that has evolved over time, given me the greatest respect and love for the game.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: Finding good players is easy. Getting them to play as a team is another story.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.text: A good vacation for me is going to warm weather. Being able to go outside, in the sun, hit the beach, play outside sports. Being active outside. Going swimming, hanging by the pool, having a couple drinks, having a couple of your close buddies around, and just having a blast.
quotes.author: Rob Gronkowski

quotes.text: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.text: Adversity causes some men to break; others to break records.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: Winning is habit. Unfortunately, so is losing.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: It's just a job. Grass grows, birds fly, waves pound the sand. I beat people up.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Sports teaches you to understand the meaning of a team. You need to be able to work with everybody; you don't have to be their best friend. You can experience the fun of competition and driving toward a common goal without pushing to bond in some major way with each individual on a project.
quotes.author: Kathleen Kennedy

quotes.text: Gold medals aren't really made of gold. They're made of sweat, determination, and a hard-to-find alloy called guts.
quotes.author: Dan Gable

quotes.text: It is not up to me whether I win or lose. Ultimately, this might not be my day. And it is that philosophy towards sports, something that I really truly live by. I am emotional. I want to win. I am hungry. I am a competitor. I have that fire. But deep down, I truly enjoy the art of competing so much more than the result.
quotes.author: Apolo Ohno

quotes.text: Baseball was, is and always will be to me the best game in the world.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.text: Band members have a special bond. A great band is more than just some people working together. It's like a highly specialized army unit, or a winning sports team. A unique combination of elements that becomes stronger together than apart.
quotes.author: Steven Van Zandt

quotes.text: A people without the knowledge of their past history, origin and culture is like a tree without roots.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.text: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: I believe that imagination is stronger than knowledge. That myth is more potent than history. That dreams are more powerful than facts. That hope always triumphs over experience. That laughter is the only cure for grief. And I believe that love is stronger than death.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.text: We are not makers of history. We are made by history.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Men make history and not the other way around. In periods where there is no leadership, society stands still. Progress occurs when courageous, skillful leaders seize the opportunity to change things for the better.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.text: You may not always have a comfortable life and you will not always be able to solve all of the world's problems at once but don't ever underestimate the importance you can have because history has shown us that courage can be contagious and hope can take on a life of its own.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Our flag honors those who have fought to protect it, and is a reminder of the sacrifice of our nation's founders and heroes. As the ultimate icon of America's storied history, the Stars and Stripes represents the very best of this nation.
quotes.author: Joe Barton

quotes.text: History repeats itself, first as tragedy, second as farce.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.text: Observe good faith and justice toward all nations. Cultivate peace and harmony with all.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.text: Following the light of the sun, we left the Old World.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.text: History teaches us that unity is strength, and cautions us to submerge and overcome our differences in the quest for common goals, to strive, with all our combined strength, for the path to true African brotherhood and unity.
quotes.author: Haile Selassie

quotes.text: More than ever before in human history, we share a common destiny. We can master it only if we face it together. And that, my friends, is why we have the United Nations.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.text: Those who do not remember the past are condemned to repeat it.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.text: Throughout history, it has been the inaction of those who could have acted; the indifference of those who should have known better; the silence of the voice of justice when it mattered most; that has made it possible for evil to triumph.
quotes.author: Haile Selassie

quotes.text: I believe our flag is more than just cloth and ink. It is a universally recognized symbol that stands for liberty, and freedom. It is the history of our nation, and it's marked by the blood of those who died defending it.
quotes.author: John Thune

quotes.text: I came, I saw, I conquered.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.text: If you are neutral in situations of injustice, you have chosen the side of the oppressor. If an elephant has its foot on the tail of a mouse and you say that you are neutral, the mouse will not appreciate your neutrality.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.text: The point in history at which we stand is full of promise and danger. The world will either move forward toward unity and widely shared prosperity - or it will move apart.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: History never really says goodbye. History says, 'See you later.'
quotes.author: Eduardo Galeano

quotes.text: History will be kind to me for I intend to write it.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: You may write me down in history with your bitter, twisted lines. You may trod me in the very dirt, but still, like dust, I'll rise.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: The history of all previous societies has been the history of class struggles.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.text: I am thankful the most important key in history was invented. It's not the key to your house, your car, your boat, your safety deposit box, your bike lock or your private community. It's the key to order, sanity, and peace of mind. The key is 'Delete.'
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.text: No event in American history is more misunderstood than the Vietnam War. It was misreported then, and it is misremembered now.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.text: It takes an endless amount of history to make even a little tradition.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.text: It is not the beauty of a building you should look at; its the construction of the foundation that will stand the test of time.
quotes.author: David Allan Coe

quotes.text: There are no rules of architecture for a castle in the clouds.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.text: Architecture is a visual art, and the buildings speak for themselves.
quotes.author: Julia Morgan

quotes.text: Whatever good things we build end up building us.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: The mother art is architecture. Without an architecture of our own we have no soul of our own civilization.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.text: Architecture should speak of its time and place, but yearn for timelessness.
quotes.author: Frank Gehry

quotes.text: We shape our buildings; thereafter they shape us.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Together let us desire, conceive, and create the new structure of the future, which will embrace architecture and sculpture and painting in one unity and which will one day rise toward Heaven from the hands of a million workers like the crystal symbol of a new faith.
quotes.author: Walter Gropius

quotes.text: Every man's work, whether it be literature, or music or pictures or architecture or anything else, is always a portrait of himself.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.text: Architecture is the thoughtful making of space.
quotes.author: Louis Kahn

quotes.text: All real education is the architecture of the soul.
quotes.author: William Bennett

quotes.text: Fashion is architecture: it is a matter of proportions.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.text: Good buildings come from good people, and all problems are solved by good design.
quotes.author: Stephen Gardiner

quotes.text: I call architecture frozen music.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: I don't think that architecture is only about shelter, is only about a very simple enclosure. It should be able to excite you, to calm you, to make you think.
quotes.author: Zaha Hadid

quotes.text: When you look at Japanese traditional architecture, you have to look at Japanese culture and its relationship with nature. You can actually live in a harmonious, close contact with nature - this very unique to Japan.
quotes.author: Tadao Ando

quotes.text: I enjoy art, architecture, museums, churches and temples; anything that gives me insight into the history and soul of the place I'm in. I can also be a beach bum - I like to laze in the shade of a palm tree with a good book or float in a warm sea at sundown.
quotes.author: Cherie Lunghi

quotes.text: Less is more.
quotes.author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quotes.text: My buildings will be my legacy... they will speak for me long after I'm gone.
quotes.author: Julia Morgan

quotes.text: I don't build in order to have clients. I have clients in order to build.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: The essence of architecture is form and space, and light is the essential element to the key to architectural design, probably more important than anything. Technology and materials are secondary.
quotes.author: I. M. Pei

quotes.text: All architecture is great architecture after sunset; perhaps architecture is really a nocturnal art, like the art of fireworks.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.text: Architecture starts when you carefully put two bricks together. There it begins.
quotes.author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quotes.text: Every great architect is - necessarily - a great poet. He must be a great original interpreter of his time, his day, his age.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.text: The two elements the traveler first captures in the big city are extra human architecture and furious rhythm. Geometry and anguish.
quotes.author: Federico Garcia Lorca

quotes.text: Architecture has always been a very idealistic profession. It's about making the world a better place, and it works over the generations because people go on vacation and they look for it.
quotes.author: Frank Gehry

quotes.text: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
quotes.author: Ausonius

quotes.text: Age is a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it don't matter.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.text: I know not age, nor weariness nor defeat.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.text: A birthday is just another day where you go to work and people give you love. Age is just a state of mind, and you are as old as you think you are. You have to count your blessings and be happy.
quotes.author: Abhishek Bachchan

quotes.text: Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese.
quotes.author: Luis Bunuel

quotes.text: Try to keep your soul young and quivering right up to old age.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.text: Our uniqueness makes us special, makes perception valuable - but it can also make us lonely. This loneliness is different from being 'alone': You can be lonely even surrounded by people. The feeling I'm talking about stems from the sense that we can never fully share the truth of who we are. I experienced this acutely at an early age.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.text: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.text: Being confident is the key to life. Don't be afraid to be you! I'm super different from a lot of kids my age with style and personality, and I'm OK with it. And if you are OK with it, everyone else will be, too. Just be yourself.
quotes.author: Leo Howard

quotes.text: In our age there is no such thing as 'keeping out of politics.' All issues are political issues, and politics itself is a mass of lies, evasions, folly, hatred and schizophrenia.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.text: Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Age appears to be best in four things; old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: Do not go gentle into that good night but rage, rage against the dying of the light.
quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

quotes.text: Those who improve with age embrace the power of personal growth and personal achievement and begin to replace youth with wisdom, innocence with understanding, and lack of purpose with self-actualization.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.text: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young. The greatest thing in life is to keep your mind young.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: The secret of genius is to carry the spirit of the child into old age, which means never losing your enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: There is a plan and a purpose, a value to every life, no matter what its location, age, gender or disability.
quotes.author: Sharron Angle

quotes.text: Every age has its storytelling form, and video gaming is a huge part of our culture. You can ignore or embrace video games and imbue them with the best artistic quality. People are enthralled with video games in the same way as other people love the cinema or theatre.
quotes.author: Andy Serkis

quotes.text: Youth has no age.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: You can't help getting older, but you don't have to get old.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.text: To me - old age is always ten years older than I am.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.text: There is a fountain of youth: it is your mind, your talents, the creativity you bring to your life and the lives of people you love. When you learn to tap this source, you will truly have defeated age.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.text: Men are like wine - some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.text: The age of a woman doesn't mean a thing. The best tunes are played on the oldest fiddles.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Marriage is not about age; it's about finding the right person.
quotes.author: Sophia Bush

quotes.text: Aging is not lost youth but a new stage of opportunity and strength.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.text: Knowledge is power. Information is liberating. Education is the premise of progress, in every society, in every family.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.text: Art, freedom and creativity will change society faster than politics.
quotes.author: Victor Pinchuk

quotes.text: Be stupid, be dumb, be funny, if that's who you are. Don't try to be someone that society wants you to be; that's stupid. So be yourself.
quotes.author: Christina Grimmie

quotes.text: Individual commitment to a group effort - that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Men make history and not the other way around. In periods where there is no leadership, society stands still. Progress occurs when courageous, skillful leaders seize the opportunity to change things for the better.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.text: If we desire a society of peace, then we cannot achieve such a society through violence. If we desire a society without discrimination, then we must not discriminate against anyone in the process of building this society. If we desire a society that is democratic, then democracy must become a means as well as an end.
quotes.author: Bayard Rustin

quotes.text: There is pleasure in the pathless woods, there is rapture in the lonely shore, there is society where none intrudes, by the deep sea, and music in its roar; I love not Man the less, but Nature more.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.text: Where justice is denied, where poverty is enforced, where ignorance prevails, and where any one class is made to feel that society is an organized conspiracy to oppress, rob and degrade them, neither persons nor property will be safe.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.text: We won't have a society if we destroy the environment.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.text: You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: A good person can make another person good; it means that goodness will elicit goodness in the society; other persons will also be good.
quotes.author: Bhumibol Adulyadej

quotes.text: Unlike a drop of water which loses its identity when it joins the ocean, man does not lose his being in the society in which he lives. Man's life is independent. He is born not for the development of the society alone, but for the development of his self.
quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

quotes.text: The glory of justice and the majesty of law are created not just by the Constitution - nor by the courts - nor by the officers of the law - nor by the lawyers - but by the men and women who constitute our society - who are the protectors of the law as they are themselves protected by the law.
quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

quotes.text: Racism is taught in our society, it is not automatic. It is learned behavior toward persons with dissimilar physical characteristics.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.text: Early childhood education is the key to the betterment of society.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.text: Finance is not merely about making money. It's about achieving our deep goals and protecting the fruits of our labor. It's about stewardship and, therefore, about achieving the good society.
quotes.author: Robert J. Shiller

quotes.text: Without memory, there is no culture. Without memory, there would be no civilization, no society, no future.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.text: If you're white and you're wrong, then you're wrong; if you're black and you're wrong, you're wrong. People are people. Black, blue, pink, green - God make no rules about color; only society make rules where my people suffer, and that why we must have redemption and redemption now.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.text: I say what I want to say and do what I want to do. There's no in between. People will either love you for it or hate you for it.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.text: We have to be bold in our national ambitions. First, we must win the fight against poverty within the next decade. Second, we must improve moral standards in government and society to provide a strong foundation for good governance. Third, we must change the character of our politics to promote fertile ground for reforms.
quotes.author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

quotes.text: Terrorism is a psychological warfare. Terrorists try to manipulate us and change our behavior by creating fear, uncertainty, and division in society.
quotes.author: Patrick J. Kennedy

quotes.text: A multicultural society does not reject the culture of the other but is prepared to listen, to see, to dialogue and, in the final analysis, to possibly accept the other's culture without compromising its own.
quotes.author: Reuven Rivlin

quotes.text: We live in a society exquisitely dependent on science and technology, in which hardly anyone knows anything about science and technology.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.text: To educate a man in mind and not in morals is to educate a menace to society.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Hatred is corrosive of a person's wisdom and conscience; the mentality of enmity can poison a nation's spirit, instigate brutal life and death struggles, destroy a society's tolerance and humanity, and block a nation's progress to freedom and democracy.
quotes.author: Liu Xiaobo

quotes.text: No society can surely be flourishing and happy, of which the far greater part of the members are poor and miserable.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.text: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.text: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.
quotes.author: George A. Moore

quotes.text: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Every day is a journey, and the journey itself is home.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.text: Success comes to those who dedicate everything to their passion in life. To be successful, it is also very important to be humble and never let fame or money travel to your head.
quotes.author: A. R. Rahman

quotes.text: A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.text: A good traveler has no fixed plans, and is not intent on arriving.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: To travel is to take a journey into yourself.
quotes.author: Danny Kaye

quotes.text: It is better to travel well than to arrive.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Life is short and the older you get, the more you feel it. Indeed, the shorter it is. People lose their capacity to walk, run, travel, think, and experience life. I realise how important it is to use the time I have.
quotes.author: Viggo Mortensen

quotes.text: The best education I have ever received was through travel.
quotes.author: Lisa Ling

quotes.text: Exploration is really the essence of the human spirit.
quotes.author: Frank Borman

quotes.text: I see my path, but I don't know where it leads. Not knowing where I'm going is what inspires me to travel it.
quotes.author: Rosalia de Castro

quotes.text: Travel early and travel often. Live abroad, if you can. Understand cultures other than your own. As your understanding of other cultures increases, your understanding of yourself and your own culture will increase exponentially.
quotes.author: Tom Freston

quotes.text: I travel light. I think the most important thing is to be in a good mood and enjoy life, wherever you are.
quotes.author: Diane von Furstenberg

quotes.text: Never go on trips with anyone you do not love.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: All journeys have secret destinations of which the traveler is unaware.
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.text: A journey is a person in itself; no two are alike. And all plans, safeguards, policing, and coercion are fruitless. We find that after years of struggle that we do not take a trip; a trip takes us.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.text: We shall not cease from exploration, and the end of all our exploring will be to arrive where we started and know the place for the first time.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.text: The traveler sees what he sees, the tourist sees what he has come to see.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.text: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.text: Travel can be one of the most rewarding forms of introspection.
quotes.author: Lawrence Durrell

quotes.text: I am blessed for what I have, but I believed in it from the beginning. Today, the dream is the same: I still want to travel, I still want to entertain, and I most certainly still want to have fun.
quotes.author: Guy Laliberte

quotes.text: Travel becomes a strategy for accumulating photographs.
quotes.author: Susan Sontag

quotes.text: We are what our thoughts have made us; so take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; they travel far.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.text: And know that I am with you always; yes, to the end of time.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.text: Some people are born for Halloween, and some are just counting the days until Christmas.
quotes.author: Stephen Graham Jones

quotes.text: Christmas is the perfect time to celebrate the love of God and family and to create memories that will last forever. Jesus is God's perfect, indescribable gift. The amazing thing is that not only are we able to receive this gift, but we are able to share it with others on Christmas and every other day of the year.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: Christmas is the spirit of giving without a thought of getting. It is happiness because we see joy in people. It is forgetting self and finding time for others. It is discarding the meaningless and stressing the true values.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.text: The spirit of Christmas is the spirit of love and of generosity and of goodness. It illuminates the picture window of the soul, and we look out upon the world's busy life and become more interested in people than in things.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.text: Christmas waves a magic wand over this world, and behold, everything is softer and more beautiful.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.text: Christmas isn't a season. It's a feeling.
quotes.author: Edna Ferber

quotes.text: God never gives someone a gift they are not capable of receiving. If he gives us the gift of Christmas, it is because we all have the ability to understand and receive it.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.text: Christmas is not a time nor a season, but a state of mind. To cherish peace and goodwill, to be plenteous in mercy, is to have the real spirit of Christmas.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.text: Halloween starts earlier and earlier, just like Christmas.
quotes.author: Robert Englund

quotes.text: Christmas is a season not only of rejoicing but of reflection.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Halloween isn't the only time for ghosts and ghost stories. In Victorian Britain, spooky winter's tales were part of the Christmas season, often told after dinner, over port or coffee.
quotes.author: Michael Dirda

quotes.text: I started making music... I guess I was 12, and I started playing 'Guitar Hero.' And you know, it got to a point where on expert, you can only exceed to a certain point. And so, you know, I was like, 'Let's play real guitar. Let's not waste more time.' So, I got my mom, I told her to buy me a guitar for Christmas, and I started making music then.
quotes.author: Post Malone

quotes.text: I love the excitement, the childlike spirit of innocence and just about everything that goes along with Christmas.
quotes.author: Hillary Scott

quotes.text: My parents were kind of over protective people. Me and my sister had to play in the backyard all the time. They bought us bikes for Christmas but wouldn't let us ride in the street, we had to ride in the backyard. Another Christmas, my dad got me a basketball hoop and put it in the middle of the lawn! You can't dribble on grass.
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.text: Christmas is the day that holds all time together.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.text: Let's be naughty and save Santa the trip.
quotes.author: Gary Allan

quotes.text: I've been giving back since I was a teen, handing out turkeys at Thanksgiving and handing out toys at toys drives for Christmas. It's very important to give back as a youth. It's as simple as helping an old lady across the street or giving up your seat on the bus for someone who is pregnant.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.text: Christmas is joy, religious joy, an inner joy of light and peace.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.text: We have a host of English teachers in the family. My mum is an English teacher, and so are my dad, my aunt and my uncle. I have grown up with family writing competitions, and I can't remember a birthday or Christmas present that didn't include books.
quotes.author: Alexandra Adornetto

quotes.text: The main reason Santa is so jolly is because he knows where all the bad girls live.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.text: Christmas and the holidays are the season of giving. It's a time when people are more kind and open-hearted.
quotes.author: Gisele Bundchen

quotes.text: I will honor Christmas in my heart, and try to keep it all the year.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.text: He who has not Christmas in his heart will never find it under a tree.
quotes.author: Roy L. Smith

quotes.text: I love Christmas, not just because of the presents but because of all the decorations and lights and the warmth of the season.
quotes.author: Ashley Tisdale

quotes.text: Nothing says holidays, like a cheese log.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.text: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.text: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace.
quotes.author: Christie Brinkley

quotes.text: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
quotes.author: John Ray

quotes.text: Lighten up, just enjoy life, smile more, laugh more, and don't get so worked up about things.
quotes.author: Kenneth Branagh

quotes.text: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.text: Peace is the beauty of life. It is sunshine. It is the smile of a child, the love of a mother, the joy of a father, the togetherness of a family. It is the advancement of man, the victory of a just cause, the triumph of truth.
quotes.author: Menachem Begin

quotes.text: Nothing you wear is more important than your smile.
quotes.author: Connie Stevens

quotes.text: Smile, it is the key that fits the lock of everybody's heart.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.text: The greatest self is a peaceful smile, that always sees the world smiling back.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.text: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.text: Peace begins with a smile.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Your smile will give you a positive countenance that will make people feel comfortable around you.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: A warm smile is the universal language of kindness.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.text: My children are the reason I laugh, smile and want to get up every morning.
quotes.author: Gena Lee Nolin

quotes.text: We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but they whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves their conduct, will pursue their principles unto death.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: I never get tired of smiling. I'm just the kind of guy who likes to smile.
quotes.author: Jason Ritter

quotes.text: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: A smile is happiness you'll find right under your nose.
quotes.author: Tom Wilson

quotes.text: Smiling is definitely one of the best beauty remedies. If you have a good sense of humor and a good approach to life, that's beautiful.
quotes.author: Rashida Jones

quotes.text: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.text: I can't change my personality. I'll always smile, but I'll be more focused.
quotes.author: Katarina Johnson-Thompson

quotes.text: Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.text: I just find myself happy with the simple things. Appreciating the blessings God gave me.
quotes.author: DMX

quotes.text: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.text: Friends are the siblings God never gave us.
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.text: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: I'm blessed and I thank God for every day for everything that happens for me.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.text: I am blessed to have so many great things in my life - family, friends and God. All will be in my thoughts daily.
quotes.author: Lil' Kim

quotes.text: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia
