quotes.text: A word of encouragement from a teacher to a child can change a life. A word of encouragement from a spouse can save a marriage. A word of encouragement from a leader can inspire a person to reach her potential.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.text: Experts on romance say for a happy marriage there has to be more than a passionate love. For a lasting union, they insist, there must be a genuine liking for each other. Which, in my book, is a good definition for friendship.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: I do believe that God blessed me in life with a wonderful family, a successful career, and a loving marriage, and remain thankful for that blessing.
quotes.author: Bonnie Tyler

quotes.text: Riding a bicycle is the summit of human endeavour - an almost neutral environmental effect coupled with the ability to travel substantial distances without disturbing anybody. The bike is the perfect marriage of technology and human energy.
quotes.author: Jeremy Corbyn

quotes.text: I believe marriage is between a man and a woman. I am not in favor of gay marriage. But when you start playing around with constitutions, just to prohibit somebody who cares about another person, it just seems to me that's not what America's about. Usually, our constitutions expand liberties, they don't contract them.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: Marriage is not about age; it's about finding the right person.
quotes.author: Sophia Bush

quotes.text: Marriage is good for those who are afraid to sleep alone at night.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.text: By all means, marry. If you get a good wife, you'll become happy; if you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.text: Every day we have plenty of opportunities to get angry, stressed or offended. But what you're doing when you indulge these negative emotions is giving something outside yourself power over your happiness. You can choose to not let little things upset you.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: For every minute you remain angry, you give up sixty seconds of peace of mind.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Red is such an interesting color to correlate with emotion, because it's on both ends of the spectrum. On one end you have happiness, falling in love, infatuation with someone, passion, all that. On the other end, you've got obsession, jealousy, danger, fear, anger and frustration.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.text: Speak when you are angry - and you'll make the best speech you'll ever regret.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.text: While seeking revenge, dig two graves - one for yourself.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.text: In times of great stress or adversity, it's always best to keep busy, to plow your anger and your energy into something positive.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.text: When anger rises, think of the consequences.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Anybody can become angry - that is easy, but to be angry with the right person and to the right degree and at the right time and for the right purpose, and in the right way - that is not within everybody's power and is not easy.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Anger is the enemy of non-violence and pride is a monster that swallows it up.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Anger is an acid that can do more harm to the vessel in which it is stored than to anything on which it is poured.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: I really believe that all of us have a lot of darkness in our souls. Anger, rage, fear, sadness. I don't think that's only reserved for people who have horrible upbringings. I think it really exists and is part of the human condition. I think in the course of your life you figure out ways to deal with that.
quotes.author: Kevin Bacon

quotes.text: Some days, 24 hours is too much to stay put in, so I take the day hour by hour, moment by moment. I break the task, the challenge, the fear into small, bite-size pieces. I can handle a piece of fear, depression, anger, pain, sadness, loneliness, illness. I actually put my hands up to my face, one next to each eye, like blinders on a horse.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.text: I don't usually lose my temper, but if I get angry, it's true - I'm scary.
quotes.author: Eva Mendes

quotes.text: Anger and intolerance are the enemies of correct understanding.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: People won't have time for you if you are always angry or complaining.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: Discussion is an exchange of knowledge; an argument an exchange of ignorance.
quotes.author: Robert Quillen

quotes.text: I realized that if my thoughts immediately affect my body, I should be careful about what I think. Now if I get angry, I ask myself why I feel that way. If I can find the source of my anger, I can turn that negative energy into something positive.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.text: To be angry is to revenge the faults of others on ourselves.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.text: Too much self-centered attitude, you see, brings, you see, isolation. Result: loneliness, fear, anger. The extreme self-centered attitude is the source of suffering.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems - not people; to focus your energies on answers - not excuses.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: Silence is one of the hardest arguments to refute.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: Censorship is the tool of those who have the need to hide actualities from themselves and from others. Their fear is only their inability to face what is real, and I can't vent any anger against them; I only feel this appalling sadness. Somewhere in their upbringing, they were shielded against the total facts of our existence.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.text: Boredom, anger, sadness, or fear are not 'yours,' not personal. They are conditions of the human mind. They come and go. Nothing that comes and goes is you.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone.
quotes.author: Reba McEntire

quotes.text: I love everything that's old, - old friends, old times, old manners, old books, old wine.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.text: Our prayers should be for blessings in general, for God knows best what is good for us.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: I try to be grateful for the abundance of the blessings that I have, for the journey that I'm on and to relish each day as a gift.
quotes.author: James McGreevey

quotes.text: I believe in Christianity as I believe that the sun has risen: not only because I see it, but because by it I see everything else.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: A blessing is a circle of light drawn around a person to protect, heal and strengthen.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.text: I say luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
quotes.author: Denzel Washington

quotes.text: You gotta try your luck at least once a day, because you could be going around lucky all day and not even know it.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.text: The joyful heart sees and reads the world with a sense of freedom and graciousness.
quotes.author: John O'Donohue

quotes.text: Christ beside me, Christ before me, Christ behind me, Christ within me, Christ beneath me, Christ above me.
quotes.author: Saint Patrick

quotes.text: Love is never defeated, and I could add, the history of Ireland proves it.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.text: Think where man's glory most begins and ends, and say my glory was I had such friends.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: Being Irish, he had an abiding sense of tragedy, which sustained him through temporary periods of joy.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: Luck is believing you're lucky.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.text: We have always found the Irish a bit odd. They refuse to be English.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Cherish your human connections: your relationships with friends and family.
quotes.author: Joseph Brodsky

quotes.text: Geographically, Ireland is a medium-sized rural island that is slowly but steadily being consumed by sheep.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.text: Being Irish, I always had this love of words.
quotes.author: Kenneth Branagh

quotes.text: You've got to think lucky. If you fall into a mudhole, check your back pocket - you might have caught a fish.
quotes.author: Darrell Royal

quotes.text: There is no language like the Irish for soothing and quieting.
quotes.author: John Millington Synge

quotes.text: If you're Irish, it doesn't matter where you go - you'll find family.
quotes.author: Victoria Smurfit

quotes.text: Be true to your work, your word, and your friend.
quotes.author: John Boyle O'Reilly

quotes.text: Our hearts were drunk with a beauty Our eyes could never see.
quotes.author: George William Russell

quotes.text: I was raised in a very old fashioned Ireland where women were reared to be lovely.
quotes.author: Anne Enright

quotes.text: Above all else, deep in my soul, I'm a tough Irishwoman.
quotes.author: Maureen O'Hara

quotes.text: Being Irish is very much a part of who I am. I take it everywhere with me.
quotes.author: Colin Farrell

quotes.text: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
quotes.author: John Ray

quotes.text: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Knowledge is power. Information is liberating. Education is the premise of progress, in every society, in every family.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.text: Knowledge will give you power, but character respect.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: Every day we have plenty of opportunities to get angry, stressed or offended. But what you're doing when you indulge these negative emotions is giving something outside yourself power over your happiness. You can choose to not let little things upset you.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: Cooking is all about people. Food is maybe the only universal thing that really has the power to bring everyone together. No matter what culture, everywhere around the world, people get together to eat.
quotes.author: Guy Fieri

quotes.text: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace.
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.text: Words are singularly the most powerful force available to humanity. We can choose to use this force constructively with words of encouragement, or destructively using words of despair. Words have energy and power with the ability to help, to heal, to hinder, to hurt, to harm, to humiliate and to humble.
quotes.author: Yehuda Berg

quotes.text: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.text: Every human has four endowments - self awareness, conscience, independent will and creative imagination. These give us the ultimate human freedom... The power to choose, to respond, to change.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: The media's the most powerful entity on earth. They have the power to make the innocent guilty and to make the guilty innocent, and that's power. Because they control the minds of the masses.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.text: We must develop and maintain the capacity to forgive. He who is devoid of the power to forgive is devoid of the power to love. There is some good in the worst of us and some evil in the best of us. When we discover this, we are less prone to hate our enemies.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Words have no power to impress the mind without the exquisite horror of their reality.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.text: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: I look forward to a great future for America - a future in which our country will match its military strength with our moral restraint, its wealth with our wisdom, its power with our purpose.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: There is a sacredness in tears. They are not the mark of weakness, but of power. They speak more eloquently than ten thousand tongues. They are the messengers of overwhelming grief, of deep contrition, and of unspeakable love.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.text: When virtue and modesty enlighten her charms, the lustre of a beautiful woman is brighter than the stars of heaven, and the influence of her power it is in vain to resist.
quotes.author: Akhenaton

quotes.text: Let us never forget that government is ourselves and not an alien power over us. The ultimate rulers of our democracy are not a President and senators and congressmen and government officials, but the voters of this country.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Democracy must be built through open societies that share information. When there is information, there is enlightenment. When there is debate, there are solutions. When there is no sharing of power, no rule of law, no accountability, there is abuse, corruption, subjugation and indignation.
quotes.author: Atifete Jahjaga

quotes.text: Don't underestimate the power of your vision to change the world. Whether that world is your office, your community, an industry or a global movement, you need to have a core belief that what you contribute can fundamentally change the paradigm or way of thinking about problems.
quotes.author: Leroy Hood

quotes.text: An animal's eyes have the power to speak a great language.
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.text: I write about the power of trying, because I want to be okay with failing. I write about generosity because I battle selfishness. I write about joy because I know sorrow. I write about faith because I almost lost mine, and I know what it is to be broken and in need of redemption. I write about gratitude because I am thankful - for all of it.
quotes.author: Kristin Armstrong

quotes.text: Respect your efforts, respect yourself. Self-respect leads to self-discipline. When you have both firmly under your belt, that's real power.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.text: Happiness, true happiness, is an inner quality. It is a state of mind. If your mind is at peace, you are happy. If your mind is at peace, but you have nothing else, you can be happy. If you have everything the world can give - pleasure, possessions, power - but lack peace of mind, you can never be happy.
quotes.author: Dada Vaswani

quotes.text: When a man opens a car door for his wife, it's either a new car or a new wife.
quotes.author: Prince Philip

quotes.text: There's three things men always talk about - women, sports, and cars.
quotes.author: Mario Lopez

quotes.text: I couldn't find the sports car of my dreams, so I built it myself.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Porsche

quotes.text: The cars we drive say a lot about us.
quotes.author: Alexandra Paul

quotes.text: See, when you drive home today, you've got a big windshield on the front of your car. And you've got a little bitty rearview mirror. And the reason the windshield is so large and the rearview mirror is so small is because what's happened in your past is not near as important as what's in your future.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
quotes.author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.text: It's a never ending battle of making your cars better and also trying to be better yourself.
quotes.author: Dale Earnhardt

quotes.text: The fact is I don't drive just to get from A to B. I enjoy feeling the car's reactions, becoming part of it.
quotes.author: Enzo Ferrari

quotes.text: Maybe the bike is more dangerous, but the passion for the car for me is second to the bike.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: Just as your car runs more smoothly and requires less energy to go faster and farther when the wheels are in perfect alignment, you perform better when your thoughts, feelings, emotions, goals, and values are in balance.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Cars are the sculptures of our everyday lives.
quotes.author: Chris Bangle

quotes.text: I've always been asked, 'What is my favorite car?' and I've always said 'The next one.'
quotes.author: Carroll Shelby

quotes.text: The connection to place, to the land, the wind, the sun, stars, the moon... it sounds romantic, but it's true - the visceral experience of motion, of moving through time on some amazing machine - a few cars touch on it, but not too many compared to motorcycles. I always felt that any motorcycle journey was special.
quotes.author: Antoine Predock

quotes.text: I am thankful the most important key in history was invented. It's not the key to your house, your car, your boat, your safety deposit box, your bike lock or your private community. It's the key to order, sanity, and peace of mind. The key is 'Delete.'
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.text: Giving money and power to government is like giving whiskey and car keys to teenage boys.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.text: It's like driving a car at night. You never see further than your headlights, but you can make the whole trip that way.
quotes.author: E. L. Doctorow

quotes.text: Everything in life is somewhere else, and you get there in a car.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.text: I race to win. If I am on the bike or in a car it will always be the same.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.text: Shoes make an outfit; they're like rims for a car.
quotes.author: Omari Hardwick

quotes.text: Television, radio, social media. The 24/7 news cycle plows forward mercilessly on our desks, in our cars and in our pockets. Thousands and thousands of messages and voices bombard us from the moment we wake, fighting for our attention. All we see and hear, all day long, is news. And most of it is bad.
quotes.author: Joseph Prince

quotes.text: Never have more children than you have car windows.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.text: We don't need bigger cars or fancier clothes. We need self-respect, identity, community, love, variety, beauty, challenge and a purpose in living that is greater than material accumulation.
quotes.author: Donella Meadows

quotes.text: My mother is a big believer in being responsible for your own happiness. She always talked about finding joy in small moments and insisted that we stop and take in the beauty of an ordinary day. When I stop the car to make my kids really see a sunset, I hear my mother's voice and smile.
quotes.author: Jennifer Garner

quotes.text: The best car safety device is a rear-view mirror with a cop in it.
quotes.author: Dudley Moore

quotes.text: A racing car is an animal with a thousand adjustments.
quotes.author: Mario Andretti

quotes.text: My very best friend died in a car accident when I was 16 years old. That was the hardest blow emotionally that I have ever had to endure. Suddenly, you realize tomorrow might not come. Now I live by the motto, 'Today is what I have.'
quotes.author: Amber Heard

quotes.text: Ethics is knowing the difference between what you have a right to do and what is right to do.
quotes.author: Potter Stewart

quotes.text: The safety of the people shall be the highest law.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: It is not wisdom but Authority that makes a law.
quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

quotes.text: It is better to risk saving a guilty man than to condemn an innocent one.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: If you must break the law, do it to seize power: in all other cases observe it.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.text: If we desire respect for the law, we must first make the law respectable.
quotes.author: Louis D. Brandeis

quotes.text: It is legal because I wish it.
quotes.author: Louis XIV

quotes.text: I submit that an individual who breaks a law that conscience tells him is unjust, and who willingly accepts the penalty of imprisonment in order to arouse the conscience of the community over its injustice, is in reality expressing the highest respect for law.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: Make crime pay. Become a lawyer.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: Punishment is justice for the unjust.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.text: Never forget that everything Hitler did in Germany was legal.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.text: We must fix our broken immigration system. That means stopping illegal immigration. And it means welcoming properly vetted legal immigrants, regardless of their race or religion. Just like we have for centuries.
quotes.author: Nikki Haley

quotes.text: Unfortunately, corruption is widespread in government agencies and public enterprises. Our political system promotes nepotism and wasting money. This has undermined our legal system and confidence in the functioning of the state. One of the consequences is that many citizens don't pay their taxes.
quotes.author: George Papandreou

quotes.text: If taxes are laid upon us in any shape without our having a legal representation where they are laid, are we not reduced from the character of free subjects to the miserable state of tributary slaves? We claim British rights not by charter only! We are born to them.
quotes.author: Samuel Adams

quotes.text: We need to remain a nation that doesn't just welcome but that celebrates legal immigrants who come here seeking to pursue the American Dream.
quotes.author: Ted Cruz

quotes.text: The best way to get a bad law repealed is to enforce it strictly.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Gambling is legal and betting is legal, for what I bet.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: Justice delayed is justice denied.
quotes.author: William E. Gladstone

quotes.text: You cannot have maternal health without reproductive health. And reproductive health includes contraception and family planning and access to legal, safe abortion.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.text: Well, when I think of steroids I think of an image. You have the advantage over someone, which is a form of cheating. I guess it wouldn't be right unless it was legal for everybody. Reason it's not legal for everybody is because it can hurt people seriously.
quotes.author: Evander Holyfield

quotes.text: We educated, privileged lawyers have a professional and moral duty to represent the underrepresented in our society, to ensure that justice exists for all, both legal and economic justice.
quotes.author: Sonia Sotomayor

quotes.text: I busted a mirror and got seven years bad luck, but my lawyer thinks he can get me five.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: Laws made by common consent must not be trampled on by individuals.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.text: Fairness is what justice really is.
quotes.author: Potter Stewart

quotes.text: As Congress continues to debate ways to address illegal immigration, we must remember the many hard-working legal immigrants that contribute so much to our nation's economy and culture.
quotes.author: Bob Filner

quotes.text: There should not be a question of legal or illegal immigration. People came and immigrated to this country from the time of the Indians. No one's illegal. They should just be able to come.
quotes.author: Linda Ronstadt

quotes.text: The science of today is the technology of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Edward Teller

quotes.text: Technology can be our best friend, and technology can also be the biggest party pooper of our lives. It interrupts our own story, interrupts our ability to have a thought or a daydream, to imagine something wonderful, because we're too busy bridging the walk from the cafeteria back to the office on the cell phone.
quotes.author: Steven Spielberg

quotes.text: It has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Technology is a useful servant but a dangerous master.
quotes.author: Christian Lous Lange

quotes.text: Technology is just a tool. In terms of getting the kids working together and motivating them, the teacher is the most important.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Technology is nothing. What's important is that you have a faith in people, that they're basically good and smart, and if you give them tools, they'll do wonderful things with them.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Every once in a while, a new technology, an old problem, and a big idea turn into an innovation.
quotes.author: Dean Kamen

quotes.text: Information technology and business are becoming inextricably interwoven. I don't think anybody can talk meaningfully about one without the talking about the other.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don't really even notice it, so it's part of everyday life.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Even with all our technology and the inventions that make modern life so much easier than it once was, it takes just one big natural disaster to wipe all that away and remind us that, here on Earth, we're still at the mercy of nature.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.text: Social media is not about the exploitation of technology but service to community.
quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

quotes.text: Technology and social media have brought power back to the people.
quotes.author: Mark McKinnon

quotes.text: The first rule of any technology used in a business is that automation applied to an efficient operation will magnify the efficiency. The second is that automation applied to an inefficient operation will magnify the inefficiency.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.text: Engineering or technology is all about using the power of science to make life better for people, to reduce cost, to improve comfort, to improve productivity, etc.
quotes.author: N. R. Narayana Murthy

quotes.text: Design is a way of life, a point of view. It involves the whole complex of visual communications: talent, creative ability, manual skill, and technical knowledge. Aesthetics and economics, technology and psychology are intrinsically related to the process.
quotes.author: Paul Rand

quotes.text: The number one benefit of information technology is that it empowers people to do what they want to do. It lets people be creative. It lets people be productive. It lets people learn things they didn't think they could learn before, and so in a sense it is all about potential.
quotes.author: Steve Ballmer

quotes.text: Good, bad or indifferent, if you are not investing in new technology, you are going to be left behind.
quotes.author: Philip Green

quotes.text: While technology is important, it's what we do with it that truly matters.
quotes.author: Muhammad Yunus

quotes.text: Sharing is good, and with digital technology, sharing is easy.
quotes.author: Richard Stallman

quotes.text: We live in a society exquisitely dependent on science and technology, in which hardly anyone knows anything about science and technology.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.text: Modern technology has become a total phenomenon for civilization, the defining force of a new social order in which efficiency is no longer an option but a necessity imposed on all human activity.
quotes.author: Jacques Ellul

quotes.text: We will always have STEM with us. Some things will drop out of the public eye and will go away, but there will always be science, engineering, and technology. And there will always, always be mathematics.
quotes.author: Katherine Johnson

quotes.text: Getting information off the Internet is like taking a drink from a fire hydrant.
quotes.author: Mitchell Kapor

quotes.text: Once you have an innovation culture, even those who are not scientists or engineers - poets, actors, journalists - they, as communities, embrace the meaning of what it is to be scientifically literate. They embrace the concept of an innovation culture. They vote in ways that promote it. They don't fight science and they don't fight technology.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.text: Riding a bicycle is the summit of human endeavour - an almost neutral environmental effect coupled with the ability to travel substantial distances without disturbing anybody. The bike is the perfect marriage of technology and human energy.
quotes.author: Jeremy Corbyn

quotes.text: Turn off your email; turn off your phone; disconnect from the Internet; figure out a way to set limits so you can concentrate when you need to, and disengage when you need to. Technology is a good servant but a bad master.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.text: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.text: Love myself I do. Not everything, but I love the good as well as the bad. I love my crazy lifestyle, and I love my hard discipline. I love my freedom of speech and the way my eyes get dark when I'm tired. I love that I have learned to trust people with my heart, even if it will get broken. I am proud of everything that I am and will become.
quotes.author: Johnny Weir

quotes.text: Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving. It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.text: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.text: Some days are just bad days, that's all. You have to experience sadness to know happiness, and I remind myself that not every day is going to be a good day, that's just the way it is!
quotes.author: Dita Von Teese

quotes.text: One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.text: Nobody can predict the future. You just have to give your all to the relationship you're in and do your best to take care of your partner, communicate and give them every last drop of love you have. I think one of the most important things in a relationship is caring for your significant other through good times and bad.
quotes.author: Nick Cannon

quotes.text: For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others; for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness; and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Nothing is better than going home to family and eating good food and relaxing.
quotes.author: Irina Shayk

quotes.text: No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Happiness radiates like the fragrance from a flower and draws all good things towards you.
quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quotes.text: To enjoy good health, to bring true happiness to one's family, to bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one's own mind. If a man can control his mind he can find the way to Enlightenment, and all wisdom and virtue will naturally come to him.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.text: The less we deserve good fortune, the more we hope for it.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.text: It's easy to impress me. I don't need a fancy party to be happy. Just good friends, good food, and good laughs. I'm happy. I'm satisfied. I'm content.
quotes.author: Maria Sharapova

quotes.text: Most good relationships are built on mutual trust and respect.
quotes.author: Mona Sutphen

quotes.text: Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence, so that's very important for good health.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The good times of today, are the sad thoughts of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.text: I am good, but not an angel. I do sin, but I am not the devil. I am just a small girl in a big world trying to find someone to love.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: Teaching is a very noble profession that shapes the character, caliber, and future of an individual. If the people remember me as a good teacher, that will be the biggest honour for me.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: Goodness is about character - integrity, honesty, kindness, generosity, moral courage, and the like. More than anything else, it is about how we treat other people.
quotes.author: Dennis Prager

quotes.text: Wearing the correct dress for any occasion is a matter of good manners.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.text: A good leader takes a little more than his share of the blame, a little less than his share of the credit.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.text: We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Music is love, love is music, music is life, and I love my life. Thank you and good night.
quotes.author: A. J. McLean

quotes.text: Friends and good manners will carry you where money won't go.
quotes.author: Margaret Walker

quotes.text: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.text: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace.
quotes.author: Christie Brinkley

quotes.text: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.text: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
quotes.author: John Ray

quotes.text: Lighten up, just enjoy life, smile more, laugh more, and don't get so worked up about things.
quotes.author: Kenneth Branagh

quotes.text: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.text: Peace is the beauty of life. It is sunshine. It is the smile of a child, the love of a mother, the joy of a father, the togetherness of a family. It is the advancement of man, the victory of a just cause, the triumph of truth.
quotes.author: Menachem Begin

quotes.text: Nothing you wear is more important than your smile.
quotes.author: Connie Stevens

quotes.text: Smile, it is the key that fits the lock of everybody's heart.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.text: The greatest self is a peaceful smile, that always sees the world smiling back.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.text: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.text: Peace begins with a smile.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Your smile will give you a positive countenance that will make people feel comfortable around you.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: A warm smile is the universal language of kindness.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.text: My children are the reason I laugh, smile and want to get up every morning.
quotes.author: Gena Lee Nolin

quotes.text: We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: I love those who can smile in trouble, who can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but they whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves their conduct, will pursue their principles unto death.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: I never get tired of smiling. I'm just the kind of guy who likes to smile.
quotes.author: Jason Ritter

quotes.text: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: A smile is happiness you'll find right under your nose.
quotes.author: Tom Wilson

quotes.text: Smiling is definitely one of the best beauty remedies. If you have a good sense of humor and a good approach to life, that's beautiful.
quotes.author: Rashida Jones

quotes.text: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.text: I can't change my personality. I'll always smile, but I'll be more focused.
quotes.author: Katarina Johnson-Thompson

quotes.text: Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.text: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
quotes.author: Gene Tunney

quotes.text: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: The purpose of training is to tighten up the slack, toughen the body, and polish the spirit.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.text: I'm not in the best shape, but I want to prove to myself I can do something that seems insurmountable and inspire others by showing them no matter where they are in their fitness goals, they can do it, too.
quotes.author: Ruben Studdard

quotes.text: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.text: Fitness is not about being better than someone else... It's about being better than you used to be.
quotes.author: Khloe Kardashian

quotes.text: For me, fitness is not just about hitting the gym; it is also about an inner happiness and an overall well-being.
quotes.author: Rakul Preet Singh

quotes.text: Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: True enjoyment comes from activity of the mind and exercise of the body; the two are ever united.
quotes.author: Wilhelm von Humboldt

quotes.text: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
quotes.author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.text: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.text: People talk about physical fitness, but mental health is equally important. I see people suffering, and their families feel a sense of shame about it, which doesn't help. One needs support and understanding. I am now working on an initiative to create awareness about anxiety and depression and help people.
quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

quotes.text: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very far.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: The reason I exercise is for the quality of life I enjoy.
quotes.author: Kenneth H. Cooper

quotes.text: The mind is the most important part of achieving any fitness goal. Mental change always comes before physical change.
quotes.author: Matt McGorry

quotes.text: In fitness, there are no short cuts. It involves immense discipline and hard work.
quotes.author: Mahesh Babu

quotes.text: You need to put what you learn into practice and do it over and over again until it's a habit. I always say, 'Seeing is not believing. Doing is believing.' There is a lot to learn about fitness, nutrition and emotions, but once you do, you can master them instead of them mastering you.
quotes.author: Brett Hoebel

quotes.text: Exercise to stimulate, not to annihilate. The world wasn't formed in a day, and neither were we. Set small goals and build upon them.
quotes.author: Lee Haney

quotes.text: If I don't feel confident about my body, I'm not going to sit at home and feel sorry for myself and not do something about it. It's all about taking action and not being lazy. So you do the work, whether it's fitness or whatever. It's about getting up, motivating yourself and just doing it.
quotes.author: Kim Kardashian

quotes.text: Swimming is normal for me. I'm relaxed. I'm comfortable, and I know my surroundings. It's my home.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.text: Bodybuilding is much like any other sport. To be successful, you must dedicate yourself 100% to your training, diet and mental approach.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: If we could give every individual the right amount of nourishment and exercise, not too little and not too much, we would have found the safest way to health.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.text: Health is the thing that makes you feel that now is the best time of the year.
quotes.author: Franklin Pierce Adams

quotes.text: Exercise is amazing, from the inside out. I feel so alive and have more energy.
quotes.author: Vanessa Hudgens

quotes.text: Exercise should be regarded as tribute to the heart.
quotes.author: Gene Tunney

quotes.text: Love myself I do. Not everything, but I love the good as well as the bad. I love my crazy lifestyle, and I love my hard discipline. I love my freedom of speech and the way my eyes get dark when I'm tired. I love that I have learned to trust people with my heart, even if it will get broken. I am proud of everything that I am and will become.
quotes.author: Johnny Weir

quotes.text: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.text: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.text: I truly believe that everything that we do and everyone that we meet is put in our path for a purpose. There are no accidents; we're all teachers - if we're willing to pay attention to the lessons we learn, trust our positive instincts and not be afraid to take risks or wait for some miracle to come knocking at our door.
quotes.author: Marla Gibbs

quotes.text: Whoever is careless with the truth in small matters cannot be trusted with important matters.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Most good relationships are built on mutual trust and respect.
quotes.author: Mona Sutphen

quotes.text: Do not let your hearts be troubled. Trust in God; trust also in me.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.text: A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: In finding love, I think it's important to be patient. In being in a relationship, I think it's important to be honest, to communicate, to respect and trust, and to strive to give more than you take.
quotes.author: Kina Grannis

quotes.text: The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.text: You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future. You have to trust in something - your gut, destiny, life, karma, whatever. This approach has never let me down, and it has made all the difference in my life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.text: Trust is the glue of life. It's the most essential ingredient in effective communication. It's the foundational principle that holds all relationships.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: I believe that a trusting attitude and a patient attitude go hand in hand. You see, when you let go and learn to trust God, it releases joy in your life. And when you trust God, you're able to be more patient. Patience is not just about waiting for something... it's about how you wait, or your attitude while waiting.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: The trust of the innocent is the liar's most useful tool.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: If people like you, they'll listen to you, but if they trust you, they'll do business with you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
quotes.author: Paul Sweeney

quotes.text: Trust is hard to come by. That's why my circle is small and tight. I'm kind of funny about making new friends.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.text: Age appears to be best in four things; old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: To be trusted is a greater compliment than being loved.
quotes.author: George MacDonald

quotes.text: Boldness doesn't mean rude, obnoxious, loud, or disrespectful. Being bold is being firm, sure, confident, fearless, daring, strong, resilient, and not easily intimidated. It means you're willing to go where you've never been, willing to try what you've never tried, and willing to trust what you've never trusted. Boldness is quiet, not noisy.
quotes.author: Mike Yaconelli

quotes.text: The most important lesson that I have learned is to trust God in every circumstance. Lots of times we go through different trials and following God's plan seems like it doesn't make any sense at all. God is always in control and he will never leave us.
quotes.author: Allyson Felix

quotes.text: To have faith is to trust yourself to the water. When you swim you don't grab hold of the water, because if you do you will sink and drown. Instead you relax, and float.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.text: I trust in nature for the stable laws of beauty and utility. Spring shall plant and autumn garner to the end of time.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.text: If the people cannot trust their government to do the job for which it exists - to protect them and to promote their common welfare - all else is lost.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.text: Nothing is better than going home to family and eating good food and relaxing.
quotes.author: Irina Shayk

quotes.text: It's easy to impress me. I don't need a fancy party to be happy. Just good friends, good food, and good laughs. I'm happy. I'm satisfied. I'm content.
quotes.author: Maria Sharapova

quotes.text: When you rise in the morning, give thanks for the light, for your life, for your strength. Give thanks for your food and for the joy of living. If you see no reason to give thanks, the fault lies in yourself.
quotes.author: Tecumseh

quotes.text: There are only three things women need in life: food, water, and compliments.
quotes.author: Chris Rock

quotes.text: Cooking is all about people. Food is maybe the only universal thing that really has the power to bring everyone together. No matter what culture, everywhere around the world, people get together to eat.
quotes.author: Guy Fieri

quotes.text: If music be the food of love, play on.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.
quotes.author: Bethenny Frankel

quotes.text: Saving our planet, lifting people out of poverty, advancing economic growth... these are one and the same fight. We must connect the dots between climate change, water scarcity, energy shortages, global health, food security and women's empowerment. Solutions to one problem must be solutions for all.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.text: There is no sincerer love than the love of food.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Sometimes we should express our gratitude for the small and simple things like the scent of the rain, the taste of your favorite food, or the sound of a loved one's voice.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.text: Flowers always make people better, happier, and more helpful; they are sunshine, food and medicine for the soul.
quotes.author: Luther Burbank

quotes.text: I get way too much happiness from good food.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Olsen

quotes.text: Food is for eating, and good food is to be enjoyed... I think food is, actually, very beautiful in itself.
quotes.author: Delia Smith

quotes.text: I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: You better cut the pizza in four pieces because I'm not hungry enough to eat six.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.text: A house is not a home unless it contains food and fire for the mind as well as the body.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: You don't need a silver fork to eat good food.
quotes.author: Paul Prudhomme

quotes.text: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.text: I'm just someone who likes cooking and for whom sharing food is a form of expression.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.text: I like food. I like eating. And I don't want to deprive myself of good food.
quotes.author: Sarah Michelle Gellar

quotes.text: Agriculture is not crop production as popular belief holds - it's the production of food and fiber from the world's land and waters. Without agriculture it is not possible to have a city, stock market, banks, university, church or army. Agriculture is the foundation of civilization and any stable economy.
quotes.author: Allan Savory

quotes.text: I know a man who gave up smoking, drinking, sex, and rich food. He was healthy right up to the day he killed himself.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.text: If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Most of us have fond memories of food from our childhood. Whether it was our mom's homemade lasagna or a memorable chocolate birthday cake, food has a way of transporting us back to the past.
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.text: Let's face it, a nice creamy chocolate cake does a lot for a lot of people; it does for me.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.text: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
quotes.author: Ausonius

quotes.text: Age is a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it don't matter.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.text: I know not age, nor weariness nor defeat.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.text: A birthday is just another day where you go to work and people give you love. Age is just a state of mind, and you are as old as you think you are. You have to count your blessings and be happy.
quotes.author: Abhishek Bachchan

quotes.text: Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese.
quotes.author: Luis Bunuel

quotes.text: Try to keep your soul young and quivering right up to old age.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.text: Our uniqueness makes us special, makes perception valuable - but it can also make us lonely. This loneliness is different from being 'alone': You can be lonely even surrounded by people. The feeling I'm talking about stems from the sense that we can never fully share the truth of who we are. I experienced this acutely at an early age.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.text: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.text: Being confident is the key to life. Don't be afraid to be you! I'm super different from a lot of kids my age with style and personality, and I'm OK with it. And if you are OK with it, everyone else will be, too. Just be yourself.
quotes.author: Leo Howard

quotes.text: In our age there is no such thing as 'keeping out of politics.' All issues are political issues, and politics itself is a mass of lies, evasions, folly, hatred and schizophrenia.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.text: Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Age appears to be best in four things; old wood best to burn, old wine to drink, old friends to trust, and old authors to read.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.text: Do not go gentle into that good night but rage, rage against the dying of the light.
quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

quotes.text: Those who improve with age embrace the power of personal growth and personal achievement and begin to replace youth with wisdom, innocence with understanding, and lack of purpose with self-actualization.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.text: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young. The greatest thing in life is to keep your mind young.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: The secret of genius is to carry the spirit of the child into old age, which means never losing your enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: There is a plan and a purpose, a value to every life, no matter what its location, age, gender or disability.
quotes.author: Sharron Angle

quotes.text: Every age has its storytelling form, and video gaming is a huge part of our culture. You can ignore or embrace video games and imbue them with the best artistic quality. People are enthralled with video games in the same way as other people love the cinema or theatre.
quotes.author: Andy Serkis

quotes.text: Youth has no age.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: You can't help getting older, but you don't have to get old.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.text: To me - old age is always ten years older than I am.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.text: There is a fountain of youth: it is your mind, your talents, the creativity you bring to your life and the lives of people you love. When you learn to tap this source, you will truly have defeated age.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.text: Men are like wine - some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.text: The age of a woman doesn't mean a thing. The best tunes are played on the oldest fiddles.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Marriage is not about age; it's about finding the right person.
quotes.author: Sophia Bush

quotes.text: Aging is not lost youth but a new stage of opportunity and strength.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.text: The real act of marriage takes place in the heart, not in the ballroom or church or synagogue. It's a choice you make - not just on your wedding day, but over and over again - and that choice is reflected in the way you treat your husband or wife.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.text: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
quotes.author: Paul Sweeney

quotes.text: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness, of hatred, of jealousy, and, most easily of all, the gate of fear.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quotes.text: A wedding dress is both an intimate and personal for a woman - it must reflect the personality and style of the bride.
quotes.author: Carolina Herrera

quotes.text: Bride: A woman with a fine prospect of happiness behind her.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.text: Weddings are important because they celebrate life and possibility.
quotes.author: Anne Hathaway

quotes.text: There's a big difference between falling in love with someone and falling in love with someone and getting married. Usually, after you get married, you fall in love with the person even more.
quotes.author: Dave Grohl

quotes.text: Many people spend more time in planning the wedding than they do in planning the marriage.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: My mom used to make my costumes when I was little; she sews a lot. One year, I was a bride and I had a big wedding dress and a bouquet. Another year I was a medieval princess with a long teal dress and a veil. It was a little extravagant, but it was cute!
quotes.author: Sasha Pieterse

quotes.text: A wedding, a great wedding, is just a blast. A celebration of romance and community and love... What is unfun about that? Nothing.
quotes.author: Ariel Levy

quotes.text: There's a higher form of happiness in commitment. I'm counting on it.
quotes.author: Claire Forlani

quotes.text: I believe the wedding vows are sacred and precious, and it's been one of my goals as a writer to portray the kind of marriages I've seen modeled in my family - my parents and grandparents, who all celebrated fifty-year anniversaries and well-beyond.
quotes.author: Deborah Raney

quotes.text: I think everyone dreams of that nice romantic wedding.
quotes.author: Lance Bass

quotes.text: A wedding is a funeral where you smell your own flowers.
quotes.author: Eddie Cantor

quotes.text: For years my wedding ring has done its job. It has led me not into temptation. It has reminded my husband numerous times at parties that it's time to go home. It has been a source of relief to a dinner companion. It has been a status symbol in the maternity ward.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.text: Fantasies can be great, but we shouldn't make the wedding a fantasy, because the wedding is the gateway to married life. It shouldn't be a moment of illusion; it should be a moment of preparation.
quotes.author: Alain de Botton

quotes.text: Getting married, for me, was the best thing I ever did. I was suddenly beset with an immense sense of release, that we have something more important than our separate selves, and that is the marriage. There's immense happiness that can come from working towards that.
quotes.author: Nick Cave

quotes.text: I was married by a judge. I should have asked for a jury.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: I love pizza. I want to marry it, but it would just be to eat her family at the wedding.
quotes.author: Mike Birbiglia

quotes.text: I want to be a simple bride when I get married. I want a beach wedding where I am running around on the sand in a white dress.
quotes.author: Sonakshi Sinha

quotes.text: I only wear two rings: a wedding ring and my World Series ring.
quotes.author: Joe Garagiola

quotes.text: In Hollywood, brides keep the bouquets and throw away the groom.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.text: My favourite flowers are English country roses - I had a bouquet of them for my wedding.
quotes.author: Kate Moss

quotes.text: People's hands fascinate me. It's tempting to look at a businessman's left hand and see if there's an indentation from a missing wedding ring. Or maybe there's a tan line and the skin is pressed down where's he's worked a ring off his finger.
quotes.author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.text: A young bride is like a plucked flower; but a guilty wife is like a flower that had been walked over.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.text: I'd imagine my wedding as a fairy tale... huge, beautiful and white.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.text: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.text: I have seen many storms in my life. Most storms have caught me by surprise, so I had to learn very quickly to look further and understand that I am not capable of controlling the weather, to exercise the art of patience and to respect the fury of nature.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.text: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.text: Patience is not simply the ability to wait - it's how we behave while we're waiting.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.text: Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Never cut a tree down in the wintertime. Never make a negative decision in the low time. Never make your most important decisions when you are in your worst moods. Wait. Be patient. The storm will pass. The spring will come.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.text: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: I believe that a trusting attitude and a patient attitude go hand in hand. You see, when you let go and learn to trust God, it releases joy in your life. And when you trust God, you're able to be more patient. Patience is not just about waiting for something... it's about how you wait, or your attitude while waiting.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.text: Have patience. All things are difficult before they become easy.
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.text: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.text: Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness. It is far better take things as they come along with patience and equanimity.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: Patience and perseverance have a magical effect before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.text: Hope is patience with the lamp lit.
quotes.author: Tertullian

quotes.text: We could never learn to be brave and patient, if there were only joy in the world.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Each life is made up of mistakes and learning, waiting and growing, practicing patience and being persistent.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.text: Patience is a virtue, and I'm learning patience. It's a tough lesson.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: The test of good manners is to be patient with the bad ones.
quotes.author: Solomon Ibn Gabirol

quotes.text: The key to everything is patience. You get the chicken by hatching the egg, not by smashing it.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.text: Be patient and understanding. Life is too short to be vengeful or malicious.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.text: Patience is the companion of wisdom.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.text: I have embraced crying mothers who have lost their children because our politicians put their personal agendas before the national good. I have no patience for injustice, no tolerance for government incompetence, no sympathy for leaders who fail their citizens.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.text: Indeed, this life is a test. It is a test of many things - of our convictions and priorities, our faith and our faithfulness, our patience and our resilience, and in the end, our ultimate desires.
quotes.author: Sheri L. Dew

quotes.text: I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Good character is not formed in a week or a month. It is created little by little, day by day. Protracted and patient effort is needed to develop good character.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.text: Qualities you need to get through medical school and residency: Discipline. Patience. Perseverance. A willingness to forgo sleep. A penchant for sadomasochism. Ability to weather crises of faith and self-confidence. Accept exhaustion as fact of life. Addiction to caffeine a definite plus. Unfailing optimism that the end is in sight.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now. Don't wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future. Think how really precious is the time you have to spend, whether it's at work or with your family. Every minute should be enjoyed and savored.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.text: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
quotes.author: Bradley Whitford

quotes.text: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.text: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Nobody can predict the future. You just have to give your all to the relationship you're in and do your best to take care of your partner, communicate and give them every last drop of love you have. I think one of the most important things in a relationship is caring for your significant other through good times and bad.
quotes.author: Nick Cannon

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Keep looking up! I learn from the past, dream about the future and look up. There's nothing like a beautiful sunset to end a healthy day.
quotes.author: Rachel Boston

quotes.text: Teaching is a very noble profession that shapes the character, caliber, and future of an individual. If the people remember me as a good teacher, that will be the biggest honour for me.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: When you forgive, you in no way change the past - but you sure do change the future.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.text: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.text: You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future. You have to trust in something - your gut, destiny, life, karma, whatever. This approach has never let me down, and it has made all the difference in my life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: No dream is too big. No challenge is too great. Nothing we want for our future is beyond our reach.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.text: Education is the foundation upon which we build our future.
quotes.author: Christine Gregoire

quotes.text: I'm looking forward to the future, and feeling grateful for the past.
quotes.author: Mike Rowe

quotes.text: I look forward to a great future for America - a future in which our country will match its military strength with our moral restraint, its wealth with our wisdom, its power with our purpose.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Some of the best lessons we ever learn are learned from past mistakes. The error of the past is the wisdom and success of the future.
quotes.author: Dale Turner

quotes.text: Let your hopes, not your hurts, shape your future.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.text: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Sustainable development is the pathway to the future we want for all. It offers a framework to generate economic growth, achieve social justice, exercise environmental stewardship and strengthen governance.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.text: Nothing is better than going home to family and eating good food and relaxing.
quotes.author: Irina Shayk

quotes.text: It's easy to impress me. I don't need a fancy party to be happy. Just good friends, good food, and good laughs. I'm happy. I'm satisfied. I'm content.
quotes.author: Maria Sharapova

quotes.text: When you rise in the morning, give thanks for the light, for your life, for your strength. Give thanks for your food and for the joy of living. If you see no reason to give thanks, the fault lies in yourself.
quotes.author: Tecumseh

quotes.text: There are only three things women need in life: food, water, and compliments.
quotes.author: Chris Rock

quotes.text: Cooking is all about people. Food is maybe the only universal thing that really has the power to bring everyone together. No matter what culture, everywhere around the world, people get together to eat.
quotes.author: Guy Fieri

quotes.text: If music be the food of love, play on.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.
quotes.author: Bethenny Frankel

We must connect the dots between climate change, water scarcity, energy shortages, global health, food security and women's empowerment. Solutions to one problem must be solutions for all.

quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.author: Elizabeth Olsen

quotes.text: Food is for eating, and good food is to be enjoyed... I think food is, actually, very beautiful in itself.
quotes.author: Delia Smith

quotes.text: I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.text: You better cut the pizza in four pieces because I'm not hungry enough to eat six.
